 2152: econnreset_after_sync_send(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2153:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 2154:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 2155:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 2156:                             Addr;
 2157:                         {error, Reason} ->
 2158:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 2159:                     end
 2160:            end,
 2161:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_econnreset_after_sync_send(Config, Addr) end,
 2162:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 2163:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 2164: 
 2165: do_econnreset_after_sync_send(Config, Addr) ->
 2166:     %% First confirm everything works with option turned off.
 2167:     ?P("test with option switched off (default)"),
 2168:     {ok, L}    = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{active, false}, {ip, Addr}]),
 2169:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 2170:     Client = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 2171: 			   [{active,          false},
 2172: 			    {show_econnreset, false},
 2173: 			    {ip,              Addr}]) of
 2174:                  {ok, CSock} ->
 2175:                      CSock;
 2176:             {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 2177:                 ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 2178:         end,
 2179:     {ok, S} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 2180:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 2181:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2182:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S),
 2183:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2184:     %% _ = inet:setopts(Client, [{debug, true}]),
 2185:     %% {error, closed} = gen_tcp:send(Client, "Whatever"),
 2186:     ok = ecr_ass_send(Config, Client, closed),
 2187:     %% _ = inet:setopts(Client, [{debug, false}]),
 2188: 
 2189:     %% Now test with option switched on.
 2190:     ?P("test with option explicitly switched on"),
 2191:     {ok, L1}    = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{active, false}, {ip, Addr}]),
 2192:     {ok, Port1} = inet:port(L1),
 2193:     Client1 =
 2194:         case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port1,
 2195:                       [{active,          false},
 2196:                        {show_econnreset, true},
 2197:                        {ip,              Addr}]) of
 2198:             {ok, CSock1} ->
 2199:                 CSock1;
 2200:             {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason1} ->
 2201:                 ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason1))
 2202:         end,            
 2203:     {ok, S1} = gen_tcp:accept(L1),
 2204:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L1),
 2205:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2206:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S1),
 2207:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2208:     %% {error, econnreset} = gen_tcp:send(Client1, "Whatever"),
 2209:     ok = ecr_ass_send(Config, Client1, econnreset),
 2210:     ?P("done"),
 2211:     ok.

 2214: ecr_ass_send(Config, Sock, Expected) ->
 2215:     case os:type() of
 2216: 	{win32, nt} ->
 2217: 	    case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 2218: 		true ->
 2219: 		    do_ecr_ass_send(Sock, Expected, 2);
 2220: 		false ->
 2221: 		    do_ecr_ass_send(Sock, Expected, 1)
 2222: 	    end;
 2223: 	_ ->
 2224: 	    do_ecr_ass_send(Sock, Expected, 1)
 2225:     end.
 2226: 
 2227: do_ecr_ass_send(Sock, Expected, N) when (N > 0) ->
 2228:     case gen_tcp:send(Sock, "Whatever") of
 2229: 	{error, Expected} ->
 2230: 	    ?P("[~w] expected send result", [N]),
 2231: 	    ok;
 2232: 	{error, Unexpected} ->
 2233: 	    ?P("[~w] unexpected send error: "
 2234: 	       "~n   Expected:   ~p"
 2235: 	       "~n   Unexpected: ~p", [N, Expected, Unexpected]),
 2236: 	    do_ecr_ass_send(Sock, Expected, N-1);
 2237: 	ok ->
 2238: 	    ?P("[~w] unexpected send success", [N]),
 2239: 	    do_ecr_ass_send(Sock, Expected, N-1)
 2240:     end;
 2241: do_ecr_ass_send(_Sock, _Expected, _) ->
 2242:     error.
 2243:

 2245: econnreset_after_async_send_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2246:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 2247:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 2248:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 2249:                             Addr;
 2250:                         {error, Reason} ->
 2251:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 2252:                     end
 2253:            end,
 2254:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_econnreset_after_async_send_active(Config, Addr) end,
 2255:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 2256:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 2257: 
 2258: do_econnreset_after_async_send_active(Config, Addr) ->
 2259:     {OS, _}         = os:type(),
 2260:     IsSocketBackend = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 2261:     CPayload        = craasa_mk_payload(),
 2262:     SPayload        = "Whatever",
 2263: 
 2264:     %% First confirm everything works with option turned off.
 2265:     ?P("pre 1 (default)"),
 2266:     {Client1, Server1} = craasa_pre(Config, Addr, default),
 2267: 
 2268:     ?P("populate 1 (default)"),
 2269:     {ok, Sender1} = craasa_populate(OS, IsSocketBackend, default,
 2270:                                     Client1, Server1, CPayload, SPayload),
 2271:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2272:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2273: 
 2274:     ?P("[server] set linger true:0"),
 2275:     ok = inet:setopts(Server1, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2276:     ?P("[server] close socket"),
 2277:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server1),
 2278:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2279:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2280: 
 2281:     ?P("verify 1 (default)"),
 2282:     craasa_verify(default, Client1, SPayload),
 2283: 
 2284:     ?P("cleanup 1 (default)"),
 2285:     craasa_cleanup(Client1, Sender1),
 2286: 
 2287:     %% Now test with option switched on.
 2288:     ?P("pre 2 (true)"),
 2289:     {Client2, Server2} = craasa_pre(Config, Addr, true),
 2290: 
 2291:     ?P("populate 2 (true)"),
 2292:     {ok, Sender2} = craasa_populate(OS, IsSocketBackend, true,
 2293:                                     Client2, Server2, CPayload, SPayload),
 2294:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2295:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2296: 
 2297:     ?P("[server] set linger true:0"),
 2298:     ok = inet:setopts(Server2, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2299:     ?P("[server] close socket"),
 2300:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server2),
 2301:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2302:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2303: 
 2304:     ?P("verify 2 (true)"),
 2305:     craasa_verify(true, Client2, SPayload),
 2306: 
 2307:     ?P("cleanup 2 (true)"),
 2308:     craasa_cleanup(Client2, Sender2),
 2309: 
 2310:     ?P("done"),
 2311:     ok.
 2312: 
 2313: craasa_mk_payload() ->
 2314:     list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(1024 * 1024, $.)).
 2315: 
 2316: craasa_pre(Config, Addr, EConnReset)
 2317:   when is_boolean(EConnReset) orelse (EConnReset =:= default) ->
 2318:     ?P("create listen socket (server) with active = false"),
 2319:     {ok, L}    = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{active, false},
 2320:                                      {recbuf, 4096},
 2321:                                      {ip,     Addr}]),
 2322:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 2323:     ?P("[client] create connect socket with show_econnreset: ~p", [EConnReset]),
 2324:     Opts = if (EConnReset =:= default) -> [];
 2325:               is_boolean(EConnReset)   -> [{show_econnreset, EConnReset}]
 2326:            end,
 2327:     Client = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 2328:                            [{ip, Addr}, {sndbuf, 4096}] ++ Opts) of
 2329:                  {ok, CSock} ->
 2330:                      CSock;
 2331:             {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 2332:                 ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 2333:         end,
 2334:     ?P("create accept socket (server)"),
 2335:     {ok, S} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 2336:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 2337:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 2338:     {Client, S}.
 2339: 
 2340: craasa_populate(OS, _ISB, _EConnReset, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload)
 2341:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 2342:     ?P("send payload (~w bytes) from client to server", [byte_size(CPayload)]),
 2343:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Client, CPayload),
 2344:     ?P("verify client socket queue size"),
 2345:     case erlang:port_info(Client, queue_size) of
 2346: 	{queue_size, N} when N > 0 -> ok;
 2347: 	{queue_size, 0} when OS =:= win32 -> ok;
 2348: 	{queue_size, 0} = T -> ct:fail(T)
 2349:     end,
 2350:     ?P("[server] send something"),
 2351:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2352:     {ok, undefined};
 2353: craasa_populate(OS, ISB,
 2354: 		EConnReset, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload) ->
 2355:     ExpectedSendRes = if (EConnReset =:= default) -> closed;
 2356:                          (EConnReset =:= true)    -> econnreset
 2357:                       end,
 2358:     Sender = spawn_link(fun() ->
 2359:                                 craasa_populate_sender(
 2360: 				  if (OS =:= win32) andalso ISB -> 2;
 2361: 				     true                       -> 1
 2362: 				  end,
 2363: 				  Client,
 2364: 				  ExpectedSendRes,
 2365: 				  CPayload)
 2366:                         end),
 2367:     receive
 2368:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} when (Reason =/= normal) ->
 2369:             {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 2370:     after 2000 ->
 2371:             ?P("[server] send something"),
 2372:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2373:             {ok, Sender}
 2374:     end.
 2375: 
 2376: craasa_populate_sender(N, Client, ExpectedSendReason, Payload) when (N > 0) ->
 2377:     ?P("[socket, ~w] send payload (expect failure ~p)",
 2378:        [N, ExpectedSendReason]), 
 2379:     case gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload) of
 2380:         {error, ExpectedSendReason} ->
 2381:             ?P("[socket, ~w] expected payload send failure", [N]), 
 2382:             exit(normal);
 2383:         {error, UnexpectedSendReason} ->
 2384:             ?P("[socket, ~w] unexpected payload send failure: "
 2385: 	       "~n   ~p", [N, UnexpectedSendReason]), 
 2386: 	    craasa_populate_sender(N-1,
 2387: 				   Client, ExpectedSendReason, Payload);
 2388: 	ok ->
 2389:             ?P("[socket, ~w] unexpected payload send success", [N]), 
 2390: 	    craasa_populate_sender(N-1,
 2391: 				   Client, ExpectedSendReason, Payload)
 2392:     end;
 2393: craasa_populate_sender(_, _, _, _) ->
 2394:     exit(failed_sending_payload).
 2395: 
 2396: craasa_cleanup(Client, Sender) ->
 2397:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Client)),
 2398:     craasa_cleanup(Sender).
 2399: 
 2400: craasa_cleanup(Sender) when is_pid(Sender) ->
 2401:     exit(Sender, kill),
 2402:     receive
 2403:         {'EXIT', Sender, _} ->
 2404:             ok
 2405:     after 0 ->
 2406:             ok
 2407:     end;
 2408: craasa_cleanup(_) ->
 2409:     ok.
 2410: 
 2411: craasa_verify(default, Client, Payload) ->
 2412:     ?P("[verify-default] client await server data"),
 2413:     receive
 2414: 	{tcp, Client, Payload} ->
 2415:             ?P("[verify-default] "
 2416:                "client received expected server data - "
 2417:                "now await socket closed"),
 2418: 	    receive
 2419: 		{tcp_closed, Client} ->
 2420:                     ?P("[verify-default] "
 2421:                        "received client socket closed"),
 2422: 		    ok;
 2423: 		Other1 ->
 2424:                     ?P("[verify-default] "
 2425:                        "awaiting client socket closed - received upexpected: "
 2426:                        "~n      ~p", [Other1]),
 2427: 		    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_closed, Other1})
 2428: 	    end;
 2429: 	Other2 ->
 2430:             ?P("[verify-default] "
 2431:                "awaiting client socket data - received upexpected: "
 2432:                "~n      ~p", [Other2]),
 2433: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp, Other2})
 2434:     end;
 2435: craasa_verify(true, Client, Payload) ->
 2436:     ?P("[verify-true] client await server data"),
 2437:     receive
 2438: 	{tcp, Client, Payload} ->
 2439:             ?P("[verify-true] "
 2440:                "client received expected server data - now await socket error"),
 2441: 	    receive
 2442: 		{tcp_error, Client, econnreset} ->
 2443:                     ?P("[verify-true] "
 2444:                        "client received expected socket error - "
 2445:                        "now await socket closed"),
 2446: 		    receive
 2447: 			{tcp_closed, Client} ->
 2448:                             ?P("[verify-true] "
 2449:                                "client received expected socket closed"),
 2450: 			    ok;
 2451: 			Other1 ->
 2452:                             ?P("[verify-true] "
 2453:                                "client awaiting socket closed - "
 2454:                                "received upexpected: "
 2455:                                "~n      ~p", [Other1]),
 2456: 			    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_closed, Other1})
 2457: 		    end;
 2458: 		Other2 ->
 2459:                     ?P("[verify-true] "
 2460:                        "client awaiting socket error - received upexpected: "
 2461:                        "~n      ~p", [Other2]),
 2462: 		    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_error, Other2})
 2463: 	    end;
 2464: 	Other3 ->
 2465:             ?P("[verify-true] "
 2466:                "client awaiting socket data - received upexpected: "
 2467:                "~n      ~p", [Other3]),
 2468: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp, Other3})
 2469:     end.

 2474: econnreset_after_async_send_active_once(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2475:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 2476:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 2477:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 2478:                             Addr;
 2479:                         {error, Reason} ->
 2480:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 2481:                     end
 2482:            end,
 2483:     TC   = fun(Addr) ->
 2484:                    do_econnreset_after_async_send_active_once(Config, Addr)
 2485:            end,
 2486:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 2487:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 2488: 
 2489: do_econnreset_after_async_send_active_once(Config, Addr) ->
 2490:     ?P("[ctrl] pre"),
 2491:     {Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload} = craasao_pre(Config, Addr),
 2492: 
 2493:     {OS, _} = os:type(),
 2494:     ISB     = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 2495: 
 2496:     ?P("[ctrl] populate"),
 2497:     {ok, Sender} = craasao_populate(OS, ISB,
 2498: 				    Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload),
 2499: 
 2500:     ?P("[ctrl] set server socket option linger: {true, 0}"),
 2501:     ok = inet:setopts(Server, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2502:     ?P("[ctrl] close server socket"),
 2503:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server),
 2504:     ?P("[ctrl] sleep some"),
 2505:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2506: 
 2507:     ?P("[ctrl] verify"),
 2508:     craasao_verify(OS, ISB, Client, Sender, SPayload),
 2509: 
 2510:     ?P("[ctrl] cleanup"),
 2511:     craasao_cleanup(Client),
 2512: 
 2513:     ?P("[ctrl] done"),
 2514:     ok.
 2515: 
 2516: craasao_pre(Config, Addr) ->
 2517:     ?P("[pre] create listen socket with active = false"),
 2518:     {ok, L}    = ?LISTEN(Config, 0,
 2519:                          [{active, false},
 2520:                           {recbuf, 4096},
 2521:                           {ip,     Addr}]),
 2522:     ?P("[pre] listen socket: "
 2523:        "~n      ~p", [L]),
 2524:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 2525:     ?P("[pre] create connect socket (~w)", [Port]),
 2526:     Client     = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 2527:                                [{active,          false},
 2528:                                 {sndbuf,          4096},
 2529:                                 {show_econnreset, true},
 2530:                                 {ip,              Addr}]) of
 2531:                      {ok, CSock} ->
 2532:                          ?P("[pre] connect socket created:"
 2533:                               "~n      ~p", [CSock]),
 2534:                          CSock;
 2535:                      {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 2536:                          ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 2537:                  end,
 2538:     ?P("[pre] create accept socket"),
 2539:     {ok, Server} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 2540:     ?P("[pre] close listen socket"),
 2541:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 2542:     {Client, Server, craasao_mk_payload(), "Whatever"}.
 2543: 
 2544: craasao_populate(OS, _ISB, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload)
 2545:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 2546:     ?P("[populate,inet] client send data when"
 2547:        "~n      Client: ~p"
 2548:        "~n      Server: ~p", [Client, Server]),
 2549:     ok      = gen_tcp:send(Client, CPayload),
 2550:     ?P("[populate,inet] verify client socket queue size"),
 2551:     case erlang:port_info(Client, queue_size) of
 2552: 	{queue_size, N} when N > 0 -> ok;
 2553: 	{queue_size, 0} when OS =:= win32 -> ok;
 2554: 	{queue_size, 0} = T -> ct:fail(T)
 2555:     end,
 2556:     ?P("[populate,inet] server send data"),
 2557:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2558:     ?P("[populate,inet] sleep some"),
 2559:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2560:     {ok, undefined};
 2561: craasao_populate(OS, ISB, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload) ->
 2562:     ?P("[populate,socket] entry when"
 2563:        "~n      Client: ~p"
 2564:        "~n      Server: ~p", [Client, Server]),
 2565:     Sender = spawn_link(fun() ->
 2566:                                 craasao_populate_sender(
 2567: 				  if ((OS =:= win32) andalso ISB) -> 2;
 2568: 				     true                         -> 1
 2569: 				  end,
 2570: 				  Client, CPayload)
 2571:                         end),
 2572:     receive
 2573:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} ->
 2574: 	    ?P("unexpected sender exit: "
 2575: 	       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 2576:             {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 2577:     after 2000 ->
 2578:             ?P("[populate,socket] send something"),
 2579:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2580:             {ok, Sender}
 2581:     end.
 2582: 
 2583: craasao_populate_sender(N, Client, Payload) when (N > 0) ->
 2584:     ?P("[populate,sender,~w] send payload (expect failure)", [N]),
 2585:     ExpectedSendRes = econnreset,
 2586:     case gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload) of
 2587: 	{error, ExpectedSendRes} ->
 2588: 	    ?P("[populate,sender,~w] expected (payload) send failure", [N]), 
 2589: 	    exit(normal);
 2590: 	{error, BadReason} ->
 2591: 	    ?P("[populate,sender,~w] unexpected (payload) send failure reason:"
 2592: 	       "~n   ~p", [N, BadReason]),
 2593: 	    craasao_populate_sender(N-1, Client, Payload);
 2594: 	ok ->
 2595: 	    ?P("[populate,sender,~w] unexpected send success - "
 2596: 	       "expected failure with ~p", [N, ExpectedSendRes]),
 2597: 	    craasao_populate_sender(N-1, Client, Payload)
 2598:     end;
 2599: craasao_populate_sender(_, _, _) ->
 2600:     exit(send_failure).
 2601: 
 2602: 
 2603: craasao_mk_payload() ->
 2604:     list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(1024 * 1024, $.)).
 2605: 
 2606: craasao_verify(_OS, _ISB,
 2607: 	       Client, _Sender, _Payload) when is_port(Client) ->
 2608:     ?P("[verify] ensure no 'unexpected messages' received"),
 2609:     ok = receive Msg -> {unexpected_msg, Msg} after 0 -> ok end,
 2610:     ?P("[verify] set client socket option active: once"),
 2611:     ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{active, once}]),
 2612:     ?P("[verify] expect client econnreset"),
 2613:     receive
 2614: 	{tcp_error, Client, econnreset} ->
 2615:             ?P("[verify] received client econnreset -> "
 2616:                "expect client closed message"),
 2617: 	    receive
 2618: 		{tcp_closed, Client} ->
 2619:                     ?P("[verify] "
 2620:                        "received expected client closed message - done"),
 2621: 		    ok;
 2622: 		Other1 ->
 2623:                     ?P("[verify] client received unexpected message "
 2624:                          "(expected closed): "
 2625:                        "~n      ~p", [Other1]),
 2626: 		    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_closed, Other1})
 2627: 	    end;
 2628: 	Other2 ->
 2629:             ?P("[verify] client received unexpected message (expected error): "
 2630:                "~n      Unexpected: ~p"
 2631:                "~n      Flushed:    ~p", [Other2, craasao_flush()]),
 2632: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_error, Other2})
 2633:     end;
 2634: craasao_verify(OS, ISB,
 2635: 	       Client, Sender, Payload) when is_pid(Sender) ->
 2636:     ?P("[verify] begin with"
 2637:        "~n      Client: ~p"
 2638:        "~n      Sender: ~p", [Client, Sender]),
 2639:     craasao_verify_sender(Sender),
 2640:     ?P("[verify] ensure no 'unexpected messages' received"),
 2641:     ok = receive Msg -> {unexpected_msg, Msg} after 0 -> ok end,
 2642:     Post =
 2643: 	if ((OS =:= win32) andalso ISB) ->
 2644: 		"";
 2645: 	   true ->
 2646: 		?P("[verify] set client socket option active once (1)"),
 2647: 		ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{active, once}]),
 2648: 		?P("[verify] client expect data"),
 2649: 		receive
 2650: 		    {tcp, Client, Payload} ->
 2651: 			?P("[verify] client received expected data"),
 2652: 			ok
 2653: 		after 10000 ->
 2654: 			?P("[verify] no client payload: "
 2655: 			   "~n   ~p", [messages()]),
 2656: 			ct:fail(no_client_payload)
 2657: 		end,
 2658: 		" (2)"
 2659:     end,
 2660:     ?P("[verify] set client socket option active once" ++ Post),
 2661:     ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{active, once}]),
 2662:     ?P("[verify] await client econnreset"),
 2663:     receive
 2664: 	{tcp_error, Client, econnreset} ->
 2665:             ?P("[verify] client received expected econnreset -> "
 2666:                "expect socket close message"),
 2667: 	    receive
 2668: 		{tcp_closed, Client} ->
 2669: 		    ?P("[verify] client received expected closed message"),
 2670:                     ok;
 2671: 		Other1 ->
 2672: 		    ?P("[verify] client received unexpected message "
 2673:                          "(expected closed): "
 2674: 		       "~n      Unexpected: ~p"
 2675: 		       "~n      Flushed:    ~p", [Other1, craasao_flush()]),
 2676: 		    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_closed, Other1})
 2677: 	    end;
 2678: 	Other2 ->
 2679:             ?P("[verify] client received unexpected message (expected error): "
 2680:                "~n      Unexpected: ~p"
 2681:                "~n      Flushed:    ~p", [Other2, craasao_flush()]),
 2682: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_error, Other2})
 2683:     after 10000 ->
 2684:             ?P("[verify] client received unexpected timeout (expected error): "
 2685:                "~n      Flushed: ~p", [craasao_flush()]),
 2686: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_timeout, tcp_error})            
 2687:     end.
 2688: 
 2689: craasao_flush() ->
 2690:     craasao_flush([]).
 2691: 
 2692: craasao_flush(Acc) ->
 2693:     erlang:yield(),
 2694:     receive Msg    -> craasao_flush([Msg|Acc])
 2695:     after     1000 -> lists:reverse(Acc)
 2696:     end.
 2697: 
 2698: craasao_verify_sender(Sender) when is_pid(Sender) ->
 2699:     ?P("[verify sender] await termination"),
 2700:     receive
 2701:         {'EXIT', Sender, normal} ->
 2702: 	    ?P("[verify sender] expected normal termination received"),
 2703:             ok;
 2704:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} ->
 2705:             ?P("[verify sender] unexpected termination: "
 2706:                "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 2707: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_sender_termination, Sender, Reason})
 2708:     after infinity ->
 2709:             ok
 2710:     end;
 2711: craasao_verify_sender(_) ->
 2712:     ok.
 2713: 
 2714: craasao_cleanup(Client) ->
 2715:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Client)).
 2716:

 2720: econnreset_after_async_send_passive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2721:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 2722:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 2723:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 2724:                             Addr;
 2725:                         {error, Reason} ->
 2726:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 2727:                     end
 2728:            end,
 2729:     TC   = fun(Addr) ->
 2730:                    do_econnreset_after_async_send_passive(Config, Addr)
 2731:            end,
 2732:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 2733:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 2734: 
 2735: do_econnreset_after_async_send_passive(Config, Addr) ->
 2736:     {OS, _}  = os:type(),
 2737:     ISB      = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 2738:     CPayload = craasp_mk_payload(),
 2739:     SPayload = "Whatever",
 2740: 
 2741:     %% First confirm everything works with option turned off.
 2742:     ?P("pre 1 (default)"),
 2743:     {Client1, Server1} = craasp_pre(Config, Addr, default),
 2744: 
 2745:     ?P("populate 1 (default)"),
 2746:     {ok, Sender1} = craasp_populate(OS, ISB, default,
 2747:                                     Client1, Server1, CPayload, SPayload),
 2748: 
 2749:     ?P("close server socket (1)"),
 2750:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server1),
 2751:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2752:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2753: 
 2754:     ?P("verify 1 (default)"),
 2755:     ok = craasp_verify(OS, ISB, Client1, default, SPayload),
 2756: 
 2757:     ?P("cleanup 1 (default)"),
 2758:     craasp_cleanup(Client1, Sender1),
 2759: 
 2760:     %% Now test with option switched on.
 2761:     ?P("pre 2 (true)"),
 2762:     {Client2, Server2} = craasp_pre(Config, Addr, true),
 2763: 
 2764:     ?P("populate 2 (default)"),
 2765:     {ok, Sender2} = craasp_populate(OS, ISB, true,
 2766:                                     Client2, Server2, CPayload, SPayload),
 2767: 
 2768: 
 2769:     ?P("close server socket 2"),
 2770:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server2),
 2771:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2772:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2773: 
 2774:     ?P("verify 2 (default)"),
 2775:     ok = craasp_verify(OS, ISB, Client2, true, SPayload),
 2776: 
 2777:     ?P("cleanup 2 (default)"),
 2778:     craasp_cleanup(Client2, Sender2),
 2779: 
 2780:     ?P("done"),
 2781:     ok.
 2782:

 2784: craasp_pre(Config, Addr, EConnReset)
 2785:   when is_boolean(EConnReset) orelse (EConnReset =:= default) ->
 2786:     ?P("create listen socket *** with option switched off (default)"),
 2787:     {ok, L}    = ?LISTEN(Config, 0,
 2788:                          [{active, false}, {recbuf, 4096}, {ip, Addr}]),
 2789:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 2790:     ?P("[client] create connect socket with show_econnreset: ~p", [EConnReset]),
 2791:     COpts = [{active, false}, {sndbuf, 4096}] ++
 2792:         if
 2793:             (EConnReset =:= default) -> [];
 2794:             is_boolean(EConnReset)   -> [{show_econnreset, EConnReset}]
 2795:         end,
 2796:     Client = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [{ip, Addr} | COpts]) of
 2797:                  {ok, CSock} ->
 2798:                      CSock;
 2799:                  {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 2800:                      ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 2801:         end,
 2802:     ?P("accept connection"),
 2803:     {ok, Server} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 2804:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 2805:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 2806:     {Client, Server}.
 2807: 
 2808: craasp_mk_payload() ->
 2809:     list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(1024 * 1024, $.)).
 2810: 
 2811: craasp_populate(OS, _ISB,
 2812: 		_EConnReset, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload)
 2813:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 2814:     ?P("[port,server] set linger: true:0"),
 2815:     ok = inet:setopts(Server, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2816:     ?P("[port,server] send some data to client"),
 2817:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2818:     ?P("[port,client] send some data to server"),
 2819:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Client, CPayload),
 2820:     ?P("[port,client] verify (port) queue-size"),
 2821:     case erlang:port_info(Client, queue_size) of
 2822: 	{queue_size, N} when N > 0 -> ok;
 2823: 	{queue_size, 0} when OS =:= win32 -> ok;
 2824: 	{queue_size, 0} = T -> ct:fail(T)
 2825:     end,
 2826:     {ok, undefined};
 2827: craasp_populate(OS, ISB,
 2828: 		EConnReset, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload) ->
 2829:     ExpectedSendRes = if (EConnReset =:= default) -> closed;
 2830:                          (EConnReset =:= true)    -> econnreset
 2831:                       end,
 2832:     Sender = spawn_link(fun() ->
 2833:                                 craasp_populate_sender(
 2834: 				  if (OS =:= win32) andalso ISB -> 2;
 2835: 				     true                       -> 1
 2836: 				  end,
 2837: 				  Client,
 2838: 				  ExpectedSendRes,
 2839: 				  CPayload)
 2840:                         end),
 2841:     receive
 2842: 	{'EXIT', Sender, Reason} when (Reason =/= normal) ->
 2843: 	    ?P("unexpected sender exit: "
 2844: 	       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 2845: 	    {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 2846:     after 2000 ->
 2847:             ?P("[server] send something"),
 2848:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2849:             {ok, Sender}
 2850:     end.
 2851:     
 2852: craasp_populate_sender(N, Client, ExpectedSendRes, Payload) when (N > 0) ->
 2853:     ?P("[socket,~w] send payload (expect failure)", [N]), 
 2854:     case gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload) of
 2855: 	{error, ExpectedSendRes} ->
 2856: 	    ?P("[socket,~w] payload send failure (as expected)", [N]), 
 2857: 	    exit(normal);
 2858: 	{error, BadReason} ->
 2859: 	    ?P("[socket,~w] unexpected failure reason:"
 2860: 	       "~n   ~p", [N, BadReason]),
 2861: 	    craasp_populate_sender(N-1, Client, ExpectedSendRes, Payload);
 2862: 	ok ->
 2863: 	    ?P("[socket,~w] unexpected success - expected failure with ~p",
 2864:                [N, ExpectedSendRes]),
 2865: 	    craasp_populate_sender(N-1, Client, ExpectedSendRes, Payload)
 2866:     end;
 2867: craasp_populate_sender(_, _, _, _) ->
 2868:     exit(failed_sending_payload).
 2869: 
 2870: craasp_verify(_OS, _ISB,
 2871: 	      Client, EConnReset, _Payload)
 2872:   when is_port(Client) andalso
 2873:        ((EConnReset =:= default) orelse is_boolean(EConnReset)) ->
 2874:     ?P("[client,~w] attempt receive and expect error (closed): "
 2875:        "~n   Port Info:     ~p"
 2876:        "~n   Socket Status: ~s",
 2877:        [EConnReset,
 2878:         try erlang:port_info(Client)
 2879:         catch
 2880:             _:_:_ ->
 2881:                 "-"
 2882:         end,
 2883:         try prim_inet:getstatus(Client) of
 2884:             {ok, CStatus} -> ?F("~p", [CStatus]);
 2885:             _             -> "-"
 2886:         catch
 2887:             _:_:_ ->
 2888:                 "-"
 2889:         end]),
 2890:     case gen_tcp:recv(Client, 0) of
 2891:         {error, closed}     when (EConnReset =:= default) ->
 2892:             ok;
 2893:         {error, econnreset} when (EConnReset =:= true)    ->
 2894:             ok;
 2895:         {error, Reason} ->
 2896:             {error, {unexpected_error, Reason}};
 2897:         ok ->
 2898:             {error, unexpected_success}
 2899:     end;
 2900: craasp_verify(win32 = _OS, true = _ISB,
 2901: 	      Client, EConnReset, _Payload)
 2902:   when (EConnReset =:= default) orelse is_boolean(EConnReset) ->
 2903:     ?P("[client,~w] attempt receive and expect error (closed): "
 2904:        "~n   Socket Info:   ~p"
 2905:        "~n   Socket Status: ~s",
 2906:        [EConnReset, inet:info(Client),
 2907: 	try prim_inet:getstatus(Client) of
 2908:             {ok, CStatus} -> ?F("~p", [CStatus]);
 2909:             _             -> "-"
 2910:         catch
 2911:             _:_:_ ->
 2912:                 "-"
 2913:         end]),
 2914:     case gen_tcp:recv(Client, 0) of
 2915:         {error, closed}     when (EConnReset =:= default) ->
 2916:             ok;
 2917:         {error, econnreset} when (EConnReset =:= true)    ->
 2918:             ok;
 2919:         {error, Reason} ->
 2920:             {error, {unexpected_error, Reason}};
 2921:         ok ->
 2922:             {error, unexpected_success}
 2923:     end;
 2924: craasp_verify(_OS, _ISB,
 2925: 	      Client, EConnReset, Payload) 
 2926:   when (EConnReset =:= default) orelse is_boolean(EConnReset) ->
 2927:     ?P("[client] attempt first recv and expect success"),
 2928:     case gen_tcp:recv(Client, 0) of
 2929:         {ok, Payload} ->
 2930:             ?P("[client] attempt second recv and expect failure (~w)",
 2931:                [EConnReset]),
 2932:             case gen_tcp:recv(Client, 0) of
 2933: 		{error, closed}     when (EConnReset =:= default) ->
 2934:                     ?P("[client] expected failure (closed)"),
 2935: 		    ok;
 2936: 		{error, econnreset} when (EConnReset =:= true)    ->
 2937:                     ?P("[client] expected failure (econnreset)"),
 2938: 		    ok;
 2939:                 {error, Reason2} ->
 2940:                     ?P("[client] unexpected failure:"
 2941:                        "~n      EConnReset: ~p"
 2942:                        "~n      Reason:     ~p", [EConnReset, Reason2]),
 2943:                     {error, {unexpected_error2, EConnReset, Reason2}};
 2944:                 {ok, _} ->
 2945:                     ?P("[client] unexpected success"),
 2946:                     {error, unexpected_recv2}
 2947:             end;                    
 2948:         {ok, _} ->
 2949:             ?P("[client] unexpected first recv success (wrong payload)"),
 2950:             {error, unexpected_recv1};
 2951:         {error, Reason1} ->
 2952:             ?P("[client] unexpected first recv failure: "
 2953:                "~n      Reason: ~p", [Reason1]),
 2954:             {error, {unexpected_error1, Reason1}}
 2955:     end.

 2957: craasp_cleanup(Client, Sender) ->
 2958:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Client)),
 2959:     craasp_cleanup(Sender).

 2962:     exit(Sender, kill),
 2963:     receive
 2964:         {'EXIT', Sender, _} ->
 2965:             ok
 2966:     after 0 ->
 2967:             ok
 2968:     end;

 2974: %%
 2975: %% Test {linger {true, 0}} aborts a connection
 2976: %%
 2977: 
 2978: linger_zero(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2979:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 2980:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 2981:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 2982:                             Addr;
 2983:                         {error, Reason} ->
 2984:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 2985:                     end
 2986:            end,
 2987:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_linger_zero(Config, Addr) end,
 2988:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 2989:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 2990: 
 2991: do_linger_zero(Config, Addr) ->
 2992:     %% All the econnreset tests will prove that {linger, {true, 0}} aborts
 2993:     %% a connection when the driver queue is empty. We will test here
 2994:     %% that it also works when the driver queue is not empty.
 2995:     ?P("[ctrl] pre"),
 2996:     {OS, ISB, Client, Server} = lz_pre(Config, Addr),
 2997: 
 2998:     ?P("[ctrl] populate when"
 2999:        "~n   OS:     ~p"
 3000:        "~n   ISB:    ~p"
 3001:        "~n   Client: ~p"
 3002:        "~n   Server: ~p", [OS, ISB, Client, Server]),
 3003:     PayloadSize  = 1024 * 1024,
 3004:     {ok, Sender} = lz_populate(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize),
 3005: 
 3006:     ?P("[ctrl] set linger: {true, 0}"),
 3007:     %% ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{debug,  true}]),
 3008:     ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 3009:     %% ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{linger, {true, 1}}]),
 3010:     ?P("[ctrl] read back the linger option"),
 3011:     {ok, [{linger, {true, 0}}]} = inet:getopts(Client, [linger]),
 3012:     %% {ok, [{linger, {true, 1}}]} = inet:getopts(Client, [linger]),
 3013:     %% ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{debug,  false}]),
 3014:     ?P("[ctrl] close client socket"),
 3015:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Client),
 3016:     ?P("[ctrl] sleep some"),
 3017:     ok = ct:sleep(1),
 3018: 
 3019:     ?P("[ctrl] verify"),
 3020:     lz_verify(Client, Server, PayloadSize),
 3021: 
 3022:     ?P("[ctrl] cleanup"), % Just in case
 3023:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Server)),
 3024:     if is_pid(Sender) -> exit(Sender, kill);
 3025:        true           -> ok
 3026:     end,
 3027: 
 3028:     ?P("[ctrl] done"),
 3029:     ok.
 3030: 
 3031: lz_pre(Config, Addr) ->
 3032:     {OS, _} = os:type(),
 3033:     ISB     = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 3034:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 3035:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip,              Addr},
 3036:                                   {active,          false},
 3037:                                   {recbuf,          4096},
 3038:                                   {show_econnreset, true}]),
 3039:     ?P("listen socket created"),
 3040:     %% inet_backend = inet
 3041:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 3042:     ?P("connect (create client socket)"),
 3043:     Client = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 3044:                            [{ip,      Addr},
 3045:                             {nodelay, true},
 3046:                             {active,  false},
 3047:                             {sndbuf,  4096}]) of
 3048:                  {ok, CSock} ->
 3049:                      CSock;
 3050:                  {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 3051:                      ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 3052:              end,
 3053:     ?P("accept"),
 3054:     {ok, Server} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 3055:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 3056:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 3057:     {OS, ISB, Client, Server}.
 3058: 
 3059: lz_populate(OS, _ISB, Client, PayloadSize) when is_port(Client) ->
 3060:     ?P("[inet] create payload"),
 3061:     Payload = lz_make_payload(PayloadSize),
 3062:     ?P("[inet] ensure non-empty queue"),
 3063:     lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Client, Payload, OS),
 3064:     {ok, undefined};
 3065: lz_populate(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize) ->
 3066:     ?P("[socket] send payload"),
 3067:     Sender = spawn_link(fun() ->
 3068: 				lz_populate_sender(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize)
 3069: 			end),
 3070:     receive
 3071:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} ->
 3072:             {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 3073:     after 2000 ->
 3074:             {ok, Sender}
 3075:     end.
 3076: 
 3077: lz_populate_sender(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize) ->
 3078:     ?P("[socket,~w,~w] create payload", [OS, ISB]),
 3079:     Payload = lz_make_payload(PayloadSize),
 3080:     if ((OS =:= win32) andalso ISB) ->
 3081: 	    ?P("[socket] send payload (expect one success and then failure)"),
 3082: 	    ok              = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3083: 	    {error, closed} = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3084: 	    ?P("[socket] payload send success + failure (as expected)"), 
 3085: 	    exit(normal);
 3086:        true ->
 3087: 	    ?P("[socket] send payload (expect failure)"),
 3088: 	    {error, closed} = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3089: 	    ?P("[socket] payload send failed (as expected)"), 
 3090: 	    exit(normal)
 3091:     end.
 3092: 
 3093: 
 3094: lz_verify(Client, Server, PayloadSize)
 3095:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 3096:     ?P("[inet] verify client socket (port) not connected"),
 3097:     undefined = erlang:port_info(Client, connected),
 3098:     ?P("[inet] try (and fail) recv (on accepted socket)"),
 3099:     {error, econnreset} = gen_tcp:recv(Server, PayloadSize),
 3100:     ok;
 3101: lz_verify(_Client, Server, PayloadSize) ->
 3102:     ?P("[socket] try (and fail) recv (on accepted socket)"),
 3103:     {error, econnreset} = gen_tcp:recv(Server, PayloadSize),
 3104:     ok.
 3105: 
 3106: lz_make_payload(PayloadSize) ->
 3107:     list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(PayloadSize, $.)).
 3108: 
 3109: %% THIS DOES NOT WORK FOR 'SOCKET'
 3110: lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Sock, Payload, OS) when is_port(Sock) ->
 3111:     lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Sock, Payload, OS, 1).
 3112: 
 3113: -define(LZ_MAX_SENDS, 3).
 3114: 
 3115: lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Sock, _Payload, _OS, N) when (N > ?LZ_MAX_SENDS) ->
 3116:     ?P("queue size verification failed - port info: "
 3117:        "~n   Socket:      ~p"
 3118:        "~n   Socket info: ~p", [Sock, erlang:port_info(Sock)]),
 3119:     ct:fail("Queue size verification failed");
 3120: lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Sock, Payload, OS, N) ->
 3121:     ?P("try send payload (~w bytes) ~w (on client socket) when port info:"
 3122:        "~n   ~p", [byte_size(Payload), N, erlang:port_info(Sock)]),
 3123:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, Payload),
 3124:     ?P("try verify client socket queue size"),
 3125:     case erlang:port_info(Sock, queue_size) of
 3126: 	{queue_size, QSz} when QSz > 0 ->
 3127:             ?P("queue size verification *successful* (~p) - port info: "
 3128:                "~n   ~p", [QSz, erlang:port_info(Sock)]),
 3129:             ok;
 3130: 	{queue_size, 0} when OS =:= win32 ->
 3131:             ?P("queue size verification *successful* - port info: "
 3132:                "~n   ~p", [erlang:port_info(Sock)]),
 3133:             ok;
 3134: 	{queue_size, 0} ->
 3135:             ?P("queue size verification failed - port info: "
 3136:                "~n   ~p", [erlang:port_info(Sock)]),
 3137:             lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Sock, Payload, OS, N+1)
 3138:     end.
 3139: 
 3140: 
 3141: linger_zero_sndbuf(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3142:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3143:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3144:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3145:                             Addr;
 3146:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3147:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3148:                     end
 3149:            end,
 3150:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_linger_zero_sndbuf(Config, Addr) end,
 3151:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3152:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3153: 
 3154: do_linger_zero_sndbuf(Config, Addr) ->
 3155:     %% All the econnreset tests will prove that {linger, {true, 0}} aborts
 3156:     %% a connection when the driver queue is empty. We will test here
 3157:     %% that it also works when the driver queue is not empty
 3158:     %% and the linger zero option is set on the listen socket.
 3159:     {OS, ISB, Client, Server} = lzs_pre(Config, Addr),
 3160: 
 3161:     PayloadSize = 1024 * 1024,
 3162:     {ok, Sender} = lzs_populate(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize),
 3163: 
 3164:     ?P("verify linger: {true, 0}"),
 3165:     {ok, [{linger, {true, 0}}]} = inet:getopts(Server, [linger]),
 3166:     ?P("close client socket"),
 3167:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server),
 3168:     ok = ct:sleep(1),
 3169: 
 3170:     lzs_verify(Client, Server, PayloadSize),
 3171: 
 3172:     ?P("cleanup"), % Just in case
 3173:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Server)),
 3174:     if is_pid(Sender) -> exit(Sender, kill);
 3175:        true           -> ok
 3176:     end,
 3177: 
 3178:     ?P("done"),
 3179:     ok.
 3180: 
 3181: lzs_pre(Config, Addr) ->
 3182:     {OS, _} = os:type(),
 3183:     ISB     = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 3184:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 3185:     {ok, Listen} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip,              Addr},
 3186:                                        {active,          false},
 3187:                                        {recbuf,          4096},
 3188:                                        {show_econnreset, true},
 3189:                                        {linger,          {true, 0}}]),
 3190:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(Listen),
 3191:     ?P("connect (create client socket)"),
 3192:     Client = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 3193:                            [{ip,      Addr},
 3194:                             {nodelay, true},
 3195:                             {active,  false},
 3196:                             {sndbuf,  4096}]) of
 3197:             {ok, CSock} ->
 3198:                 CSock;
 3199:             {error, eaddrnotavail = CReason} ->
 3200:                 ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(CReason))
 3201:         end,
 3202:     ?P("accept"),
 3203:     {ok, Server} = gen_tcp:accept(Listen),
 3204:     %% On *some* platforms, the linger is inherited,
 3205:     %% but not all so do not assume...
 3206:     ?P("check if linger option was inherited"),
 3207:     case inet:getopts(Server, [linger]) of
 3208: 	{ok, [{linger, {true, 0}}]} ->
 3209: 	    ?P("linger option was inherited"),
 3210: 	    ok;
 3211: 	{ok, [{linger, {true, TO}}]} ->
 3212: 	    ?P("linger option was *not* inherited: TRUE, ~p", [TO]),
 3213: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Server, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 3214: 	    ok;
 3215: 	{ok, [{linger, {false, TO}}]} ->
 3216: 	    ?P("linger option was *not* inherited: FALSE, ~p", [TO]),
 3217: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Server, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 3218: 	    ok;
 3219: 	{error, SReason} ->
 3220: 	    ?P("FAILED reading linger option: ~p", [SReason]),
 3221: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Server, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 3222: 	    ok
 3223:     end,
 3224:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 3225:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Listen),
 3226:     {OS, ISB, Client, Server}.
 3227: 
 3228: lzs_populate(OS, _ISB, Client, PayloadSize) when is_port(Client) ->
 3229:     ?P("[inet] create payload"),
 3230:     Payload = lzs_make_payload(PayloadSize),
 3231:     ?P("[inet] ensure non-empty queue"),
 3232:     lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Client, Payload, OS),
 3233:     {ok, undefined};
 3234: lzs_populate(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize) ->
 3235:     ?P("[socket] send payload ( = start payload sender)"),
 3236:     Sender = spawn(fun() ->
 3237: 			   lzs_populate_sender(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize)
 3238: 		   end),
 3239:     receive
 3240:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} ->
 3241:             {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 3242:     after 2000 ->
 3243:             {ok, Sender}
 3244:     end.
 3245: 
 3246: lzs_populate_sender(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize) ->
 3247:     ?P("[socket,~w,~w] create payload", [OS, ISB]),
 3248:     Payload = lzs_make_payload(PayloadSize),
 3249:     if ((OS =:= win32) andalso ISB) ->
 3250: 	    ?P("[socket] send payload (expect one success and then failure)"), 
 3251: 	    ok              = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3252: 	    {error, closed} = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3253: 	    ?P("[socket] payload send success + failure (as expected)"), 
 3254: 	    exit(normal);
 3255:        true ->
 3256: 	    ?P("[socket] send payload (expect failure)"), 
 3257: 	    {error, closed} = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3258: 	    ?P("[socket] payload send failed (as expected)"), 
 3259: 	    exit(normal)
 3260:     end.
 3261:     
 3262: lzs_make_payload(PayloadSize) ->
 3263:     Payload = binary:copy(<<"0123456789ABCDEF">>, 64 * 1024), % 1 MB
 3264:     if (PayloadSize =:= byte_size(Payload)) ->
 3265:             Payload;
 3266:        true ->
 3267:             exit({payload_size, PayloadSize, byte_size(Payload)})
 3268:     end.
 3269: 
 3270: lzs_verify(Client, Server, PayloadSize)
 3271:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 3272:     ?P("[inet] verify client socket (port) not connected"),
 3273:     undefined = erlang:port_info(Server, connected),
 3274:     ?P("[inet] try (and fail) recv (on accepted socket)"),
 3275:     {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(Client, PayloadSize),
 3276:     ok;
 3277: lzs_verify(Client, _Server, PayloadSize) ->
 3278:     ?P("[socket] try (and fail) recv (on accepted socket)"),
 3279:     {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(Client, PayloadSize),
 3280:     ok.
 3281:     
 3282: %% Thanks to Luke Gorrie. Tests for a very specific problem with 
 3283: %% corrupt data. The testcase will be killed by the timetrap timeout
 3284: %% if the bug is present.
 3285: http_bad_packet(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3286:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3287:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3288:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3289:                             Addr;
 3290:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3291:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3292:                     end
 3293:            end,
 3294:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_http_bad_packet(Config, Addr) end,
 3295:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3296:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3297: 
 3298: do_http_bad_packet(Config, Addr) ->
 3299:     {ok,L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip,        Addr},
 3300:                                  {active,    false},
 3301:                                  binary,
 3302:                                  {reuseaddr, true},
 3303:                                  {packet,    http}]),
 3304:     {ok,Port} = inet:port(L),
 3305:     spawn_link(fun() ->
 3306:                        erlang:yield(),
 3307:                        http_bad_client(Config, Addr, Port)
 3308:                end),
 3309:     case gen_tcp:accept(L) of
 3310:         {ok,S} ->
 3311:             http_worker(S);
 3312:         Err ->
 3313:             exit({accept,Err})
 3314:     end.
 3315: 
 3316: http_worker(S) ->
 3317:     case gen_tcp:recv(S, 0, 30000) of
 3318: 	{ok,{http_error,Error}} ->
 3319: 	     io:format("Http error: ~s\n", [Error]);
 3320: 	{ok,Data} ->
 3321: 	    io:format("Data: ~p\n", [Data]),
 3322: 	    http_worker(S)
 3323:     end.
 3324: 
 3325: http_bad_client(Config, Addr, Port) ->
 3326:     {ok,S} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 3327:                       [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}, binary]),
 3328:     ok = gen_tcp:send(S, "\r\n"),
 3329:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S).
 3330: 
 3331: 
 3332: %% Fill send queue and then start receiving.
 3333: %%
 3334: busy_send(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3335:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3336:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3337:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3338:                             Addr;
 3339:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3340:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3341:                     end
 3342:            end,
 3343:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_busy_send(Config, Addr) end,
 3344:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3345:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3346: 
 3347: do_busy_send(Config, Addr) ->
 3348:     OldFlag = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3349:     Master  = self(),
 3350:     Msg     = <<"the quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog~n">>,
 3351:     ?P("[master] start server"),
 3352:     ServerF =
 3353:         fun() ->
 3354:                 ?P("[server] create listen socket"),
 3355:                 case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary,
 3356:                                          {ip,        Addr},
 3357:                                          {active,    false},
 3358:                                          {reuseaddr, true},
 3359:                                          {packet,    0},
 3360:                                          {recbuf,    4096},
 3361:                                          {sndbuf,    4096}]) of
 3362:                     {ok, L} ->
 3363:                         ?P("[server] listen socket created"),
 3364:                         {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 3365:                         Master ! {self(), listen_port, Port},
 3366:                         ?P("[server] await continue"),
 3367:                         receive
 3368:                             {Master, continue} ->
 3369:                                 ?P("[server] received continue"),
 3370:                                 busy_send_srv(L, Master, Msg)
 3371:                         end;
 3372:                     {error, Reason} ->
 3373:                         ?P("[server] UNEXPECTED: ~w", [Reason]),
 3374:                         ?SKIPE(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 3375:                 end
 3376:         end,
 3377:     Server = spawn_link(ServerF),
 3378:     ?P("[master] server: ~p", [Server]),
 3379:     ListenPort =
 3380:         receive
 3381:             {'EXIT', Server, {skip, _} = SKIP} ->
 3382:                 ?P("[master] server issued skip: "
 3383:                    "~n      ~p", [SKIP]),
 3384:                 throw(SKIP);
 3385: 
 3386:             {'EXIT', Server, Reason} ->
 3387:                 ?P("[master] server crashed: "
 3388:                    "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 3389:                 exit({server, Reason});
 3390: 
 3391:             {Server, listen_port, LP} ->
 3392:                 ?P("listen port: ~p", [LP]),
 3393:                 LP
 3394:         end,
 3395:     ?P("[master] start client"),
 3396:     ClientF = 
 3397:       fun () ->
 3398:               ?P("[client] await (connect) server port"),
 3399:               Port =
 3400:                   receive
 3401:                       {Master, connect, P} ->
 3402:                           P
 3403:                   end,
 3404:               ?P("[client] connect to ~w", [Port]),
 3405: 	      case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 3406:                             [binary,
 3407:                              {ip,     Addr},
 3408:                              {active, false},
 3409:                              {packet, 0},
 3410:                              {recbuf, 4096},
 3411:                              {sndbuf, 4096}]) of
 3412:                   {ok, Socket} ->
 3413:                       Master ! {self(), connected},
 3414:                       ?P("[client] connected - await recv"),
 3415:                       receive
 3416:                           {Master, recv, N} ->
 3417:                               ?P("[client] received recv:~w", [N]),
 3418:                               busy_send_client_loop(Socket, Master, Msg, N)
 3419:                       end;
 3420:                   {error, eaddrnotavail = CReason} ->
 3421:                       ?P("[client] UNEXPECTED: ~w", [CReason]),
 3422:                       ?SKIPE(connect_failed_str(CReason))
 3423:               end
 3424:       end,
 3425:     Client = spawn_link(ClientF),
 3426:     ?P("[master] client: ~p", [Client]),
 3427:     Server ! {self(), continue},
 3428:     Client ! {self(), connect, ListenPort},
 3429:     receive
 3430:         {Client, connected} ->
 3431:             ?P("[master] client connected"),
 3432:             ok
 3433:     end,
 3434:     busy_send_loop(Server, Client, 0),
 3435:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFlag),
 3436:     ?P("[master] done"),
 3437:     ok.
 3438: 
 3439: busy_send_loop(Server, Client, N) ->
 3440:     %% Master
 3441:     %%
 3442:     receive
 3443:         {Server, send} ->
 3444:             busy_send_loop(Server, Client, N+1)
 3445: 
 3446:     after 2000 ->
 3447:             ?P("[master] send timeout: server send queue full (N = ~w+1)", [N]),
 3448:             %% Send queue full, sender blocked 
 3449:             %% -> stop sender and release client
 3450:             Server ! {self(), close},
 3451:             Client ! {self(), recv, N+1},
 3452:             ?P("[master] await server 'send'..."),
 3453:             receive
 3454:                 {Server, send} ->
 3455:                     busy_send_2(Server, Client, N+1)
 3456:             after 10000 ->
 3457:                     %% If this happens, see busy_send_srv
 3458:                     ?P("[master] UNEXPECTED: server send timeout"),
 3459:                     ct:fail({timeout,{server,not_send,flush([])}})
 3460:             end
 3461:     end.
 3462: 
 3463: busy_send_2(Server, Client, _N) ->
 3464:     %% Master
 3465:     %%
 3466:     ?P("[master] await (server) closed"),
 3467:     receive
 3468:         {Server, [closed]} ->
 3469:             ?P("[master] received expected (server) closed - "
 3470:                "await client closed"),
 3471:             receive
 3472:                 {Client, [0,{error,closed}]} ->
 3473:                     ?P("[master] received expected (client) closed"),
 3474:                     ok
 3475:             end
 3476:     after 10000 ->
 3477:             ?P("[master] UNEXPECTED: server closed timeout"),
 3478:             ct:fail({timeout, {server, not_closed, flush([])}})
 3479:     end.
 3480: 
 3481: busy_send_srv(L, Master, Msg) ->
 3482:     %% Server
 3483:     %% Sometimes this accept does not return, do not really know why
 3484:     %% but it causes the timeout error in busy_send_loop to be
 3485:     %% triggered. Only happens on OS X Leopard?!?
 3486:     ?P("[server] try accept"),
 3487:     case gen_tcp:accept(L) of
 3488:         {ok, Socket} ->
 3489:             ?P("[server] accepted"),
 3490:             busy_send_srv_loop(Socket, Master, Msg);
 3491:         {error, Reason} ->
 3492:             ?P("UNEXPECTED: server accept failure: ~p", [Reason]),
 3493:             ?SKIPE(accept_failed_str(Reason))
 3494:     end.
 3495: 
 3496: busy_send_srv_loop(Socket, Master, Msg) ->
 3497:     %% Server
 3498:     %%
 3499:     receive
 3500: 	{Master, close} ->
 3501:             ?P("[server] received close"),
 3502: 	    ok = gen_tcp:close(Socket),
 3503: 	    Master ! {self(),flush([closed])}
 3504:     after 0 ->
 3505: 	    ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket, Msg),
 3506: 	    Master ! {self(), send},
 3507: 	    busy_send_srv_loop(Socket, Master, Msg)
 3508:     end.
 3509: 
 3510: busy_send_client_loop(Socket, Master, Msg, N) ->
 3511:     %% Client
 3512:     %%
 3513:     Size = byte_size(Msg),
 3514:     case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, Size) of
 3515: 	{ok, Msg} ->
 3516: 	    busy_send_client_loop(Socket, Master, Msg, N-1);
 3517: 	Other ->
 3518:             ?P("[client] recv response: "
 3519:                "~n      ~p", [Other]),
 3520: 	    Master ! {self(), flush([Other,N])}
 3521:     end.
 3522: 
 3523: %%%
 3524: %%% Send to a socket whose other end does not read until the port gets busy.
 3525: %%% Then close the other end. The writer should get an {error,closed} error.
 3526: %%% (Passive mode.)
 3527: %%%
 3528: 
 3529: busy_disconnect_passive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3530:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3531:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3532:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3533:                             Addr;
 3534:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3535:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3536:                     end
 3537:            end,
 3538:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_busy_disconnect_passive(Config, Addr) end,
 3539:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3540:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3541: 
 3542: do_busy_disconnect_passive(Config, Addr) ->
 3543:     ?P("[passive] begin"),
 3544:     MuchoData = list_to_binary(ones(64*1024)),
 3545:     [do_busy_disconnect_passive2(Config, Addr, MuchoData, N) ||
 3546:         N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 3547:     ?P("[passive] done"),
 3548:     ok.
 3549: 
 3550: do_busy_disconnect_passive2(Config, Addr, MuchoData, N) ->
 3551:     ?P("[passive,~w] *** prepare server *** ", [N]),
 3552:     {_Server, S} = busy_disconnect_prepare_server(Config, Addr, [{active,false}]),
 3553:     ?P("[passive,~w] server prepared - start sending", [N]),
 3554:     {_OSFam, OSName} = os:type(),
 3555:     busy_disconnect_passive_send(S, MuchoData, OSName).
 3556: 
 3557: busy_disconnect_passive_send(S, Data, OS) ->
 3558:     case gen_tcp:send(S, Data) of
 3559: 	ok ->
 3560:             busy_disconnect_passive_send(S, Data, OS);
 3561: 	{error, closed} ->
 3562:             ok;
 3563: 	{error, eprototype = Reason} when (OS =:= darwin) ->
 3564: 	    ?P("send failed with ~w", [Reason]),
 3565:             ok
 3566:     end.
 3567: 
 3568: %%%
 3569: %%% Send to a socket whose other end does not read until the port gets busy.
 3570: %%% Then close the other end. The writer should get an {error,closed} error and
 3571: %%% a {tcp_closed,Socket} message. (Active mode.)
 3572: %%%
 3573: busy_disconnect_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3574:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3575:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3576:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3577:                             Addr;
 3578:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3579:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3580:                     end
 3581:            end,
 3582:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_busy_disconnect_active(Config, Addr) end,
 3583:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3584:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3585: 
 3586: do_busy_disconnect_active(Config, Addr) ->
 3587:     ?P("[active] begin"),
 3588:     MuchoData = list_to_binary(ones(64*1024)),
 3589:     [do_busy_disconnect_active2(Config, Addr, MuchoData, N) ||
 3590:         N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 3591:     ?P("[active] done"),
 3592:     ok.
 3593: 
 3594: do_busy_disconnect_active2(Config, Addr, MuchoData, N) ->
 3595:     ?P("[active,~w] *** prepare server *** ", [N]),
 3596:     {Server, S} = busy_disconnect_prepare_server(Config, Addr, [{active,true}]),
 3597:     ?P("[active,~w] server prepared - start sending", [N]),
 3598:     busy_disconnect_active_send(Server, S, MuchoData).
 3599: 
 3600: busy_disconnect_active_send(Server, S, Data) ->
 3601:     {_OSFam, OSName} = os:type(),
 3602:     busy_disconnect_active_send(Server, S, Data, 1, OSName).
 3603: 
 3604: busy_disconnect_active_send(Server, S, Data, Iter, OS) ->
 3605:     case gen_tcp:send(S, Data) of
 3606: 	ok ->
 3607:             busy_disconnect_active_send(Server, S, Data, Iter+1, OS);
 3608: 	{error, closed} ->
 3609:             ?P("[active-sender,~w] send failed with closed - await tcp-closed",
 3610: 	       [Iter]),
 3611:             busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S);
 3612: 
 3613: 	{error, eprototype = Reason} when (OS =:= darwin) ->
 3614:             ?P("[active-sender,~w] send failed with ~w - await tcp-closed",
 3615: 	       [Iter, Reason]),
 3616:             busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S);
 3617: 
 3618:         {error, einval = Reason} ->
 3619:             ?P("[active-sender,~w] UNEXPECTED send failure:"
 3620:                "~n   ~p", [Iter, Reason]),
 3621:             ?SKIPT(send_failed_str(Reason));
 3622: 
 3623:         {error, Reason} ->
 3624:             ?P("[active-sender,~w] UNEXPECTED send failure:"
 3625:                "~n   ~p", [Iter, Reason]),
 3626:             ct:fail({unexpected_send_result, Reason, Iter})
 3627:     end.
 3628: 
 3629: busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S) ->
 3630:     busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S, false, false).
 3631: busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S, Closed, Stopped) ->
 3632:     receive
 3633:         {tcp_closed, S} when (Stopped =:= true) ->
 3634:             ?P("[active-sender] received tcp-closed - done"),
 3635:             ok;
 3636: 
 3637:         {tcp_closed, S} ->
 3638:             ?P("[active-sender] received tcp-closed"),
 3639:             busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S, true, Stopped);
 3640: 
 3641:         {'EXIT', Server, normal} when (Closed =:= true) ->
 3642:             ?P("[active-sender] received server (normal) exit - done"),
 3643:             ok;
 3644: 
 3645:         {'EXIT', Server, normal} ->
 3646:             ?P("[active-sender] received server (normal) exit"),
 3647:             busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S, Closed, true);
 3648: 
 3649:         Other ->
 3650:             ?P("[active-sender] received UNEXPECTED message:"
 3651:                "~n   Expected tcp-close of ~p"
 3652:                "~n   Server:               ~p"
 3653:                "~n   Unexpected message:   ~p", [S, Server, Other]),
 3654:             ct:fail({unexpected, Other, S, flush([])})
 3655:     end.
 3656:     
 3657: 
 3658: busy_disconnect_prepare_server(Config, Addr, ConnectOpts) ->
 3659:     Sender = self(),
 3660:     ?P("[prep-server] create server"),
 3661:     Server = spawn_link(fun() ->
 3662:                                 busy_disconnect_server(Config, Addr, Sender)
 3663:                         end),
 3664:     ?P("[prep-server] await port (from server)"),
 3665:     receive {port, Server, Port} -> ok end,
 3666:     ?P("[prep-server] connect to ~w", [Port]),
 3667:     case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [{ip, Addr} | ConnectOpts]) of
 3668:         {ok, S} ->
 3669:             ?P("[prep-server] connected - order server start sending"),
 3670:             Server ! {Sender, sending},
 3671:             ?P("[prep-server] done"),
 3672:             {Server, S};
 3673:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 3674:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 3675:     end.
 3676: 
 3677: busy_disconnect_server(Config, Addr, Sender) ->
 3678:     ?P("[server] create listen socket"),
 3679:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0,
 3680:                       [binary,
 3681:                        {ip,        Addr},
 3682:                        {active,    false},
 3683:                        {reuseaddr, true},
 3684:                        {packet,    0}]),
 3685:     ?P("[server] created - get port number"),
 3686:     {ok,Port} = inet:port(L),
 3687:     ?P("[server] send port ~w (to sender)", [Port]),
 3688:     Sender ! {port,self(),Port},
 3689:     ?P("[server] try accept"),
 3690:     {ok,S} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 3691:     ?P("[server] connection accepted"),
 3692:     receive
 3693: 	{Sender, sending} ->
 3694:             ?P("[server] received sending (from sender)"),
 3695: 	    busy_disconnect_server_wait_for_busy(Sender, S)
 3696:     end.
 3697: 
 3698: %% Close the socket as soon as the Sender process can't send because of
 3699: %% a busy port.
 3700: busy_disconnect_server_wait_for_busy(Sender, S) ->
 3701:     case process_info(Sender, status) of
 3702: 	{status, waiting = Status} ->
 3703: 	    %% We KNOW that the sender will be in state 'waiting' only
 3704: 	    %% if the port has become busy. (Fallback solution if the
 3705: 	    %% implementation changes: Watch Sender's reduction count;
 3706: 	    %% when it stops changing, wait 2 seconds and then close.)
 3707: 	    ?P("[server] sender status ~p => close socket", [Status]),
 3708: 	    gen_tcp:close(S);
 3709: 	{status, Status} ->
 3710: 	    ?P("[server] sender status ~p", [Status]),
 3711: 	    timer:sleep(100),
 3712: 	    busy_disconnect_server_wait_for_busy(Sender, S);
 3713: 	Other ->
 3714: 	    ?P("[server] sender status ~p", [Other]),
 3715: 	    timer:sleep(100),
 3716: 	    busy_disconnect_server_wait_for_busy(Sender, S)
 3717:     end.
 3718: 
 3719: 
 3720: %%%
 3721: %%% Fill send queue
 3722: %%%
 3723: fill_sendq(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3724:     Cond = fun() ->
 3725: 		   is_windows() andalso ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) andalso
 3726: 		       skip("Unstable for 'socket on Windows'"),
 3727: 		   ok
 3728: 	   end,
 3729:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3730:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3731:                             Addr;
 3732:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3733:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3734:                     end
 3735:            end,
 3736:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_fill_sendq(Config, Addr) end,
 3737:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3738:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3739: 
 3740: do_fill_sendq(Config, Addr) ->
 3741:     OldFlag = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3742:     Master  = self(),
 3743:     ServerF =
 3744:         fun () ->
 3745:                 ?P("[server] try listen"),
 3746:                 case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr},
 3747:                                          {active,false},binary,
 3748:                                          {reuseaddr,true},{packet,0}]) of
 3749:                     {ok, L} ->
 3750:                         ?P("[server] try port"),
 3751:                         case inet:port(L) of
 3752:                             {ok, Port} ->
 3753:                                 Master ! {self(), listen_port, Port},
 3754:                                 fill_sendq_srv(L, Master);
 3755:                             {error, PReason} ->
 3756:                                 ?SKIPE(port_failed_str(PReason))
 3757:                         end;
 3758:                     {error, LReason} ->
 3759:                         ?SKIPE(listen_failed_str(LReason))
 3760:                 end
 3761:         end,
 3762:     Server  = spawn_link(ServerF),
 3763:     ?P("[master] server: ~p", [Server]),
 3764:     ClientF =
 3765:         fun () ->
 3766:                 ?P("[client] await server port"),
 3767:                 ServerPort =
 3768:                     receive
 3769:                         {Master, server_port, SP} ->
 3770:                             ?P("[client] server port: ~w", [SP]),
 3771:                             SP
 3772:                     end,
 3773:                 %% Just close on order
 3774:                 ?P("[client] try connect"),
 3775:                 case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, ServerPort,
 3776:                               [{ip, Addr}, {active,false},binary,{packet,0}]) of
 3777:                     {ok, S} ->
 3778:                         ?P("[client] connected"),
 3779:                         Master ! {self(), connected},
 3780:                         receive
 3781:                             {Master, close} ->
 3782:                                 ?P("[client] received close"),
 3783:                                 ok = gen_tcp:close(S)
 3784:                         end;
 3785:                     {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 3786:                         ?SKIPE(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 3787:                 end
 3788:         end,
 3789:     Client = spawn_link(ClientF),
 3790:     ?P("[master] client: ~p", [client]),
 3791:     ListenPort =
 3792:         receive
 3793:             {Server, listen_port, LP} ->
 3794:                 ?P("[master] listen port: ~w", [LP]),
 3795:                 LP
 3796:         end,
 3797:     Client ! {self(), server_port, ListenPort},
 3798:     ?P("[master] await client connected"),
 3799:     receive {Client, connected} -> ok end,
 3800:     ?P("[master] await reader"),
 3801:     Res = receive
 3802:               {Server, reader, Reader} ->
 3803:                   ?P("[master] reader: ~p", [Reader]),
 3804:                   fill_sendq_loop(Server, Client, Reader)
 3805:           end,
 3806:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFlag),    
 3807:     ?P("[master] done"),
 3808:     Res.
 3809: 
 3810: fill_sendq_loop(Server, Client, Reader) ->
 3811:     %% Master
 3812:     %%
 3813:     receive
 3814:         {Server, send} ->
 3815: 	    fill_sendq_loop(Server, Client, Reader)
 3816:     after 2000 ->
 3817: 	    %% Send queue full, sender blocked -> close client.
 3818: 	    ?P("[master] send timeout, closing client"),
 3819: 	    Client ! {self(), close},
 3820: 	    receive
 3821:                 {Server, [{error,closed}] = SErrors} ->
 3822:                     ?P("[master] got expected server closed"),
 3823:                     receive
 3824:                         {Reader, [{error,closed}]} ->
 3825:                             ?P("[master] got expected reader closed"),
 3826:                             ok;
 3827:                         {Reader, RErrors} when is_list(RErrors) ->
 3828:                             ct:fail([{server, SErrors}, {reader, RErrors}])
 3829:                     after 3000 ->
 3830:                             ct:fail({timeout,{closed,reader}})
 3831:                     end;
 3832: 
 3833:                 {Server, SErrors} when is_list(SErrors) ->
 3834:                     ?P("UNEXPECTED SERVER ERROR(S): "
 3835:                        "~n   ~p"
 3836:                        "~n   ~p", [SErrors, flush([])]),
 3837:                     ct:fail([{server, SErrors}, {reader, []}]);
 3838: 
 3839:                 {Reader, [{error,closed}] = RErrors} ->
 3840:                     ?P("[master] got expected reader closed"),
 3841:                     receive
 3842:                         {Server, [{error,closed}]} ->
 3843:                             ?P("[master] got expected server closed"),
 3844:                             ok;
 3845:                         {Server, SErrors} when is_list(SErrors) ->
 3846:                             ct:fail([{server, SErrors}, {reader, RErrors}])
 3847:                     after 3000 ->
 3848:                             ct:fail({timeout,{closed,server}})
 3849:                     end;
 3850: 
 3851:                 {Reader, RErrors} when is_list(RErrors) ->
 3852:                     ?P("UNEXPECTED READER ERROR(S): "
 3853:                        "~n   ~p"
 3854:                        "~n   ~p", [RErrors, flush([])]),
 3855:                     ct:fail([{server, []}, {reader, RErrors}])
 3856: 
 3857:             after 3000 ->
 3858:                     Msgs = flush([]),
 3859:                     ct:fail({timeout,{closed,[server,reader]}, Msgs})
 3860:             end
 3861:     end.
 3862: 
 3863: fill_sendq_srv(L, Master) ->
 3864:     %% Server
 3865:     %%
 3866:     ?P("[server] await accept"),
 3867:     case gen_tcp:accept(L) of
 3868: 	{ok, S} ->
 3869:             ?P("[server] accepted ~p", [S]),
 3870: 	    Master ! {self(), reader,
 3871: 		      spawn_link(fun () -> fill_sendq_read(S, Master) end)},
 3872: 	    Msg = "the quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog~n",
 3873: 	    fill_sendq_write(S, Master, [Msg,Msg,Msg,Msg,Msg,Msg,Msg,Msg]);
 3874: 	E ->
 3875:             Error = flush([E]),
 3876: 	    ?P("[server] accept error: ~p", [E]),
 3877: 	    Master ! {self(), Error}
 3878:     end.
 3879: 
 3880: fill_sendq_write(S, Master, Msg) ->
 3881:     %% Server
 3882:     %%
 3883:     %% ?P("[server,writer] sending..."),
 3884:     case gen_tcp:send(S, Msg) of
 3885: 	ok ->
 3886:             Master ! {self(), send},
 3887: 	    %% ?P("[server,writer] ok."),
 3888: 	    fill_sendq_write(S, Master, Msg);
 3889: 	{error, _} = E ->
 3890: 	    Error = flush([E]),
 3891: 	    ?P("[server,writer] send error: ~p", [Error]),
 3892: 	    Master ! {self(), Error}
 3893:     end.
 3894: 
 3895: fill_sendq_read(S, Master) ->
 3896:     %% Reader
 3897:     %%
 3898:     ?P("[server,reader] read infinity..."),
 3899:     case gen_tcp:recv(S, 0, infinity) of
 3900: 	{ok, Data} ->
 3901: 	    ?P("[server,reader] recv: ~p", [Data]),
 3902: 	    fill_sendq_read(S, Master);
 3903: 	E ->
 3904: 	    Error = flush([E]),
 3905: 	    ?P("[server,reader] recv error: ~p", [Error]),
 3906: 	    Master ! {self(), Error}
 3907:     end.
 3908: 
 3909: 
 3910: %%% Try to receive more than available number of bytes from 
 3911: %%% a closed socket.
 3912: %%%
 3913: partial_recv_and_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3914:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3915:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3916:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3917:                             Addr;
 3918:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3919:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3920:                     end
 3921:            end,
 3922:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_partial_recv_and_close(Config, Addr) end,
 3923:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3924:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3925: 
 3926: do_partial_recv_and_close(Config, Addr) ->
 3927:     Msg = "the quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog 0123456789\n",
 3928:     Len = length(Msg),
 3929:     {ok,L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 3930:     {ok,P} = inet:port(L),
 3931:     Sock =
 3932:         case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, P, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]) of
 3933:             {ok, S} ->
 3934:                 S;
 3935:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 3936:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 3937:     end,
 3938:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 3939:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, Msg),
 3940:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Sock),
 3941:     %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, true}]),
 3942:     case gen_tcp:recv(A, Len+1) of
 3943: 	{error, closed} ->
 3944: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3945: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3946: 	    ok;
 3947: 	{error, BadReason} ->
 3948: 	    ?P("unexpected failure (should be 'closed'): "
 3949: 	       "~n   ~p", [BadReason]),
 3950: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3951: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3952: 	    error;
 3953: 	{ok, Msg} ->
 3954: 	    ?P("unexpected success (with expected message): "
 3955: 	       "~n   ~p", [Msg]),
 3956: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3957: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3958: 	    error;
 3959: 	{ok, BadMsg} ->
 3960: 	    ?P("unexpected success (with unexpected message): "
 3961: 	       "~n   ~p", [BadMsg]),
 3962: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3963: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3964: 	    error
 3965:     end.
 3966: 
 3967: 
 3968: %%% Try to receive more than available number of bytes from 
 3969: %%% a closed socket, this time waiting in the recv before closing.
 3970: %%%
 3971: partial_recv_and_close_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3972:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3973:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3974:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3975:                             Addr;
 3976:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3977:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3978:                     end
 3979:            end,
 3980:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_partial_recv_and_close_2(Config, Addr) end,
 3981:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3982:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3983: 
 3984: do_partial_recv_and_close_2(Config, Addr) ->
 3985:     Msg = "the quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog 0123456789\n",
 3986:     Len = length(Msg),
 3987:     {ok,L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 3988:     {ok,P} = inet:port(L),
 3989:     Server = self(),
 3990:     Client =
 3991: 	spawn_link(
 3992: 	  fun () ->
 3993: 		  receive after 2000 -> ok end,
 3994: 		  case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, P, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]) of
 3995:                       {ok, S} ->
 3996:                           ok = gen_tcp:send(S, Msg),
 3997:                           receive {Server,close} -> ok end,
 3998:                           receive after 2000 -> ok end,
 3999:                           ok = gen_tcp:close(S);
 4000:                       {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4001:                           ?SKIPE(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 4002:                   end
 4003: 	  end),
 4004:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 4005:     Client ! {Server, close},
 4006:     %% {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(A, Len+1),
 4007:     %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, true}]),
 4008:     case gen_tcp:recv(A, Len+1) of
 4009: 	{error, closed} ->
 4010: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 4011: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 4012: 	    ok;
 4013: 	{error, BadReason} ->
 4014: 	    ?P("unexpected failure (should be 'closed'): "
 4015: 	       "~n   ~p", [BadReason]),
 4016: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 4017: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 4018: 	    error;
 4019: 	{ok, Msg} ->
 4020: 	    ?P("unexpected success (with 'expected' message): "
 4021: 	       "~n   ~p", [Msg]),
 4022: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 4023: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 4024: 	    error;
 4025: 	{ok, BadMsg} ->
 4026: 	    ?P("unexpected success (with *unexpected* message): "
 4027: 	       "~n   ~p", [BadMsg]),
 4028: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 4029: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 4030: 	    error
 4031:     end.
