 4033: %%% Here we tests that gen_tcp:recv/2 will return {error,closed} following
 4034: %%% a send operation of a huge amount data when the other end closed the socket.
 4035: %%%
 4036: partial_recv_and_close_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4037:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 4038:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 4039:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 4040:                             Addr;
 4041:                         {error, Reason} ->
 4042:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 4043:                     end
 4044:            end,
 4045:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_partial_recv_and_close_3(Config, Addr) end,
 4046:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 4047:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 4048: 
 4049: do_partial_recv_and_close_3(Config, Addr) ->
 4050:     [do_partial_recv_and_close_4(Config, Addr) || _ <- lists:seq(0, 20)],
 4051:     ok.
 4052: 
 4053: do_partial_recv_and_close_4(Config, Addr) ->
 4054:     Parent = self(),
 4055:     spawn_link(fun() ->
 4056: 		       {ok,L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0,
 4057:                                         [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 4058: 		       {ok, {_,Port}} = inet:sockname(L),
 4059: 		       Parent ! {port,Port},
 4060: 		       {ok,S} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 4061: 		       gen_tcp:recv(S, 1),
 4062: 		       gen_tcp:close(S)
 4063: 	       end),
 4064:     receive
 4065: 	{port,Port} -> ok
 4066:     end,
 4067:     Much = ones(8*64*1024),
 4068:     S = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [{ip, Addr}, {active, false}]) of
 4069:             {ok, Sock} ->
 4070:                 Sock;
 4071:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4072:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 4073:     end,
 4074: 
 4075:     %% Send a lot of data (most of it will be queued).
 4076:     %% The receiver will read one byte and close the connection.
 4077:     %% The write operation will fail.
 4078:     gen_tcp:send(S, Much),
 4079: 
 4080:     %% We should always get {error,closed} here.
 4081:     {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(S, 0).
 4082:

 4084: test_prio_put_get(Config, Addr) ->
 4085:     Tos = 3 bsl 5,
 4086:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> create listen socket"),
 4087:     {ok,L1} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 4088:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> set opts prio (= 3)"),
 4089:     ok = inet:setopts(L1,[{priority,3}]),
 4090:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> set opts tos (= ~p)", [Tos]),
 4091:     ok = inet:setopts(L1,[{tos,Tos}]),
 4092:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> verify opts prio and tos"),
 4093:     {ok,[{priority,3},{tos,Tos}]} = inet:getopts(L1,[priority,tos]),
 4094:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> set opts prio (= 3)"),
 4095:     ok = inet:setopts(L1,[{priority,3}]), % Dont destroy each other
 4096:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> verify opts prio and tos"),
 4097:     {ok,[{priority,3},{tos,Tos}]} = inet:getopts(L1,[priority,tos]),
 4098:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> set opts reuseaddr (= true)"),
 4099:     ok = inet:setopts(L1,[{reuseaddr,true}]), % Dont let others destroy
 4100:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> verify opts prio and tos"),
 4101:     {ok,[{priority,3},{tos,Tos}]} = inet:getopts(L1,[priority,tos]),
 4102:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> close listen socket"),
 4103:     gen_tcp:close(L1),
 4104:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> done"),
 4105:     ok.
 4106: 
 4107: test_prio_accept(Config, Addr) ->
 4108:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> create listen socket"),
 4109:     {ok, Sock} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary, {ip, Addr}, {packet,0},{active,false},
 4110:                                      {reuseaddr,true},{priority,4}]),
 4111:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> get port number of listen socket"),
 4112:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(Sock),
 4113:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> connect to port ~p", [Port]),
 4114:     Sock2 = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [binary,
 4115:                                                {ip, Addr},
 4116:                                                {packet,0},
 4117:                                                {active,false},
 4118:                                                {reuseaddr,true},
 4119:                                                {priority,4}]) of
 4120:                 {ok, S2} -> 
 4121:                     S2;
 4122:                 {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4123:                     ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 4124:             end,
 4125:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> connected => accept connection"),
 4126:     {ok, Sock3} = gen_tcp:accept(Sock),
 4127:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> accepted => getopts prio for listen socket"),
 4128:     {ok, [{priority,4}]} = inet:getopts(Sock,  [priority]),
 4129:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> getopts prio for connected socket"),
 4130:     {ok, [{priority,4}]} = inet:getopts(Sock2, [priority]),
 4131:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> getopts prio for accepted socket"),
 4132:     {ok, [{priority,4}]} = inet:getopts(Sock3, [priority]),
 4133:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> close listen socket"),
 4134:     gen_tcp:close(Sock),
 4135:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> close connected socket"),
 4136:     gen_tcp:close(Sock2),
 4137:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> close accepted socket"),
 4138:     gen_tcp:close(Sock3),
 4139:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> done"),
 4140:     ok.
 4141: 
 4142: test_prio_accept2(Config, Addr) ->
 4143:     Tos1 = 4 bsl 5,
 4144:     Tos2 = 3 bsl 5,
 4145:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> create listen socket"),
 4146:     {ok, Sock} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary, {ip, Addr}, {packet,0},{active,false},
 4147:                                     {reuseaddr,true},{priority,4},
 4148:                                     {tos,Tos1}]),
 4149:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> get port number of listen socket"),
 4150:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(Sock),
 4151:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> connect to port ~p", [Port]),
 4152:     Sock2 = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [binary,
 4153:                                                {ip, Addr},
 4154:                                                {packet,0},
 4155:                                                {active,false},
 4156:                                                {reuseaddr,true},
 4157:                                                {priority,4},
 4158:                                                {tos,Tos2}]) of
 4159:                 {ok, S2} ->
 4160:                     S2;
 4161:                 {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4162:                     ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 4163:             end,
 4164:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> connected => accept connection"),
 4165:     {ok, Sock3} = gen_tcp:accept(Sock),
 4166:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> accepted => getopts prio and tos for listen socket"),
 4167:     {ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos1}]} = inet:getopts(Sock,[priority,tos]),
 4168:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> getopts prio and tos for connected socket"),
 4169:     {ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos2}]} = inet:getopts(Sock2,[priority,tos]),
 4170:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> getopts prio and tos for accepted socket"),
 4171:     {ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos1}]} = inet:getopts(Sock3,[priority,tos]),
 4172:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> close listen socket"),
 4173:     gen_tcp:close(Sock),
 4174:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> close connected socket"),
 4175:     gen_tcp:close(Sock2),
 4176:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> close accepted socket"),
 4177:     gen_tcp:close(Sock3),
 4178:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> done"),
 4179:     ok.
 4180: 
 4181: test_prio_accept3(Config, Addr) ->
 4182:     Tos1 = 4 bsl 5,
 4183:     Tos2 = 3 bsl 5,
 4184:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> create listen socket"),
 4185:     {ok, Sock} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0,[binary,{ip, Addr},{packet,0},{active,false},
 4186:                                     {reuseaddr,true},
 4187:                                     {tos,Tos1}]),
 4188:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> get port number of listen socket"),
 4189:     {ok,Port} = inet:port(Sock),
 4190:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> connect to port ~p", [Port]),
 4191:     Sock2 = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [binary,
 4192:                                                {ip, Addr},
 4193:                                                {packet,0},
 4194:                                                {active,false},
 4195:                                                {reuseaddr,true},
 4196:                                                {tos,Tos2}]) of
 4197:                 {ok, S2} ->
 4198:                     S2;
 4199:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4200:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 4201:     end,
 4202:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> connected => accept connection"),
 4203:     {ok, Sock3} = gen_tcp:accept(Sock),
 4204:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> "
 4205:        "accepted => getopts prio and tos for listen socket"),
 4206:     {ok, [{priority,0},{tos,Tos1}]} = inet:getopts(Sock,  [priority,tos]),
 4207:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> getopts prio and tos for connected socket"),
 4208:     {ok, [{priority,0},{tos,Tos2}]} = inet:getopts(Sock2, [priority,tos]),
 4209:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> getopts prio and tos for accepted socket"),
 4210:     {ok, [{priority,0},{tos,Tos1}]} = inet:getopts(Sock3, [priority,tos]),
 4211:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> close listen socket"),
 4212:     gen_tcp:close(Sock),
 4213:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> close connected socket"),
 4214:     gen_tcp:close(Sock2),
 4215:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> close accepted socket"),
 4216:     gen_tcp:close(Sock3),
 4217:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> done"),
 4218:     ok.
 4219:     
 4220: test_prio_accept_async(Config, Addr) ->
 4221:     Tos1 = 4 bsl 5,
 4222:     Tos2 = 3 bsl 5,
 4223:     Ref = make_ref(),
 4224:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> create prio server"),
 4225:     spawn(?MODULE, priority_server, [Config, Addr, {self(),Ref}]),
 4226:     Port = receive
 4227:                {Ref,P} -> P
 4228:            after 5000 -> ct:fail({error,"helper process timeout"})
 4229:            end,
 4230:     receive
 4231:     after 3000 -> ok
 4232:     end,
 4233:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> connect to port ~p", [Port]),
 4234:     Sock2 = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [binary,
 4235: 					      {ip, Addr},
 4236: 					      {packet,0},
 4237:                                               {active,false},
 4238:                                               {reuseaddr,true},
 4239:                                               {priority,4},
 4240:                                               {tos,Tos2}]) of
 4241:                 {ok, S2} ->
 4242:                     S2;
 4243:                 {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4244:                     ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 4245:             end,
 4246:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> "
 4247:        "connected => await prio and tos for listen socket"),
 4248:     receive
 4249:         {Ref,{ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos1}]}} ->
 4250:             ok;
 4251:         {Ref,Error} ->
 4252:             ct:fail({mismatch,Error})
 4253:     after 5000 -> ct:fail({error,"helper process timeout"})
 4254:     end,
 4255:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> await prio and tos for accepted socket"),
 4256:     receive
 4257:         {Ref,{ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos1}]}} ->
 4258:             ok;
 4259:         {Ref,Error2} ->
 4260:             ct:fail({mismatch,Error2})
 4261:     after 5000 -> ct:fail({error,"helper process timeout"})
 4262:     end,
 4263: 
 4264:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> getopts prio and tos for connected socket"),
 4265:     {ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos2}]} = inet:getopts(Sock2, [priority,tos]),
 4266:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> close connected socket"),
 4267:     catch gen_tcp:close(Sock2),
 4268:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> done"),
 4269:     ok.
 4270: 
 4271: priority_server(Config, Addr, {Parent,Ref}) ->
 4272:     Tos1 = 4 bsl 5,
 4273:     {ok,Sock}=?LISTEN(Config, 0,[binary, {ip, Addr}, {packet,0},{active,false},
 4274:                                 {reuseaddr,true},{priority,4},
 4275:                                 {tos,Tos1}]),
 4276:     {ok,Port} = inet:port(Sock),
 4277:     Parent ! {Ref,Port},
 4278:     {ok,Sock3}=gen_tcp:accept(Sock),
 4279:     Parent ! {Ref, inet:getopts(Sock,[priority,tos])},
 4280:     Parent ! {Ref, inet:getopts(Sock3,[priority,tos])},
 4281:     ok.
 4282: 
 4283: test_prio_fail(Config, Addr) ->
 4284:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> create listen socket"),
 4285:     {ok,L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 4286:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> try set (and fail) opts prio (= 1000)"),
 4287:     {error,_} = inet:setopts(L,[{priority,1000}]),
 4288:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> close listen socket"),
 4289:     gen_tcp:close(L),
 4290:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> done"),
 4291:     ok.
 4292: 
 4293: test_prio_udp(Addr) ->
 4294:     Tos = 3 bsl 5,
 4295:     ?P("test_prio_udp -> create UDP socket (open)"),
 4296:     {ok,S} = gen_udp:open(0,[{ip, Addr}, {active,false},binary,{tos, Tos},
 4297:                              {priority,3}]),
 4298:     ?P("test_prio_udp -> getopts prio and tos"),
 4299:     {ok,[{priority,3},{tos,Tos}]} = inet:getopts(S,[priority,tos]),
 4300:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> close socket"),
 4301:     gen_udp:close(S),
 4302:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> done"),
 4303:     ok.
 4304: 
 4305: %% Tests the so_priority and ip_tos options on sockets when applicable.
 4306: so_priority(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4307:     Cond = fun() ->
 4308: 		   case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 4309: 		       true ->
 4310: 		           is_socket_supported(),
 4311:                            has_support_sock_priority();
 4312: 		       false ->
 4313: 			   ok
 4314: 		   end
 4315:     	 end,
 4316:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 4317:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 4318:                             Addr;
 4319:                         {error, Reason} ->
 4320:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 4321:                     end
 4322:            end,
 4323:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_so_priority(Config, Addr) end,
 4324:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 4325:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 4326: 
 4327: do_so_priority(Config, Addr) ->
 4328:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 4329:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 4330:     ?P("set opts on listen socket: prio to 1"),
 4331:     ok = inet:setopts(L,[{priority,1}]),
 4332:     ?P("verify prio"),
 4333:     case inet:getopts(L,[priority]) of
 4334: 	{ok,[{priority,1}]} ->
 4335:             ?P("close listen socket"),
 4336: 	    gen_tcp:close(L),
 4337: 	    test_prio_put_get(Config, Addr),
 4338: 	    test_prio_accept(Config, Addr),
 4339: 	    test_prio_accept2(Config, Addr),
 4340: 	    test_prio_accept3(Config, Addr),
 4341: 	    test_prio_accept_async(Config, Addr),
 4342: 	    test_prio_fail(Config, Addr),
 4343: 	    test_prio_udp(Addr),
 4344:             ?P("done"),
 4345: 	    ok;
 4346: 	_X ->
 4347: 	    case os:type() of
 4348: 		{unix,linux} ->
 4349: 		    case os:version() of
 4350: 			{X,Y,_} when (X > 2) or ((X =:= 2) and (Y >= 4)) ->
 4351:                             ?P("so prio should work on this version: "
 4352:                                "~n      ~p", [_X]),
 4353: 			    ct:fail({error,
 4354: 					   "so_priority should work on this "
 4355: 					   "OS, but does not"});
 4356: 			_ ->
 4357: 			    {skip, "SO_PRIORITY not suppoorted"}
 4358: 		    end;
 4359: 		_ ->
 4360: 		   {skip, "SO_PRIORITY not suppoorted"}
 4361: 	    end
 4362:     end.
 4363: 
 4364: 
 4365: 
 4366: %% IP_RECVTOS and IP_RECVTCLASS for IP_PKTOPTIONS
 4367: %% does not seem to be implemented in Linux until kernel 3.1
 4368: %%
 4369: %% It seems pktoptions does not return valid values
 4370: %% for IPv4 connect sockets.  On the accept socket
 4371: %% we get valid values, but on the connect socket we get
 4372: %% the default values for TOS and TTL.
 4373: %%
 4374: %% Therefore the argument CheckConnect that enables
 4375: %% checking the returned values for the connect socket.
 4376: %% It is only used for recvtclass that is an IPv6 option
 4377: %% and there we get valid values from both socket ends.
 4378: 
 4379: has_support_ip_pktoptions() ->
 4380:     has_support_ip_option(pktoptions).
 4381: 
 4382: has_support_ip_recvtos() ->
 4383:     has_support_ip_option(recvtos).
 4384: 
 4385: has_support_ip_recvttl() ->
 4386:     has_support_ip_option(recvttl).
 4387: 
 4388: has_support_ipv6_pktoptions() ->
 4389:     has_support_ipv6_option(pktoptions).
 4390: 
 4391: has_support_ipv6_tclass() ->
 4392:     has_support_ipv6_option(tclass).
 4393: 
 4394: has_support_ip_option(Opt) ->
 4395:     has_support_option(ip, Opt).
 4396: 
 4397: has_support_ipv6_option(Opt) ->
 4398:     has_support_option(ipv6, Opt).
 4399: 
 4400: has_support_option(Level, Option) ->
 4401:     try socket:is_supported(options, Level, Option)
 4402:     catch
 4403: 	_:_:_ -> false % Any platform that does not support socket!
 4404:     end.
 4405: 
 4406: has_os_support_recvtos() ->
 4407:     has_os_support_recvtos(os:type(), os:version()).
 4408: 
 4409: has_os_support_recvtos({unix, linux}, Version) ->
 4410:     not semver_lt(Version, {3,1,0});
 4411: has_os_support_recvtos(_, _) ->
 4412:     true.
 4413: 
 4414: has_os_support_recvttl() ->
 4415:     has_os_support_recvttl(os:type(), os:version()).
 4416: 
 4417: has_os_support_recvttl({unix, linux}, Version) ->
 4418:     not semver_lt(Version, {2,7,0});
 4419: has_os_support_recvttl(_, _) ->
 4420:     %% We should not even get here, but just in case...
 4421:     false.
 4422: 
 4423: has_os_support_recvtclass() ->
 4424:     has_os_support_recvtclass(os:type(), os:version()).
 4425: 
 4426: has_os_support_recvtclass({unix, linux}, Version) ->
 4427:     not semver_lt(Version, {3,1,0});
 4428: has_os_support_recvtclass(_, _) ->
 4429:     true.
 4430: 
 4431: semver_lt({X1,Y1,Z1} = V1, {X2,Y2,Z2} = V2) ->
 4432:     ?P("semver_lt -> OS version check:"
 4433:        "~n   (Actual)  Version 1: ~p"
 4434:        "~n   (Request) Version 2: ~p", [V1, V2]),
 4435:     if
 4436:         X1 > X2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> X1 > X2: ~p > ~p", [X1, X2]), false;
 4437:         X1 < X2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> X1 < X2: ~p < ~p", [X1, X2]), true;
 4438:         Y1 > Y2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> Y1 > Y2: ~p > ~p", [Y1, Y2]), false;
 4439:         Y1 < Y2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> Y1 < Y2: ~p < ~p", [Y1, Y2]), true;
 4440:         Z1 > Z2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> Z1 > Z2: ~p > ~p", [Z1, Z2]), false;
 4441:         Z1 < Z2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> Z1 < Z2: ~p < ~p", [Z1, Z2]), true;
 4442:         true    -> ?P("semver_lt -> default"), false
 4443:     end;
 4444: semver_lt(V1, {_,_,_} = V2) ->
 4445:     ?P("semver_lt -> fallback OS version check when: "
 4446:        "~n   Version 1: ~p"
 4447:        "~n   Version 2: ~p", [V1, V2]),
 4448:     false.
 4449: 
 4450: recvtos(Config) ->
 4451:     test_pktoptions(
 4452:       Config,
 4453:       inet, [{recvtos,tos,96}],
 4454:       fun() ->
 4455:               has_support_ip_recvtos() andalso
 4456:                   has_os_support_recvtos() 
 4457:      end,
 4458:       "recvtos",
 4459:       false).
 4460: 
 4461: recvtosttl(Config) ->
 4462:     test_pktoptions(
 4463:       Config,
 4464:       inet, [{recvtos,tos,96},{recvttl,ttl,33}],
 4465:       fun() ->
 4466:               has_support_ip_recvtos() andalso
 4467: 		  has_support_ip_recvttl() andalso
 4468:                   has_os_support_recvtos() andalso
 4469:                   has_os_support_recvttl()
 4470:       end,
 4471:       "recvtos and/or recvttl",
 4472:       false).
 4473: 
 4474: recvttl(Config) ->
 4475:     test_pktoptions(
 4476:       Config,
 4477:       inet, [{recvttl,ttl,33}],
 4478:       fun() ->
 4479:               has_support_ip_recvttl() andalso
 4480:                   has_os_support_recvttl()
 4481:       end,
 4482:       "recvttl",
 4483:       false).
 4484: 
 4485: recvtclass(Config) ->
 4486:     {ok,IFs} = inet:getifaddrs(),
 4487:     case
 4488:         [Name ||
 4489:             {Name,Opts} <- IFs,
 4490:             lists:member({addr,{0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1}}, Opts)]
 4491:     of
 4492:         [_] ->
 4493:             test_pktoptions(
 4494:               Config,
 4495:               inet6, [{recvtclass,tclass,224}],
 4496:               fun() ->
 4497:                       has_support_ipv6_tclass() andalso
 4498:                           has_os_support_recvtclass()
 4499:               end,
 4500:               "tclass",
 4501:               true);
 4502:         [] ->
 4503:             {skip,{ipv6_not_supported,IFs}}
 4504:     end.
 4505: 
 4506: test_pktoptions(Config, Family, Spec, OptCond, OptStr, CheckConnect) ->
 4507:     ?P("test_pktoptions -> begin test with"
 4508:        "~n   Config:       ~p"
 4509:        "~n   Family:       ~p"
 4510:        "~n   Spec:         ~p"
 4511:        "~n   CheckConnect: ~p",
 4512:        [Config, Family, Spec, CheckConnect]),
 4513:     PktOptsCond = fun(inet)  -> has_support_ip_pktoptions();
 4514: 		     (inet6) -> has_support_ipv6_pktoptions()
 4515: 		  end,
 4516:     try PktOptsCond(Family) of
 4517: 	true ->
 4518: 	    ?P("pktoptions supported for family ~w", [Family]),
 4519: 	    case OptCond() of
 4520: 		true ->
 4521: 		    ?P("options supported: "
 4522: 		       "~n   ~p", [Spec]),
 4523: 		    test_pktoptions(Config, Family, Spec, CheckConnect);
 4524: 		false ->
 4525: 		    {skip, ?F("Option(s) ~s not supported", [OptStr])}
 4526: 	    end;
 4527:         false ->
 4528:             {skip,
 4529:              ?F("Option 'pktoptions' not supported for family ~w", [Family])}
 4530:     catch
 4531:         _:_:_ ->
 4532:             {skip,
 4533:              ?F("Option 'pktoptions' not supported for family ~w", [Family])}
 4534:     end.
 4535: %%
 4536: test_pktoptions(Config, Family, Spec, CheckConnect) ->
 4537:     ?P("test_pktoptions -> begin test with"
 4538:        "~n   Config:       ~p"
 4539:        "~n   Family:       ~p"
 4540:        "~n   Spec:         ~p"
 4541:        "~n   CheckConnect: ~p",
 4542:        [Config, Family, Spec, CheckConnect]),
 4543:     Timeout = 5000,
 4544:     RecvOpts = [RecvOpt || {RecvOpt,_,_} <- Spec],
 4545:     TrueRecvOpts = [{RecvOpt,true} || {RecvOpt,_,_} <- Spec],
 4546:     FalseRecvOpts = [{RecvOpt,false} || {RecvOpt,_,_} <- Spec],
 4547:     Opts = [Opt || {_,Opt,_} <- Spec],
 4548:     OptsVals = [{Opt,Val} || {_,Opt,Val} <- Spec],
 4549:     Address =
 4550:         case Family of
 4551:             inet ->
 4552:                 {127,0,0,1};
 4553:             inet6 ->
 4554:                 {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1}
 4555:         end,
 4556:     %%
 4557:     %% Set RecvOpts on listen socket
 4558:     ?P("try create listen socket with: ~p", [TrueRecvOpts]),
 4559:     {ok, L} =
 4560:         ?LISTEN(Config, 
 4561:                 0,
 4562:                 [Family,binary,{active,false},{send_timeout,Timeout}
 4563:                  |TrueRecvOpts]),
 4564:     {ok, P} = inet:port(L),
 4565:     ?P("get (recv) options for listen socket: "
 4566:        "~n   ~p", [RecvOpts]),
 4567:     {ok, TrueRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(L, RecvOpts),
 4568:     ?P("get options for listen socket: "
 4569:        "~n   ~p", [Opts]),
 4570:     {ok, OptsValsDefault} = inet:getopts(L, Opts),
 4571: 
 4572:     %%
 4573:     %% Set RecvOpts and Option values on connect socket
 4574:     ?P("create connect socket with"
 4575:        "~n   ~p", [TrueRecvOpts ++ OptsVals]),
 4576:     {ok, S2} =
 4577:         ?CONNECT(Config,
 4578:                  Address, P,
 4579:                  [Family,binary,{active,false},{send_timeout,Timeout}
 4580:                   |TrueRecvOpts ++ OptsVals],
 4581:                  Timeout),
 4582:     ?P("get (recv) options for connect socket: "
 4583:        "~n   ~p", [RecvOpts]),
 4584:     {ok, TrueRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(S2, RecvOpts),
 4585:     ?P("get options for connect socket: "
 4586:        "~n   ~p", [Opts]),
 4587:     {ok, OptsVals} = inet:getopts(S2, Opts),
 4588: 
 4589:     %%
 4590:     %% Accept socket inherits the options from listen socket
 4591:     ?P("try create accept socket"),
 4592:     {ok, S1} = gen_tcp:accept(L, Timeout),
 4593:     ?P("get (recv) options for accept socket: "
 4594:        "~n   ~p", [RecvOpts]),
 4595:     {ok, TrueRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(S1, RecvOpts),
 4596: 
 4597:     ?P("get options for accept socket: "
 4598:        "~n   ~p", [Opts]),
 4599:     {ok, OptsValsDefault} = inet:getopts(S1, Opts),
 4600:     ?P("accept socket option values: "
 4601:        "~n   ~p", [OptsValsDefault]),
 4602: 
 4603: %%%    %%
 4604: %%%    %% Handshake
 4605: %%%    ok = gen_tcp:send(S1, <<"hello">>),
 4606: %%%    {ok,<<"hello">>} = gen_tcp:recv(S2, 5, Timeout),
 4607: %%%    ok = gen_tcp:send(S2, <<"hi">>),
 4608: %%%    {ok,<<"hi">>} = gen_tcp:recv(S1, 2, Timeout),
 4609: 
 4610:     %%
 4611:     %% Verify returned remote options
 4612:     VerifyRemOpts =
 4613:         fun(S, Role) ->
 4614:                 case inet:getopts(S, [pktoptions]) of
 4615:                     {ok, []} ->
 4616:                         ?SKIPT("pktoptions not supported");
 4617:                     {ok, [{pktoptions, PktOpts1}]} ->
 4618:                         ?P("PktOptions (~w): "
 4619:                            "~n      ~p", [Role, PktOpts1]),
 4620:                         PktOpts1;
 4621:                     {ok, UnexpOK1} ->
 4622:                         ?P("Unexpected OK (~w): "
 4623:                            "~n   ~p"
 4624:                            "~n", [Role, UnexpOK1]),
 4625:                         exit({unexpected_getopts_ok,
 4626:                               Role,
 4627:                               Spec,
 4628:                               TrueRecvOpts,
 4629:                               OptsVals,
 4630:                               OptsValsDefault,
 4631:                               UnexpOK1});
 4632:                     {error, UnexpERR1} ->
 4633:                         ?P("Unexpected ERROR (~w): "
 4634:                            "~n   ~p"
 4635:                            "~n", [Role, UnexpERR1]),
 4636:                         exit({unexpected_getopts_failure,
 4637:                               Role,
 4638:                               Spec,
 4639:                               TrueRecvOpts,
 4640:                               OptsVals,
 4641:                               OptsValsDefault,
 4642:                               UnexpERR1})
 4643:                 end
 4644:         end,
 4645:     ?P("verify dest (accept)"),
 4646:     OptsVals1 = VerifyRemOpts(S1, dest),
 4647:     ?P("verify orig (connect)"),
 4648:     OptsVals2 = VerifyRemOpts(S2, orig),
 4649:     %% {ok,[{pktoptions,OptsVals1}]} = inet:getopts(S1, [pktoptions]),
 4650:     %% {ok,[{pktoptions,OptsVals2}]} = inet:getopts(S2, [pktoptions]),
 4651:     (Result1 = sets_eq(OptsVals1, OptsVals))
 4652:         orelse ?P("Accept differs: ~p neq ~p", [OptsVals1,OptsVals]),
 4653:     (Result2 = sets_eq(OptsVals2, OptsValsDefault))
 4654:         orelse ?P("Connect differs: ~p neq ~p",
 4655:                   [OptsVals2, OptsValsDefault]),
 4656:     %%
 4657:     ?P("close connect socket"),
 4658:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S2),
 4659:     ?P("close accept socket"),
 4660:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S1),
 4661:     %%
 4662:     %%
 4663:     %% Clear RecvOpts on listen socket and set Option values
 4664:     ?P("clear (recv) options on listen socket"),
 4665:     ok = inet:setopts(L, FalseRecvOpts ++ OptsVals),
 4666:     {ok,FalseRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(L, RecvOpts),
 4667:     ?P("set  options on listen socket"),
 4668:     {ok,OptsVals} = inet:getopts(L, Opts),
 4669: 
 4670:     %%
 4671:     %% Set RecvOpts on connecting socket
 4672:     %%
 4673:     ?P("create connect socket with"
 4674:        "~n   ~p", [TrueRecvOpts]),
 4675:     {ok,S4} =
 4676:         ?CONNECT(Config, 
 4677:           Address, P,
 4678:           [Family,binary,{active,false},{send_timeout,Timeout}
 4679:           |TrueRecvOpts],
 4680:           Timeout),
 4681:     ?P("get (recv) options on connect socket"),
 4682:     {ok,TrueRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(S4, RecvOpts),
 4683:     ?P("get options on connect socket"),
 4684:     {ok,OptsValsDefault} = inet:getopts(S4, Opts),
 4685: 
 4686:     %%
 4687:     %% Accept socket inherits the options from listen socket
 4688:     ?P("create accept socket"),
 4689:     {ok,S3} = gen_tcp:accept(L, Timeout),
 4690:     ?P("get (recv) options on accept socket"),
 4691:     {ok,FalseRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(S3, RecvOpts),
 4692:     {ok,OptsVals} = inet:getopts(S3, Opts),
 4693:     %%
 4694:     %% Verify returned remote options
 4695:     ?P("verify pktoptions on accept socket"),
 4696:     {ok,[{pktoptions,[]}]} = inet:getopts(S3, [pktoptions]),
 4697:     ?P("verify pktoptions on connect socket"),
 4698:     {ok,[{pktoptions,OptsVals4}]} = inet:getopts(S4, [pktoptions]),
 4699:     ?P("verify options set"),
 4700:     (Result3 = sets_eq(OptsVals4, OptsVals))
 4701:         orelse ?P("Accept2 differs: ~p neq ~p", [OptsVals4, OptsVals]),
 4702:     %%
 4703:     ?P("close connect socket"),
 4704:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S4),
 4705:     ?P("close accept socket"),
 4706:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S3),
 4707:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 4708:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 4709:     ?P("verify final result"
 4710:        "~n   Result1:       ~p"
 4711:        "~n   Check Connect: ~p"
 4712:        "~n   Result2:       ~p"
 4713:        "~n   Result3:       ~p",
 4714:       [Result1, CheckConnect, Result2, Result3]),
 4715:     (Result1 and ((not CheckConnect) or (Result2 and Result3)))
 4716:         orelse
 4717:         exit({failed,
 4718:               [{OptsVals1,OptsVals4,OptsVals},
 4719:                {OptsVals2,OptsValsDefault}]}),
 4720:     ?P("done"),
 4721:     ok.
 4722: 
 4723: sets_eq(L1, L2) ->
 4724:     lists:sort(L1) == lists:sort(L2).
 4725: 
 4726: 
 4727: 
 4728: %% Accept test utilities (suites are below)
 4729: 
 4730: millis() ->
 4731:     erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond).
 4732: 	
 4733: collect_accepts(0, _) -> [];
 4734: collect_accepts(N, Tmo) ->
 4735:     A = millis(),
 4736:     receive
 4737: 	{accepted, P, {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason}} ->
 4738:             ?P("~p Failed accept: ~p", [P, Reason]),
 4739:             ?SKIPT(accept_failed_str(Reason));
 4740: 
 4741:         {accepted, P, Msg} ->
 4742:             ?P("received 'accepted' from ~p: "
 4743:                "~n      ~p", [P, Msg]),
 4744:             NextN = if N =:= infinity -> N; true -> N - 1 end,
 4745: 	    [{P,Msg}] ++ collect_accepts(NextN, Tmo - (millis()-A))
 4746: 
 4747:     after Tmo ->
 4748:             ?P("accept timeout (~w)", [Tmo]),
 4749: 	    []
 4750:     end.
 4751: 
 4752: -define(EXPECT_ACCEPTS(Pattern,N,Timeout),
 4753: 	(fun() ->
 4754:                  case collect_accepts((N), (Timeout)) of
 4755: 		     Pattern ->
 4756: 			 ok;
 4757: 		     Other__ ->
 4758: 			 {error, {unexpected, {Other__, messages()}}}
 4759: 		 end
 4760: 	 end)()).
 4761: 	
 4762: collect_connects(Tmo) ->
 4763:     A = millis(),
 4764:     receive
 4765: 	{connected, P, {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason}} ->
 4766:             ?P("~p Failed connect: ~p", [P, Reason]),
 4767:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason));
 4768: 
 4769: 	{connected,P,Msg} ->
 4770:             ?P("received connected from ~p: "
 4771:                "~n      ~p", [P, Msg]),
 4772: 	    [{P,Msg}] ++ collect_connects(Tmo-(millis() - A))
 4773: 
 4774:     after Tmo ->
 4775: 	    []
 4776:     end.
 4777:    
 4778: -define(EXPECT_CONNECTS(Pattern,Timeout),
 4779: 	(fun() ->
 4780: 		 case collect_connects(Timeout) of
 4781: 		     Pattern ->
 4782: 			 ok;
 4783: 		     Other ->
 4784: 			 {error,{unexpected,Other}}
 4785: 		 end
 4786: 	 end)()).
 4787: 
 4788: mktmofun(Tmo,Parent,LS) ->
 4789:     fun() ->
 4790:             ?P("[acceptor] mktmofun:fun -> try accept"),
 4791:             AcceptResult = catch gen_tcp:accept(LS, Tmo),            
 4792:             ?P("[acceptor] mktmofun:fun -> accepted: "
 4793:                "~n   ~p", [AcceptResult]),
 4794:             Parent ! {accepted,self(), AcceptResult}
 4795:     end.
 4796: 
 4797: %% Accept tests
 4798: %% Test singular accept.
 4799: primitive_accept(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4800:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 4801:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 4802:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 4803:                             Addr;
 4804:                         {error, Reason} ->
 4805:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 4806:                     end
 4807:            end,
 4808:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_primitive_accept(Config, Addr) end,
 4809:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 4810:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 4811: 
 4812: do_primitive_accept(Config, Addr) ->
 4813:     LSock =
 4814:         case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 4815:             {ok, LS} ->
 4816:                 LS;
 4817:             {error, LReason} ->
 4818:                 ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(LReason))
 4819:         end,
 4820:     {ok, PortNo} = inet:port(LSock),
 4821:     Parent = self(),
 4822:     F = fun() -> Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LSock)} end,
 4823:     P = spawn(F),
 4824:     case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 4825:         {ok, _} ->
 4826:             ok;
 4827:         {error, eaddrnotavail = CReason} ->
 4828:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(CReason))
 4829:     end,        
 4830:     receive
 4831:         {accepted,P,{ok,P0}} when is_port(P0) ->
 4832:             ok;
 4833:         {accepted,P,Other0} ->
 4834:             {error,Other0}
 4835:     after 500 ->
 4836:               {error,timeout}
 4837:     end.
 4838: 
 4839: 	
 4840: %% Closing listen socket when multi-accepting.
 4841: multi_accept_close_listen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4842:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 4843:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 4844:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 4845:                             Addr;
 4846:                         {error, Reason} ->
 4847:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 4848:                     end
 4849:            end,
 4850:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_multi_accept_close_listen(Config, Addr) end,
 4851:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 4852:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 4853: 
 4854: do_multi_accept_close_listen(Config, Addr) ->
 4855:     ?P("try create listen socket"),
 4856:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 4857:              {ok, LSocket} ->
 4858:                  LSocket;
 4859:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4860:                  ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 4861:          end,
 4862:     Parent = self(),
 4863:     F = fun() ->
 4864:                 ?P("started"),
 4865:                 Accepted = gen_tcp:accept(LS),
 4866:                 ?P("accept result: ~p", [Accepted]),
 4867:                 Parent ! {accepted,self(),Accepted}
 4868:         end,
 4869:     ?P("create acceptor processes"),
 4870:     spawn(F),
 4871:     spawn(F),
 4872:     spawn(F),
 4873:     spawn(F),
 4874:     ?P("sleep some"),
 4875:     ct:sleep(?SECS(2)),
 4876:     ?P("close (listen) socket"),
 4877:     gen_tcp:close(LS),
 4878:     ?P("await accepts"),
 4879:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{_,{error,closed}},{_,{error,closed}},
 4880:                           {_,{error,closed}},{_,{error,closed}}],4,500),
 4881:     ?P("done"),
 4882:     ok.

 4909: 
 4910: %% Check that multi-accept timeouts happen in the correct order.

 5057: %% Check that multi-accept timeouts happen in the correct order after
 5058: %% mixing millsec and sec timeouts (even more).
 5059: accept_timeouts_in_order6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5060:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5061:     Pre  = fun() ->
 5062: 		   ?P("try get local address"),
 5063: 		   {ok, Addr} = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 5064: 		   ?P("try create listen socket"), 
 5065: 		   case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5066: 		       {ok, LSocket} ->
 5067: 			   #{socket => LSocket};
 5068: 		       {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5069: 			   ?P("failed creating socket: ~p", [Reason]),
 5070: 			   {skip, listen_failed_str(Reason)}
 5071: 		   end
 5072: 	   end,
 5073:     TC   = fun(I) -> do_accept_timeouts_in_order6(I) end,
 5074:     Post = fun(#{socket := LSock}) ->
 5075: 		   gen_tcp:close(LSock)
 5076: 	   end,
 5077:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5078: 
 5079: do_accept_timeouts_in_order6(#{socket := LS}) ->    
 5080:     Parent = self(),
 5081: 
 5082:     ?P("create acceptor 1 with timeout 1000"),
 5083:     P1 = spawn(mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS)),
 5084: 
 5085:     ?P("create acceptor 2 with timeout 400"),
 5086:     P2 = spawn(mktmofun(400,Parent,LS)),
 5087: 
 5088:     ?P("create acceptor 3 with timeout 600"),
 5089:     P3 = spawn(mktmofun(600,Parent,LS)),
 5090: 
 5091:     ?P("create acceptor 4 with timeout 200"),
 5092:     P4 = spawn(mktmofun(200,Parent,LS)),
 5093: 
 5094:     ?P("await accept timeouts from (in order): "
 5095:        "~n   Acceptor 4: ~p"
 5096:        "~n   Acceptor 2: ~p"
 5097:        "~n   Acceptor 3: ~p"
 5098:        "~n   Acceptor 1: ~p", [P4, P2, P3, P1]),
 5099:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P4,{error,timeout}},
 5100:                           {P2,{error,timeout}},
 5101: 			  {P3,{error,timeout}},
 5102:                           {P1,{error,timeout}}],
 5103:                          infinity, 2000).
 5104:

 5106: %% mixing millsec and sec timeouts (even more++).

 5109:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of

 5112:                         {error, Reason} ->

 5114:                     end

 5119:

 5130:     P3 = spawn(mktmofun(1200,Parent,LS)),

 5132:     P5 = spawn(mktmofun(400,Parent,LS)),

 5138: 			  {P1,{error,timeout}},{P3,{error,timeout}},
 5139: 			  {P8,{error,timeout}},{P7,{error,timeout}}],infinity,2000).
 5140: 
 5141: %% Check that multi-accept timeouts behave correctly when
 5142: %% mixed with successful timeouts.
 5143: %% Note that on Windows with inet_backend = socket we 
 5144: %% have *no* control over the accept order!
 5145: accept_timeouts_mixed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5146:     Cond = fun() ->
 5147: 		   is_windows() andalso
 5148: 		       ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) andalso
 5149: 		       ?SKIPT("Not compat with 'socket of Windows'"),
 5150: 		   ok
 5151: 	   end,
 5152:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5153:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5154:                             Addr;
 5155:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5156:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5157:                     end
 5158:            end,
 5159:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_accept_timeouts_mixed(Config, Addr) end,
 5160:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5161:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5162: 
 5163: do_accept_timeouts_mixed(Config, Addr) ->
 5164:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5165:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5166:              {ok, LSocket} ->
 5167:                  LSocket;
 5168:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5169:                  ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5170:          end,
 5171:     Parent = self(),
 5172:     {ok, PortNo} = inet:port(LS),
 5173: 
 5174:     ?P("listen socket"
 5175:        "~n   ~p"
 5176:        "~n   Port: ~p", [LS, PortNo]),
 5177: 
 5178:     ?P("create acceptor process 1 (with timeout 1000)"),
 5179:     P1 = spawn(mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS)),
 5180: 
 5181:     ?P("await 1 (~p) accepting", [P1]),
 5182:     wait_until_accepting(P1,500),
 5183: 
 5184:     ?P("create acceptor process 2 (with timeout 2000)"),
 5185:     P2 = spawn(mktmofun(2000,Parent,LS)),
 5186: 
 5187:     ?P("await 2 (~p) accepting", [P2]),
 5188:     wait_until_accepting(P2,500),
 5189: 
 5190:     ?P("create acceptor process 3 (with timeout 3000)"),
 5191:     P3 = spawn(mktmofun(3000,Parent,LS)),
 5192: 
 5193:     ?P("await 3 (~p) accepting", [P3]),
 5194:     wait_until_accepting(P3,500),
 5195: 
 5196:     ?P("create acceptor process 4 (with timeout 4000)"),
 5197:     P4 = spawn(mktmofun(4000,Parent,LS)),
 5198: 
 5199:     ?P("await 4 (~p) accepting", [P4]),
 5200:     wait_until_accepting(P4,500),
 5201: 
 5202:     ?P("expect accept from 1 (~p) with timeout", [P1]),
 5203:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P1,{error,timeout}}],infinity,1500),
 5204: 
 5205:     ?P("connect"),
 5206:     case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5207:         {ok, _} ->
 5208:             ok;
 5209:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason1} ->
 5210:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason1))
 5211:     end,
 5212: 
 5213:     ?P("expect accept from 2 (~p) with success", [P2]),
 5214:     if is_port(LS) ->
 5215:             ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P2,{ok,Port0}}] when is_port(Port0),
 5216:                                                         infinity,100);
 5217:        true ->
 5218:             case ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P2,{ok,_}}],infinity,100) of
 5219: 		ok ->
 5220: 		    ok;
 5221: 		{error, Reason2} ->
 5222: 		    ?P("Failed accept: "
 5223: 		       "~n   P2:     ~p"
 5224: 		       "~n   Reason: ~p", [P2, Reason2]),
 5225: 		    ct:fail(unexpected_accepts)
 5226: 	    end
 5227:     end,
 5228: 
 5229:     ?P("expect accept from 3 (~p) with timeout", [P3]),
 5230:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P3,{error,timeout}}],infinity,2000),
 5231: 
 5232:     ?P("connect"),
 5233:     case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5234:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason3} ->
 5235:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason3));
 5236:         _  ->
 5237:             ok
 5238:     end,
 5239: 
 5240:     ?P("expect accept from 4 (~p) with success", [P4]),
 5241:     if is_port(LS) ->
 5242:             ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P4,{ok,Port1}}] when is_port(Port1),
 5243:                                                         infinity,100);
 5244:        true ->
 5245:             ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P4,{ok,_Port1}}],infinity,100)
 5246:     end,
 5247: 
 5248:     ?P("done"),
 5249:     ok.
 5250: 
 5251: %% Check that single acceptor behaves as expected when killed.
 5252: killing_acceptor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5253:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5254:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5255:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5256:                             Addr;
 5257:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5258:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5259:                     end
 5260:            end,
 5261:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_killing_acceptor(Config, Addr) end,
 5262:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5263:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5264: 
 5265: do_killing_acceptor(Config, Addr) ->
 5266:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5267:     case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5268:         {ok, LSocket} when is_port(LSocket) ->
 5269:             do_killing_acceptor_inet(LSocket);
 5270:         {ok, LSocket} ->
 5271:             do_killing_acceptor_socket(LSocket);
 5272:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5273:             ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5274:     end,
 5275:     ?P("done"),
 5276:     ok.
 5277: 
 5278: do_killing_acceptor_inet(LS) ->
 5279:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5280:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], []),
 5281: 
 5282:     ?P("create acceptor process"),
 5283:     Pid = spawn(
 5284:             fun() ->
 5285:                     erlang:display({accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)})
 5286:             end),
 5287:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5288:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5289:     end,
 5290: 
 5291:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5292:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5293: 
 5294:     ?P("kill acceptor"),
 5295:     exit(Pid, kill),
 5296:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5297:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5298:     end,
 5299: 
 5300:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5301:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], [accepting]),
 5302: 
 5303:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5304:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5305:     ok.
 5306: 
 5307: do_killing_acceptor_socket(LS) ->
 5308:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5309:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], []),
 5310: 
 5311:     ?P("create acceptor process"),
 5312:     Pid = spawn(
 5313:             fun() ->
 5314:                     erlang:display({accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)})
 5315:             end),
 5316:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5317:     ct:sleep(100),
 5318: 
 5319:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5320:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 1, [accepting], []),
 5321: 
 5322:     ?P("kill acceptor"),
 5323:     exit(Pid, kill),
 5324:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5325:     ct:sleep(1000),
 5326: 
 5327:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5328:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], [accepting]),
 5329: 
 5330:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5331:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5332:     ok.
 5333:     
 5334: validate_acceptor_state(LS, ExpStates, ExpNotStates) when is_port(LS) ->
 5335:     case inet:info(LS) of
 5336:         #{states := States} ->
 5337: 
 5338:             ?P("try validate (listen socket) state when: "
 5339:                "~n   Exp States:     ~p"
 5340:                "~n   Exp Not States: ~p"
 5341:                "~n   States:         ~p", [ExpStates, ExpNotStates, States]),
 5342: 
 5343:             %% State *shall* contain ExpStates => States1 =/= States
 5344:             States1 = States -- ExpStates,
 5345: 
 5346:             %% State shall *not* contain ExpNotStates => States2 =:= States
 5347:             States2 = States -- ExpNotStates,
 5348: 
 5349:             if
 5350:                 (States1 =/= States) andalso
 5351:                 (States2 =:= States) ->
 5352:                     ?P("validated: "
 5353:                        "~n    Expected States:     ~p"
 5354:                        "~n    Expected Not States: ~p",
 5355:                        [ExpStates, ExpNotStates]),
 5356:                     ok;
 5357:                true ->
 5358:                     ?P("invalid states: "
 5359:                        "~n   Expected States:     ~p"
 5360:                        "~n   Expected Not States: ~p"
 5361:                        "~n   States:              ~p",
 5362:                        [ExpStates, ExpNotStates, States]),
 5363:                     ct:fail("Invalid state(s)")
 5364:             end;
 5365: 
 5366:         InvalidInfo ->
 5367:             ?P("invalid info: "
 5368:                "~n   Expected States:     ~p"
 5369:                "~n   Expected Not States: ~p"
 5370:                "~n   Invalid Info:        ~p",
 5371:                [ExpStates, ExpNotStates, InvalidInfo]),
 5372:             ct:fail("Invalid state")
 5373:     end.
 5374: 
 5375: validate_acceptor_state(LS, ExpNumAcc, ExpState, ExpNotState) ->
 5376:     case inet:info(LS) of
 5377:         #{num_acceptors := ExpNumAcc, rstates := States} ->
 5378:             ?P("try validate state when: "
 5379:                "~n   Expected State:     ~p"
 5380:                "~n   Expected Not State: ~p"
 5381:                "~n   RStates:            ~p", [ExpState, ExpNotState, States]),
 5382: 
 5383:             %% States *shall* contain ExpState => States1 =/= States
 5384:             States1 = States -- ExpState,
 5385:             
 5386:             %% States shall *not* contain ExpNotState => States2 =:= States
 5387:             States2 = States -- ExpNotState,
 5388: 
 5389:             if
 5390:                 (States1 =/= States) andalso
 5391:                 (States2 =:= States) ->
 5392:                     ?P("validated: "
 5393:                        "~n    Expected States:     ~p"
 5394:                        "~n    Expected Not States: ~p",
 5395:                        [ExpState, ExpNotState]),
 5396:                     ok;
 5397:                true ->
 5398:                     ?P("invalid states: "
 5399:                        "~n   Expected State:     ~p"
 5400:                        "~n   Expected Not State: ~p"
 5401:                        "~n   States:             ~p",
 5402:                        [ExpState, ExpNotState, States]),
 5403:                     ct:fail("Invalid state(s)")
 5404:             end;
 5405: 
 5406:         #{num_acceptors := NumAcc, rstates := RStates, wstates := WStates} ->
 5407:             ?P("invalid state: "
 5408:                "~n   Expected Num Acceptors: ~w"
 5409:                "~n   Num Acceptors:          ~w"
 5410:                "~n   Expected State:         ~p"
 5411:                "~n   Expected Not State:     ~p"
 5412:                "~n   RStates:                ~p"
 5413:                "~n   WStates:                ~p",
 5414:                [ExpNumAcc, NumAcc, ExpState, RStates, WStates]),
 5415:             ct:fail("Invalid state");
 5416: 
 5417:         InvalidInfo ->
 5418:             ?P("invalid info: "
 5419:                "~n   Expected Num Acceptors: ~w"
 5420:                "~n   Expected State:         ~p"
 5421:                "~n   Expected Not State:     ~p"
 5422:                "~n   Invalid Info:           ~p",
 5423:                [ExpNumAcc, ExpNumAcc, ExpState, InvalidInfo]),
 5424:             ct:fail("Invalid state")
 5425:     end.
 5426:     
 5427: 
 5428: %% Check that multi acceptors behaves as expected when killed.
 5429: killing_multi_acceptors(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5430:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5431:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5432:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5433:                             Addr;
 5434:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5435:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5436:                     end
 5437:            end,
 5438:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_killing_multi_acceptors(Config, Addr) end,
 5439:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5440:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5441: 
 5442: do_killing_multi_acceptors(Config, Addr) ->
 5443:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5444:     case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5445:         {ok, LSocket} when is_port(LSocket) ->
 5446:             do_killing_multi_acceptors_inet(LSocket);
 5447:         {ok, LSocket} ->
 5448:             do_killing_multi_acceptors_socket(LSocket);
 5449:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5450:             ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5451:     end,
 5452:     ?P("done"),
 5453:     ok.
 5454: 
 5455: do_killing_multi_acceptors_inet(LS) ->
 5456:     ?P("validate state - listen"),
 5457:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], []),
 5458: 
 5459:     Parent = self(),
 5460:     F1  = fun() -> Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)} end,
 5461:     Tmo = 1000,
 5462:     F2  = mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS),
 5463:     ?P("create first acceptor"),
 5464:     Pid1 = spawn(F1),
 5465:     ?P("create second acceptor - with timeout"),
 5466:     Pid2 = spawn(F2),
 5467: 
 5468:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5469:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 5470: 
 5471:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5472:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5473: 
 5474:     ?P("kill first acceptor"),
 5475:     exit(Pid1, kill),
 5476: 
 5477:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5478:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 5479: 
 5480:     ?P("validate state - still accepting"),
 5481:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5482: 
 5483:     ?P("await second acceptor exit (timeout)"),
 5484:     %% In order to avoid race condition, double the time
 5485:     case ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{Pid2, {error,timeout}}], 1, 2 * Tmo) of
 5486: 	ok ->
 5487: 	    ?P("second acceptor - expected result"),
 5488: 	    ok;
 5489: 	Any ->
 5490: 	    ?P("second acceptor - failed:"
 5491: 	       "~n      ~p", [Any]),
 5492: 	    %% Check what Pid2 is doing
 5493: 	    Pid2Info1 = process_info(Pid2),
 5494: 	    Pid2Msgs1 = process_info(Pid2, messages),
 5495: 	    %% Check if this is just a race...
 5496: 	    ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 5497: 	    Pid2Info2 = process_info(Pid2),
 5498: 	    Pid2Msgs2 = process_info(Pid2, messages),
 5499: 	    ?P("second acceptor failed - check ~p"
 5500: 	       "~n      Info 1: ~p"
 5501: 	       "~n      Msgs 1: ~p"
 5502: 	       "~n   After 1 sec sleep:"
 5503: 	       "~n      Info 2: ~p"
 5504: 	       "~n      Msgs 2: ~p",
 5505: 	       [Pid2, Pid2Info1, Pid2Msgs1, Pid2Info2, Pid2Msgs2]),
 5506: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_accepts, Any})
 5507:     end,
 5508: 
 5509:     ?P("validate state - *not* accepting"),
 5510:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], [accepting]),
 5511: 
 5512:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5513:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5514:     ok.
 5515: 
 5516: do_killing_multi_acceptors_socket(LS) ->
 5517:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5518:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], []),
 5519: 
 5520:     Parent = self(),
 5521:     F = fun() -> Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)} end,
 5522:     F2 = mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS),
 5523:     ?P("create first acceptor"),
 5524:     Pid = spawn(F),
 5525:     ?P("create second acceptor - with timeout"),
 5526:     Pid2 = spawn(F2),
 5527: 
 5528:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5529:     ct:sleep(100),
 5530: 
 5531:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5532:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 2, [accepting], []),
 5533: 
 5534:     ?P("kill first acceptor"),
 5535:     exit(Pid, kill),
 5536:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5537:     ct:sleep(100),
 5538: 
 5539:     ?P("validate state - (still) accepting"),
 5540:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 1, [accepting], []),
 5541: 
 5542:     ?P("await second acceptor exit - timeout"),
 5543:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{Pid2,{error,timeout}}],1,1000),
 5544: 
 5545:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5546:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], [accepting]),
 5547: 
 5548:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5549:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5550:     ok.
 5551:

 5557:                         {ok, Addr} ->

 5560:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5561:                     end
 5562:            end,

 5570:         {ok, LSocket} when is_port(LSocket) ->
 5571:             do_killing_multi_acceptors2_inet(Config, LSocket);

 5574:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5575:             ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5576:     end,
 5577:     ?P("done"),

 5579: 
 5580: do_killing_multi_acceptors2_inet(Config, LS) ->
 5581:     ?P("validate state - listen"),
 5582:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], []),
 5583: 
 5584:     Parent = self(),
 5585:     ?P("get port number for listen socket"),
 5586:     {ok, {Addr, PortNo}} = inet:sockname(LS),
 5587: 
 5588:     F = fun() -> Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)} end,
 5589:     F2 = mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS),
 5590: 
 5591:     ?P("create acceptor process 1"),
 5592:     Pid = spawn(F),
 5593:     ?P("create acceptor process 2"),
 5594:     Pid2 = spawn(F),
 5595:     ?P("wait some"),
 5596:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5597:     end,
 5598: 
 5599:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5600:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5601: 
 5602:     ?P("kill acceptor 1"),
 5603:     exit(Pid,kill),
 5604: 
 5605:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5606:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5607:     end,
 5608: 
 5609:     ?P("validate state - (still) accepting"),
 5610:     {ok, L2} = prim_inet:getstatus(LS),
 5611:     true  = lists:member(accepting, L2),
 5612: 
 5613:     ?P("kill acceptor 2"),
 5614:     exit(Pid2, kill),
 5615: 
 5616:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5617:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5618:     end,
 5619: 
 5620:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5621:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], [accepting]),
 5622: 
 5623:     ?P("create acceptor 3"),
 5624:     Pid3 = spawn(F2),
 5625: 
 5626:     ?P("wait some"),
 5627:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5628:     end,
 5629: 
 5630:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5631:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5632: 
 5633:     ?P("connect to port ~p", [PortNo]),
 5634:     ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}]),
 5635: 
 5636:     ?P("await accept"),
 5637:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{Pid3,{ok,CSock}}] when is_port(CSock),1,100),
 5638: 
 5639:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5640:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], [accepting]),
 5641: 
 5642:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5643:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5644:     ok.
 5645:

 5709: 
 5710: %% Checks that multi-accept works when more than one accept can be
 5711: %% done at once (wb test of inet_driver).
 5712: several_accepts_in_one_go(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5713:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5714:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5715:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5716:                             Addr;
 5717:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5718:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5719:                     end
 5720:            end,
 5721:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_several_accepts_in_one_go(Config, Addr) end,
 5722:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5723:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5724: 
 5725: do_several_accepts_in_one_go(Config, Addr) ->
 5726:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5727:     NumActors = 8,
 5728:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {backlog, NumActors}]) of
 5729:              {ok, LSock} ->
 5730:                  LSock;
 5731:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5732:                  ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5733:          end,
 5734:     Parent = self(),
 5735:     {ok, PortNo} = inet:port(LS),
 5736:     F1 = fun() ->
 5737: 		 ?P("acceptor starting"),
 5738: 		 Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)}
 5739:          end,
 5740:     F2 = fun() ->
 5741: 		 ?P("connector starting"),
 5742: 		 Parent ! {connected,self(),
 5743:                            ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}])}
 5744:          end,
 5745:     Ns = lists:seq(1, NumActors),
 5746:     ?P("start acceptors"),
 5747:     _  = [spawn(F1) || _ <- Ns],
 5748:     ?P("await accept timeouts"),
 5749:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([],1,500), % wait for tmo
 5750:     ?P("start connectors"),
 5751:     _  = [spawn(F2) || _ <- Ns],
 5752:     ?P("await accepts"),
 5753:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}}],NumActors,15000),
 5754:     ?P("await connects"),
 5755:     ok = ?EXPECT_CONNECTS([{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}}],1000),
 5756:     ?P("done"),
 5757:     ok.
 5758: 
 5759: flush(Msgs) ->
 5760:     erlang:yield(),
 5761:     receive Msg -> flush([Msg|Msgs])
 5762:     after     0 -> lists:reverse(Msgs)
 5763:     end.
 5764: 
 5765: wait_until_accepting(Proc,0) ->
 5766:     exit({timeout_waiting_for_accepting,Proc});
 5767: wait_until_accepting(Proc,N) ->
 5768:     case process_info(Proc,current_function) of
 5769:         {current_function, {prim_inet, accept0, 3}} ->
 5770:             case process_info(Proc, status) of
 5771:                 {status,waiting} ->
 5772: 		    ?P("[prim_inet] ~p accepting when n = ~w", [Proc, N]),
 5773:                     ok;
 5774:                 _O1 ->
 5775:                     receive 
 5776:                     after 5 ->
 5777:                             wait_until_accepting(Proc, N-1)
 5778:                     end
 5779:             end;
 5780:         {current_function, {gen, do_call, 4}} ->
 5781:             case process_info(Proc, status) of
 5782:                 {status,waiting} -> 
 5783: 		    ?P("[gen] ~p accepting when n = ~w", [Proc, N]),
 5784:                     ok;
 5785:                 _O1 ->
 5786:                     receive 
 5787:                     after 5 ->
 5788:                             wait_until_accepting(Proc, N-1)
 5789:                     end
 5790:             end;
 5791:         _O2 ->
 5792:             receive 
 5793:             after 5 ->
 5794:                     wait_until_accepting(Proc, N-1)
 5795:             end
 5796:     end.
 5797: 
 5798: 
 5799: %% Check that accept returns {error, system_limit}
 5800: %% (and not {error, enfile}) when running out of ports.
 5801: accept_system_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5802:     Cond = fun() ->
 5803: 		   case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 5804: 		       true ->
 5805: 			   {skip, "Not compliant with socket"};
 5806: 		       false ->
 5807: 			   ok
 5808: 		   end
 5809: 	   end,
 5810:     TC   = fun() -> do_accept_system_limit(Config) end,
 5811:     ?TC_TRY(accept_system_limit, Cond, TC).
 5812: 
 5813: do_accept_system_limit(Config) ->
 5814:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5815:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, []) of
 5816:              {ok, LSocket} ->
 5817:                  LSocket;
 5818:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5819:                  ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5820:         end,             
 5821:     {ok, {Addr, Port}} = inet:sockname(LS),
 5822:     ?P("listen socket \"bound\" to:"
 5823:        "~n      Address: ~p"
 5824:        "~n      Port:    ~p", [Addr, Port]),
 5825:     Me = self(),
 5826:     ?P("create connector"),
 5827:     Connector = spawn_link(fun() ->
 5828:                                    connector(Config, Port, Me)
 5829:                            end),
 5830:     ?P("sync with connector (~p)", [Connector]),
 5831:     receive {Connector, sync} -> Connector ! {self(), continue} end,
 5832:     ?P("begin accepting"),
 5833:     ok = acceptor(Connector, LS, false, []),
 5834:     ?P("stop connector (~p)", [Connector]),
 5835:     Connector ! stop,
 5836:     ?P("done"),
 5837:     ok.
 5838: 
 5839: acceptor(Connector, LS, GotSL, A) ->
 5840:     case gen_tcp:accept(LS, 1000) of
 5841:         {ok, S} ->
 5842:             acceptor(Connector, LS, GotSL, [S|A]);
 5843:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5844:             ?SKIPE(accept_failed_str(Reason));
 5845:         {error, system_limit} ->
 5846:             ?P("acceptor: "
 5847:                "system limit => *almost* done (~w)", [length(A)]),
 5848:             acceptor(Connector, LS, true, A);
 5849:         {error, timeout} when GotSL ->
 5850:             ?P("acceptor: timeout (with system limit) => done (~w)",
 5851:                [length(A)]),
 5852:             ok;
 5853:         {error, timeout} ->
 5854:             ?P("acceptor: timeout *without* system limit => failure"
 5855:                "~n     Number of Accepted: ~w",
 5856:                [length(A)]),
 5857:             error
 5858:     end.
 5859: 
 5860: connector(Config, AccPort, Tester) ->
 5861:     ?P("[connector] start"),
 5862:     ManyPorts = open_ports([]),
 5863:     ?P("[connector] length(ManyPorts): ~p", [length(ManyPorts)]),
 5864:     Tester ! {self(), sync},
 5865:     ?P("[connector] await continute from tester (~p)", [Tester]),
 5866:     receive {Tester, continue} -> timer:sleep(100) end,
 5867:     ?P("[connector] begin connecting"),
 5868:     ConnF =
 5869:         fun(Port) ->
 5870:                 case (catch ?CONNECT(Config, {127,0,0,1}, AccPort)) of
 5871:                     {ok, Sock} ->
 5872:                         ?P("[connector] success: "
 5873:                            "~n      ~p", [Sock]),
 5874:                         Sock;
 5875:                     {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5876:                         ?SKIPE(connect_failed_str(Reason));
 5877:                     _Error ->
 5878:                         ?P("[connector] failure: "
 5879:                            "~n      ~p", [_Error]),
 5880:                         port_close(Port)
 5881:                 end
 5882:         end,
 5883:     R = [ConnF(Port) || Port <- lists:sublist(ManyPorts, 10)],
 5884:     ?P("[connector] await stop"),
 5885:     receive stop -> ?P("[connector] stop (~w)", [length(R)]), R end.
 5886: 
 5887: open_ports(L) ->
 5888:     case catch open_port({spawn_driver, "ram_file_drv"}, []) of
 5889: 	Port when is_port(Port) ->
 5890: 	    open_ports([Port|L]);
 5891: 	{'EXIT', {system_limit, _}} ->
 5892: 	    {L1, L2} = lists:split(5, L),
 5893: 	    [port_close(Port) || Port <- L1],
 5894: 	    L2
 5895:     end.
 5896: 
 5897: 
 5898: %% Check that active once and tcp_close messages behave as expected.
 5899: active_once_closed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5900:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5901:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5902:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5903:                             Addr;
 5904:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5905:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5906:                     end
 5907:            end,
 5908:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_active_once_closed(Config, Addr) end,
 5909:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5910:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5911: 
 5912: do_active_once_closed(Config, Addr) ->
 5913:     Send = fun(Socket, Data) ->
 5914:                    case gen_tcp:send(Socket, Data) of
 5915:                        {error, #{info := econnaborted}} ->
 5916:                            {error, econnaborted};
 5917:                        X ->
 5918:                            X
 5919:                    end
 5920:            end,
 5921:     ?P("stage 1"),
 5922:     (fun() ->
 5923: 	     ?P("[stage1] begin setup"),
 5924: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 5925: 	     ?P("[stage1] begin send"),
 5926: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 5927:                   fun() -> Send(A, "Hello") end),
 5928: 	     ?P("[stage1] try set active:once => expect success"),
 5929: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A, [{active,once}]),
 5930: 	     ?P("[stage1] await socket closed"),
 5931: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 5932: 	     ?P("[stage1] try set active:once => expect failure (einval)"),
 5933: 	     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(A,[{active,once}]),
 5934: 	     ?P("[stage1] await socket closed - expect timeout"),
 5935: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 5936: 	     ?P("[stage1] done"),
 5937: 	     ok
 5938:      end)(),
 5939:     ?P("stage 2"),
 5940:     (fun() ->
 5941: 	     ?P("[stage2] begin setup"),
 5942: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 5943: 	     ?P("[stage2] begin send"),
 5944: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 5945:                   fun() -> Send(A, "Hello") end),
 5946: 	     ?P("[stage2] try set active:true => expect success"),
 5947: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,true}]),
 5948: 	     ?P("[stage2] await socket closed"),
 5949: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 5950: 	     ?P("[stage2] try set active:true => expect failure (einval)"),
 5951: 	     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(A,[{active,true}]),
 5952: 	     ?P("[stage2] await socket closed - expect timeout"),
 5953: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 5954: 	     ?P("[stage2] done"),
 5955: 	     ok
 5956:      end)(),
 5957:     ?P("stage 3"),
 5958:     (fun() ->
 5959: 	     ?P("[stage3] begin setup"),
 5960: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 5961: 	     ?P("[stage3] begin send"),
 5962: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 5963:                   fun() -> Send(A, "Hello") end),
 5964: 	     ?P("[stage3] try set active:true => expect success"),
 5965: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,true}]),
 5966: 	     ?P("[stage3] await socket closed"),
 5967: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 5968: 	     ?P("[stage3] try set active:once => expect failure (einval)"),
 5969: 	     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(A,[{active,once}]),
 5970: 	     ?P("[stage3] await socket closed - expect timeout"),
 5971: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 5972: 	     ?P("[stage3] done"),
 5973: 	     ok
 5974:      end)(),
 5975:     ?P("stage 4"),
 5976:     (fun() ->
 5977: 	     ?P("[stage4] begin setup"),
 5978: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 5979: 	     ?P("[stage4] begin send"),
 5980: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 5981: 			fun() -> Send(A, "Hello") end),
 5982: 	     ?P("[stage1] try set active:once => expect success"),
 5983: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,once}]),
 5984: 	     ?P("[stage4] await socket closed"),
 5985: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 5986: 	     ?P("[stage4] try set active:true => expect failure (einval)"),
 5987: 	     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(A,[{active,true}]),
 5988: 	     ?P("[stage4] await socket closed - expect timeout"),
 5989: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 5990: 	     ?P("[stage4] done"),
 5991: 	     ok
 5992:      end)(),
 5993:     ?P("stage 5"),
 5994:     (fun() ->
 5995: 	     ?P("[stage5] begin setup"),
 5996: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 5997: 	     ?P("[stage5] begin send"),
 5998: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 5999: 			fun() -> Send(A,"Hello") end),
 6000: 	     ?P("[stage5] try set active:false => expect success"),
 6001: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,false}]),
 6002: 	     ?P("[stage5] await socket closed => expect timeout"),
 6003: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 6004: 	     ?P("[stage5] try set active:once => expect success"),
 6005: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,once}]),
 6006: 	     ?P("[stage5] await socket closed"),
 6007: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 6008: 	     ?P("[stage5] done"),
 6009: 	     ok
 6010:      end)(),
 6011:     ?P("done"),
 6012:     ok.

 6014: %% Check that active n and tcp_close messages behave as expected.
 6015: active_n_closed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6016:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 6017:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 6018:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 6019:                             Addr;
 6020:                         {error, Reason} ->
 6021:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 6022:                     end
 6023:            end,
 6024:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_active_n_closed(Config, Addr) end,
 6025:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 6026:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 6027: 
 6028: do_active_n_closed(Config, Addr) ->
 6029:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 6030:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary, {ip, Addr}, {active, false}]),
 6031: 
 6032:     P = self(),
 6033: 
 6034:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 6035: 
 6036:     ClientF =
 6037:         fun() ->
 6038:                 ?P("[client] started"),
 6039:                 Payload = <<0:50000/unit:8>>,
 6040:                 Cnt = 10000,
 6041:                 ?P("[client] send size"),
 6042:                 P ! {size, Cnt * byte_size(Payload)},
 6043:                 ?P("[client] try connect"),
 6044:                 S = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 6045:                                   [binary, {ip, Addr}, {active, false}]) of
 6046:                         {ok, CS} ->
 6047:                             ?P("[client] connected"),
 6048:                             P ! {continue, self()},
 6049:                             CS;
 6050:                         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 6051:                             ?SKIPE(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 6052:                     end,
 6053:                 ?P("[client] send payload"),
 6054:                 _ = [gen_tcp:send(S, Payload) || _ <- lists:seq(1, Cnt)],
 6055:                 ?P("[client] close socket"),
 6056:                 gen_tcp:close(S),
 6057:                 ?P("[client] done"),
 6058:                 exit(ok)
 6059:         end,
 6060:     ?P("create client process"),
 6061:     {Pid, MRef} = spawn_monitor(ClientF),
 6062: 
 6063:     ?P("await size"),
 6064:     receive {size, SendSize} -> SendSize end,
 6065:     ?P("await continue or down"),
 6066:     receive
 6067:         {continue, Pid} ->
 6068:             ?P("got continue"),
 6069:             ok;
 6070:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, {skip, _} = SKIP} ->
 6071:             ?P("got *unexpected* skip"),
 6072:             gen_tcp:close(L),
 6073:             throw(SKIP);
 6074:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, ConnectRes} ->
 6075:             ?P("got *unexpected* crash: "
 6076:               "~n   ~p", [ConnectRes]),
 6077:             exit({unexpected, connect, ConnectRes})
 6078:     end,
 6079:     {ok, S} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 6080:     inet:setopts(S, [{active, 10}]),
 6081:     ?P("start collecting data"),
 6082:     RecvSize = anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef),
 6083: 
 6084:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 6085:     gen_tcp:close(L),
 6086: 
 6087:     ?P("validate size"),
 6088:     if SendSize =:= RecvSize ->
 6089:             ?P("done"),
 6090:             ok;
 6091:        true ->
 6092:             ct:fail("Send and Recv size not equal: ~p ~p", [SendSize, RecvSize])
 6093:     end.
 6094: 
 6095: 
 6096: anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef) ->
 6097:     anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, 0, false, false).
 6098: 
 6099: anc_await_closed_and_down(_S, _Pid, _MRef, Size, true, true) ->
 6100:     Size;
 6101: anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, Closed, Down) ->
 6102:     receive
 6103:         {tcp, S, Bin} ->
 6104:             %% ?P("got a chunk (~w) of data", [byte_size(Bin)]),
 6105:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef,
 6106:                                       byte_size(Bin) + Size, Closed, Down);
 6107:         {tcp_closed, S} ->
 6108:             ?P("got closed -> we are done: ~w", [Size]),
 6109:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, true, Down);
 6110:         {tcp_passive, S} ->
 6111:             %% ?P("got passive -> active"),
 6112:             inet:setopts(S, [{active, 10}]),
 6113:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, Closed, true);
 6114:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, ok} ->
 6115:             ?P("Received expected down message regarding client"),
 6116:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, Closed, true);
 6117: 
 6118:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 6119:             ?P("Received UNEXPECTED down message regarding client:"
 6120:                "~n   Reason:    ~p"
 6121:                "~n   Port Info: ~p",
 6122:                [Reason, (catch erlang:port_info(S))]),
 6123:             ct:fail({unexpected_client_down, Reason}); 
 6124: 
 6125:        Msg ->
 6126:             ?P("ignore: ~p", [Msg]),
 6127:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, Closed, Down)
 6128:     end.
 6129: 
 6130: 
 6131: send_timeout_cfg(Config) ->
 6132:     send_timeout_cfg(Config, default).
 6133: 
 6134: send_timeout_cfg(Config, Case) ->
 6135:     case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 6136:         true when (Case =:= send_timeout_check_length) ->
 6137:             {100, 3000, binary:copy(<<$a:8>>, 1*1024),   5*1024};
 6138:         true ->
 6139:             {100, 3000, binary:copy(<<$a:8>>, 10*1024),  5*1024};
 6140:         false ->
 6141:             {1,   1000, binary:copy(<<$a:8>>, 1*1024),   16*1024}
 6142:     end.    
 6143: 
 6144: %% Test the send_timeout socket option.
 6145: send_timeout_basic_wo_autoclose(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6146:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6147:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6148:                    ?P("create node"),
 6149:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6150: 		   {ok, Addr}  = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 6151:                    #{addr => Addr, rnode => RNode}
 6152:            end,
 6153:     Case = fun(#{addr := Addr, rnode := Node}) ->
 6154:                    do_send_timeout_basic_wo_autoclose(Config, Addr, Node)
 6155:            end,
 6156:     Post = fun(#{rnode := Node}) ->
 6157:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6158:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6159:            end,
 6160:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Pre, Case, Post).
 6161: 
 6162: do_send_timeout_basic_wo_autoclose(Config, Addr, RNode) ->
 6163:     ?P("begin"),
 6164:     {TslTimeout, SndTimeout, BinData, SndBuf} = send_timeout_cfg(Config),
 6165:     send_timeout_basic(Config, Addr, BinData, SndBuf, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6166: 		       false, RNode),
 6167:     ?P("done"),
 6168:     ok.
 6169: 
 6170: %% Test the send_timeout socket option.
 6171: send_timeout_basic_w_autoclose(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6172:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6173:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6174:                    ?P("create node"),
 6175:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6176: 		   {ok, Addr}  = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 6177:                    #{addr => Addr, rnode => RNode}
 6178:            end,
 6179:     Case = fun(#{addr := Addr, rnode := Node}) ->
 6180:                    do_send_timeout_basic_w_autoclose(Config, Addr, Node)
 6181:            end,
 6182:     Post = fun(#{rnode := Node}) ->
 6183:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6184:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6185:            end,
 6186:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Pre, Case, Post).
 6187: 
 6188: do_send_timeout_basic_w_autoclose(Config, Addr, RNode) ->
 6189:     ?P("begin"),
 6190:     {TslTimeout, SndTimeout, BinData, SndBuf} =
 6191:         send_timeout_cfg(Config, send_timeout_basic_w_autoclose),
 6192:     send_timeout_basic(Config, Addr, BinData, SndBuf, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6193: 		       true, RNode),
 6194:     ?P("done"),
 6195:     ok.
 6196: 
 6197: send_timeout_basic(Config, Addr, BinData, SndBuf, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6198: 		   AutoClose, RNode) ->
 6199:     ?P("[basic] sink"),
 6200:     {A, Pid}              = setup_timeout_sink(Config, RNode,
 6201:                                                Addr, SndTimeout,
 6202:                                                AutoClose, SndBuf),
 6203:     Send                  = fun() -> gen_tcp:send(A, BinData) end,
 6204:     {{error, timeout}, _} = timeout_sink_loop(Send, TslTimeout),
 6205: 
 6206:     %% Check that the socket is not busy/closed...
 6207:     ?P("[basic] verify socket not busy/closed"),
 6208:     case gen_tcp:send(A, BinData) of
 6209: 	{error, Reason} ->
 6210: 	    ?P("[basic] (expected) send failure"),
 6211: 	    after_send_timeout(AutoClose, Reason),
 6212: 	    (catch gen_tcp:close(A)),
 6213: 	    exit(Pid, kill),
 6214: 	    ok;
 6215: 	ok ->
 6216:             %% Note that there is no active reader on the other end,
 6217:             %% so a 'channel' has been filled, should remain filled.
 6218: 	    ?P("[basic] UNEXPECTED send success"),
 6219: 	    (catch gen_tcp:close(A)),
 6220: 	    exit(Pid, kill),
 6221: 	    ct:fail("Unexpected send success")
 6222:     end.
 6223: 
 6224: 
 6225: %% Test the send_timeout socket option.
 6226: send_timeout_check_length(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6227:     Cond = fun() ->
 6228:                    Key = kernel_factor,
 6229:                    case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
 6230:                        {value, {Key, Factor}} when (Factor > 6) ->
 6231:                            {skip, ?F("Too slow (factor = ~w)", [Factor])};
 6232:                        _ ->
 6233:                            ok
 6234:                    end
 6235:            end,
 6236:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6237:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
