 6238:                    ?P("create node"),
 6239:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6240: 		   {ok, Addr}  = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 6241:                    #{addr => Addr, rnode => RNode}
 6242:            end,
 6243:     Case = fun(#{addr := Addr, rnode := Node}) ->
 6244:                    do_send_timeout_check_length(Config, Addr, Node)
 6245:            end,
 6246:     Post = fun(#{rnode := Node}) ->
 6247:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6248:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6249:            end,
 6250:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 6251: 
 6252: do_send_timeout_check_length(Config, Addr, RNode) ->
 6253:     ?P("begin"),
 6254:     {TslTimeout, SndTimeout, BinData, SndBuf} =
 6255:         send_timeout_cfg(Config, send_timeout_check_length),
 6256: 
 6257:     %% Check timeout length.
 6258:     ?P("spawn sink process (check timeout length)"),
 6259:     Self = self(),
 6260:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(
 6261:                    fun() ->
 6262:                            {A, _} = setup_timeout_sink(Config, RNode,
 6263: 						       Addr, SndTimeout,
 6264:                                                        true, SndBuf),
 6265:                            Send = fun() ->
 6266:                                           %% <TMP>
 6267:                                           %% snmp:enable_trace(),
 6268:                                           %% snmp:set_trace([{gen_tcp_socket,
 6269:                                           %%                  [{scope, send}]},
 6270:                                           %%                 {socket, [{scope,getopt}]},
 6271:                                           %%                 {socket, [{scope,send}]}],
 6272:                                           %%                [{timestamp, true},
 6273:                                           %%                 {return_trace, true}]),
 6274:                                           %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, true}]),
 6275:                                           Res = gen_tcp:send(A, BinData),
 6276:                                           %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 6277:                                           %% snmp:disable_trace(),
 6278:                                           %% </TMP>
 6279:                                           Self ! Res,
 6280:                                           Res
 6281:                                   end,
 6282:                            {{error, timeout}, _} =
 6283: 			       timeout_sink_loop(Send, TslTimeout)
 6284:                    end),
 6285:     Diff = get_max_diff(Pid),
 6286:     ?P("Max time for send: ~p", [Diff]),
 6287:     true = (Diff > (SndTimeout - 500)) and (Diff < (SndTimeout + 500)),
 6288: 
 6289:     %% Wait for the process to die.
 6290:     ?P("await (timeout checker) process death"),
 6291:     receive {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, _} -> ok end,
 6292: 
 6293:     ?P("done"),
 6294:     ok.
 6295: 
 6296: %% Test the send_timeout socket option.
 6297: send_timeout_para_wo_autoclose(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6298:     Cond = fun() ->
 6299:                    Key = kernel_factor,
 6300:                    case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
 6301:                        {value, {Key, Factor}} when (Factor > 6) ->
 6302:                            {skip, ?F("Too slow (factor = ~w)", [Factor])};
 6303:                        _ ->
 6304:                            ok
 6305:                    end
 6306:            end,
 6307:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6308:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6309:                    ?P("create node"),
 6310:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6311: 		   {ok, Addr}  = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 6312:                    #{addr => Addr, rnode => RNode}
 6313:            end,
 6314:     Case = fun(#{addr := Addr, rnode := Node}) ->
 6315:                    do_send_timeout_para_wo_autoclose(Config, Addr, Node)
 6316: 	   end,
 6317:     Post = fun(#{rnode := Node}) ->
 6318:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6319:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6320:            end,
 6321:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 6322: 
 6323: do_send_timeout_para_wo_autoclose(Config, Addr, RNode) ->
 6324:     ?P("begin"),
 6325:     {TslTimeout, SndTimeout, BinData, SndBuf} = send_timeout_cfg(Config),
 6326: 
 6327:     %% Check that parallel writers do not hang forever
 6328:     ?P("check parallel writers wo autoclose"),
 6329:     send_timeout_para(Config, Addr, BinData, SndBuf, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6330: 		      false, RNode),
 6331: 
 6332:     ?P("done"),
 6333:     ok.
 6334: 
 6335: %% Test the send_timeout socket option.
 6336: %% send_timeout/send_timeout_close behaves differently on 
 6337: %% inet_backend 'socket' (compared to inet), so we skip
 6338: %% this test case (until we can re-write).
 6339: send_timeout_para_w_autoclose(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6340:     Cond = fun() ->
 6341:                    case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 6342:                        true ->
 6343:                            {skip, "Unstable with 'socket' backend"};
 6344:                        false ->
 6345:                            Key = kernel_factor,
 6346:                            case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
 6347:                                {value, {Key, Factor}} when (Factor > 6) ->
 6348:                                    {skip,
 6349:                                     ?F("Too slow (factor = ~w)", [Factor])};
 6350:                                _ ->
 6351:                                    ok
 6352:                            end
 6353:                    end
 6354:            end,
 6355:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6356:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6357:                    ?P("create node"),
 6358:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6359: 		   {ok, Addr}  = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 6360:                    #{addr => Addr, rnode => RNode}
 6361:            end,
 6362:     Case = fun(#{addr := Addr, rnode := Node}) ->
 6363:                    do_send_timeout_para_w_autoclose(Config, Addr, Node)
 6364:            end,
 6365:     Post = fun(#{rnode := Node}) ->
 6366:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6367:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6368:            end,
 6369:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 6370: 
 6371: do_send_timeout_para_w_autoclose(Config, Addr, RNode) ->
 6372:     ?P("begin"),
 6373:     {TslTimeout, SndTimeout, BinData, SndBuf} =
 6374:         send_timeout_cfg(Config, send_timeout_para_w_autoclose),
 6375: 
 6376:     %% Check that parallel writers do not hang forever
 6377:     ?P("check parallel writers wo autoclose"),
 6378:     send_timeout_para(Config, Addr, BinData, SndBuf, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6379: 		      true, RNode),
 6380: 
 6381:     ?P("done"),
 6382:     ok.
 6383: 
 6384: send_timeout_para(Config, Addr, BinData, BufSz, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6385: 		  AutoClose, RNode) ->
 6386:     ?P("[para] sink -> entry with"
 6387:        "~n      size(BinData): ~p"
 6388:        "~n      BufSz:         ~p"
 6389:        "~n      SndTimeout:    ~p"
 6390:        "~n      AutoClose:     ~p",
 6391:        [byte_size(BinData), BufSz, SndTimeout, AutoClose]),
 6392:     {A, Pid} = setup_timeout_sink(Config, RNode,
 6393:                                   Addr, SndTimeout, AutoClose, BufSz),
 6394:     Self = self(),
 6395:     SenderFun = fun() ->
 6396:                         ?P("[para:sender] starting"),
 6397: 			Send = fun() -> gen_tcp:send(A, BinData) end,
 6398: 			Self ! {self(), timeout_sink_loop(Send, TslTimeout)}
 6399: 		end,
 6400:     ?P("[para] spawn sender process 1"),
 6401:     Snd1 = spawn_link(SenderFun),
 6402:     ?P("[para] spawn sender process 2"),
 6403:     Snd2 = spawn_link(SenderFun),
 6404: 
 6405:     SockInfo    = fun() -> (catch inet:info(A)) end,
 6406:     SockTimeout = fun() ->
 6407:                           try inet:getopts(A, [send_timeout]) of
 6408:                               {ok, [V2]} ->
 6409:                                   V2;
 6410:                               {error, R2} ->
 6411:                                   ?F("ERROR: ~p", [R2]);
 6412:                               X2 ->
 6413:                                   ?F("UNKNOWN: ~p", [X2])
 6414:                           catch
 6415:                               C2:E2:S2 ->
 6416:                                   ?F("CAUGHT: ~p, ~p, ~p", [C2, E2, S2])
 6417:                           end
 6418:                   end,
 6419: 
 6420:     ?P("[para] await first sender timeout when"
 6421:        "~n   Sender 1: ~p"
 6422:        "~n   Sender 2: ~p", [Snd1, Snd2]),
 6423:     First =
 6424:         receive
 6425:             {Snd1, {{error, timeout}, N}} ->
 6426:                 ?P("[para] timeout received from sender 1 (~p, ~p)", [Snd1, N]),
 6427:                 1;
 6428:             {Snd2, {{error, timeout}, N}} ->
 6429:                 ?P("[para] timeout received from sender 2 (~p, ~p)", [Snd2, N]),
 6430:                 2;
 6431: 
 6432:             {'EXIT', _Pid, {timetrap_timeout, _Timeout, _Stack}} ->
 6433:                 %% The test case (timetrap) has timed out, which either means
 6434:                 %% we are running on very slow hw or some system functions
 6435:                 %% are slowing us down (this test case should never normally
 6436:                 %% time out like this).
 6437:                 ?P("Test case timetrap timeout - check for system events"),
 6438:                 case kernel_test_global_sys_monitor:events(?SECS(5)) of
 6439:                     SysEvs when (SysEvs =/= []) ->
 6440:                         ?P("timetrap timeout with system events: "
 6441:                            "~n   System Events: ~p"
 6442:                            "~n   Sender 1 Info: ~p"
 6443:                            "~n   Sender 2 Info: ~p"
 6444:                            "~n   Socket Info:   ~p",
 6445:                            [SysEvs,
 6446:                             process_info(Snd1), process_info(Snd2),
 6447:                             SockInfo()]),
 6448:                         ?SKIPT(?F("TC system ~w events", [length(SysEvs)]));
 6449:                     {error, Reason} ->
 6450:                         ?P("TC timetrap timeout but failed get system events: "
 6451:                            "~n   Reason:        ~p"
 6452:                            "~n   Sender 1 Info: ~p"
 6453:                            "~n   Sender 2 Info: ~p"
 6454:                            "~n   Socket Info:   ~p",
 6455:                            [Reason,
 6456:                             process_info(Snd1), process_info(Snd2),
 6457:                             SockInfo()]),
 6458:                         exit({timetrap, {failed_get_sys_evs, Reason}});
 6459:                     [] ->
 6460:                         ?P("TC timetrap *without* system events: "
 6461:                            "~n   Sender 1 Info: ~p"
 6462:                            "~n   Sender 2 Info: ~p"
 6463:                            "~n   Socket Info:   ~p",
 6464:                            [process_info(Snd1), process_info(Snd2),
 6465:                             SockInfo()]),
 6466:                         exit(timetrap)
 6467:                 end
 6468: 
 6469:         after 20000 ->
 6470:                 SockInfo1 = SockInfo(),
 6471:                 SockTo1   = SockTimeout(),
 6472:                 ?P("[para] UNEXPECTED timeout(1,~w) when:"
 6473:                    "~n   Sender 1 Info: ~p"
 6474:                    "~n   Sender 2 Info: ~p"
 6475:                    "~n   Socket Info:   ~p"
 6476:                    "~n   Send Timeout:  ~p"
 6477:                    "~n   Message Queue: ~p",
 6478:                    [AutoClose,
 6479:                     (catch process_info(Snd1)),
 6480:                     (catch process_info(Snd2)),
 6481:                     SockInfo1, SockTo1,
 6482:                     flush([])]),
 6483:                 Snd1 ! {info_and_die, SockInfo, SockTimeout},
 6484:                 Snd2 ! {info_and_die, SockInfo, SockTimeout},
 6485:                 ct:sleep(?SECS(1)),
 6486:                 exit({timeout, AutoClose})
 6487:         end,
 6488: 
 6489:     Second = if (First =:= 1) -> 2; true -> 1 end,
 6490:     ?P("[para] await second sender ~w error", [Second]),
 6491:     receive
 6492: 	{Snd1, {{error, Error_1}, N_1}} ->
 6493:             ?P("[para] error (~p) received from sender 1 (~p, ~p)",
 6494:                [Error_1, Snd1, N_1]),
 6495:             after_send_timeout(AutoClose, Error_1);
 6496: 	{Snd2, {{error, Error_1}, N_1}} ->
 6497:             ?P("[para] error (~p) received from sender 2 (~p, ~p)",
 6498:                [Error_1, Snd2, N_1]),
 6499:             after_send_timeout(AutoClose, Error_1)
 6500:     after 10000 ->
 6501:             if (Second =:= 1) ->
 6502:                     SockInfo21 = SockInfo(),
 6503:                     SockTo21   = SockTimeout(),
 6504:                     ?P("[para] UNEXPECTED timeout(2, ~w):"
 6505:                        "~n   Sender 1 Info: ~p"
 6506:                        "~n   Socket Info:   ~p"
 6507:                        "~n   Send Timeout:  ~p"
 6508:                        "~n   Message Queue: ~p",
 6509:                        [AutoClose,
 6510:                         (catch process_info(Snd1)),
 6511:                         SockInfo21, SockTo21,
 6512:                         flush([])]),
 6513:                 Snd1 ! {info_and_die, SockInfo, SockTimeout};
 6514:                true ->
 6515:                     SockInfo22 = SockInfo(),
 6516:                     SockTo22   = SockTimeout(),
 6517:                     ?P("[para] UNEXPECTED timeout(2, ~w):"
 6518:                        "~n   Sender 2 Info: ~p"
 6519:                        "~n   Socket Info:   ~p"
 6520:                        "~n   Send Timeout:  ~p"
 6521:                        "~n   Message Queue: ~p",
 6522:                        [AutoClose,
 6523:                         (catch process_info(Snd2)),
 6524:                         SockInfo22, SockTo22,
 6525:                         flush([])]),
 6526:                     Snd2 ! {info_and_die, SockInfo, SockTimeout}
 6527:             end,
 6528:             ct:sleep(?SECS(1)),
 6529: 	    exit({timeout, AutoClose, Second})
 6530:     end,
 6531: 
 6532:     ?P("[para] socket info: "
 6533:        "~n   ~p", [SockInfo()]),
 6534:     {error, Error_2} = gen_tcp:send(A, BinData),
 6535:     after_send_timeout(AutoClose, Error_2),
 6536:     ?P("[para] cleanup - await sender terminations"),
 6537:     st_await_sender_termination(Snd1, Snd2),
 6538:     ?P("[para] cleanup - close socket"),
 6539:     send_timeout_close(A),
 6540:     ?P("[para] cleanup - kill sink"),
 6541:     exit(Pid, kill),
 6542:     ?P("[para] done"),
 6543:     ok.
 6544: 
 6545: %% Spawn a closer process, transfer "ownership" of the socket
 6546: %% to it and then send it the socket (to close) at its leisure.
 6547: send_timeout_close(Sock) ->
 6548:     F = fun() ->
 6549:                 receive
 6550:                     {close, S} ->
 6551:                         (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 6552:                         exit(normal)
 6553:                 end
 6554:         end,
 6555:     Pid = spawn_link(F),
 6556:     case gen_tcp:controlling_process(Sock, Pid) of
 6557:         ok ->
 6558:             Pid ! {close, Sock},
 6559:             ok;
 6560:         {error, Reason} ->
 6561:             ?P("failed transfering ownership to closer process: "
 6562:                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 6563:             exit(Pid, kill),
 6564:             (catch gen_tcp:close(Sock))
 6565:     end.
 6566:     
 6567: st_await_sender_termination(undefined, undefined) ->
 6568:     ok;
 6569: st_await_sender_termination(Sender1, Sender2) ->
 6570:     receive
 6571:         {'EXIT', Pid, Reason} when (Pid =:= Sender1) ->
 6572:             ?P("sender 1 (~p) terminated: "
 6573:                "~n   ~p", [Pid, Reason]),
 6574:             st_await_sender_termination(undefined, Sender2);
 6575:         {'EXIT', Pid, Reason} when (Pid =:= Sender2) ->
 6576:             ?P("sender 2 (~p) terminated: "
 6577:                "~n   ~p", [Pid, Reason]),
 6578:             st_await_sender_termination(Sender1, undefined)
 6579:     end.
 6580:             
 6581: get_max_diff(Pid) when is_pid(Pid) ->
 6582:     receive
 6583: 	ok ->
 6584: 	    get_max_diff2(0)
 6585:     after 10000 ->
 6586:             ?P("timeout awaiting first send result (ok) from sender ~p:"
 6587:                "~n   Sender process info: ~p",
 6588:                [Pid, pi(Pid)]),
 6589: 	    exit(timeout)
 6590:     end.
 6591: 
 6592: get_max_diff2(Max) ->
 6593:     T1 = millis(),
 6594:     receive
 6595: 	ok ->
 6596: 	    Diff = millis() - T1,
 6597: 	    if
 6598: 		Diff > Max ->
 6599: 		    ?P("new max send time: ~w", [Diff]),
 6600: 		    get_max_diff2(Diff);
 6601: 		true ->
 6602: 		    get_max_diff2(Max)
 6603: 	    end;
 6604: 	{error, timeout} ->
 6605: 	    Diff = millis() - T1,
 6606: 	    if
 6607: 		Diff > Max ->
 6608: 		    ?P("timeout diff (> prev max send to): ~w", [Diff]),
 6609: 		    Diff;
 6610: 		true ->
 6611: 		    Max
 6612: 	    end
 6613:     after 10000 ->
 6614:               exit(timeout)
 6615:     end.
 6616: 	    
 6617: after_send_timeout(AutoClose, Reason) ->
 6618:     case Reason of
 6619:         timeout              when AutoClose =:= false -> ok;
 6620:         {timeout, _RestData} when AutoClose =:= false -> ok;
 6621:         enotconn             when AutoClose =:= true  -> ok;
 6622: 	closed               when AutoClose           -> ok;
 6623:         _ ->
 6624:             ?P("after_send_timeout -> "
 6625:                "~n      AutoClose: ~w"
 6626:                "~n      Reason:    ~p", [AutoClose, Reason]),
 6627:             exit({after_send_timeout, AutoClose, Reason})
 6628:     end.
 6629: 
 6630: 
 6631: %% Test the send_timeout socket option for active sockets.
 6632: send_timeout_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6633:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 6634:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 6635:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 6636:                             Addr;
 6637:                         {error, Reason} ->
 6638:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 6639:                     end
 6640:            end,
 6641:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_send_timeout_active(Config, Addr) end,
 6642:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 6643:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 6644: 
 6645: do_send_timeout_active(Config, Addr) ->
 6646:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6647:     {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6648:     do_send_timeout_active(Config, Addr, false, RNode),
 6649:     do_send_timeout_active(Config, Addr, true, RNode),
 6650:     ?STOP_NODE(RNode),
 6651:     ok.
 6652: 
 6653: do_send_timeout_active(Config, Addr, AutoClose, RNode) ->
 6654:     {A,C} = setup_active_timeout_sink(Config, RNode, Addr, 1, AutoClose),
 6655:     inet:setopts(A, [{active, once}]),
 6656:     Mad = spawn_link(RNode, fun() -> mad_sender(C) end),
 6657:     ListData = lists:duplicate(1000, $a),
 6658:     F = fun() ->
 6659:                 ?P("[sink action] await data"),
 6660: 		receive
 6661: 		    {tcp, _Sock, _Data} ->
 6662:                         ?P("[sink action] active -> once"),
 6663: 			inet:setopts(A, [{active, once}]),
 6664:                         ?P("[sink action] send payload"),
 6665: 			Res = gen_tcp:send(A, ListData),
 6666: 			Res;
 6667: 		    Unexpected ->
 6668: 			?P("[sink action] unexpected message: "
 6669:                            "~n      ~p", [Unexpected]),
 6670: 			Unexpected
 6671: 		end
 6672: 	end,
 6673:     {{error, timeout}, _} = timeout_sink_loop(F, 1),
 6674:     unlink(Mad),
 6675:     exit(Mad, kill),
 6676:     flush(),
 6677:     ok.
 6678: 
 6679: mad_sender(S) ->
 6680:     put(action,  nothing),
 6681:     put(sent,    0),
 6682:     put(elapsed, 0),
 6683:     mad_sender(S, 0).
 6684: 
 6685: mad_sender(S, N) ->
 6686:     U = rand:uniform(1000000),
 6687:     put(action, send),
 6688:     Start   = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 6689:     Ret     = gen_tcp:send(S, integer_to_list(U)),
 6690:     Stop    = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 6691:     Elapsed = get(elapsed),
 6692:     put(elapsed, Elapsed + (Stop - Start)),
 6693:     put(action, sent),
 6694:     N2 = N + 1,
 6695:     put(sent,   N2),
 6696:     case Ret of
 6697:         ok ->
 6698:             mad_sender(S, N + 1);
 6699:         {error, timeout} = ERROR1 ->
 6700:             ?P("mad_sender -> send failed: timeout"
 6701:                "~n   Number of sends:     ~w"
 6702:                "~n   Elapsed (send) time: ~w msec",
 6703:                [N2,
 6704:                 erlang:convert_time_unit(get(elapsed), native, millisecond)]),
 6705:             ERROR1;
 6706:         {error, {timeout, RestData}} = ERROR2 ->
 6707:             ?P("mad_sender -> "
 6708:                "send failed: timeout with ~w bytes of rest data"
 6709:                "~n   Number of sends:     ~w"
 6710:                "~n   Elapsed (send) time: ~w msec",
 6711:                [byte_size(RestData),
 6712:                 N2,
 6713:                 erlang:convert_time_unit(get(elapsed), native, millisecond)]),
 6714:             ERROR2;
 6715:         {error, Reason} = ERROR3 ->
 6716:             ?P("mad_sender -> send failed: "
 6717:                "~n   ~p"
 6718:                "~n   Number of sends:     ~w"
 6719:                "~n   Elapsed (send) time: ~w msec",
 6720:                [Reason,
 6721:                 N2,
 6722:                 erlang:convert_time_unit(get(elapsed), native, millisecond)]),
 6723:             ERROR3;
 6724:         ERROR4 ->
 6725:             ?P("mad_sender -> send failed: "
 6726:                "~n   ~p"
 6727:                "~n   Number of sends:     ~w"
 6728:                "~n   Elapsed (send) time: ~w msec",
 6729:                [ERROR4,
 6730:                 N2,
 6731:                 erlang:convert_time_unit(get(elapsed), native, millisecond)]),
 6732:             ERROR4
 6733:     end.
 6734: 
 6735: flush() ->
 6736:     receive
 6737: 	_X ->
 6738: 	    flush()
 6739:     after 0 ->
 6740: 	    ok
 6741:     end.
 6742: 
 6743: setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr) ->
 6744:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6745:     ?P("[setup] start node"),
 6746:     R = case ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir) of
 6747:             {ok, Node} ->
 6748:                 Node;
 6749:             {error, Reason} ->
 6750:                 ?SKIPT(?F("failed starting node: ~p", [Reason]))
 6751:         end,
 6752:     ?P("[setup] get (\"proper\")local address"),
 6753:     {ok, Addr} = ?LIB:which_local_addr(inet),
 6754:     Host = get_hostname(node()),
 6755:     ?P("[setup] create listen socket (with ~p)", [Addr]),
 6756:     L = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false},{packet,2}]) of
 6757:             {ok, LSock} ->
 6758:                 LSock;
 6759:             {error, eaddrnotavail = LReason} ->
 6760:                 (catch ?STOP_NODE(R)),
 6761:                 ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(LReason))
 6762:         end,
 6763:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 6764:     ?P("[setup] listen socket port: "
 6765:        "~n   Port: ~p", [Port]),
 6766:     Fun = fun(F) ->
 6767:                   receive
 6768:                       {From,X} when is_function(X) ->
 6769:                           From ! {self(),X()}, F(F);
 6770:                       die -> ok
 6771:                   end
 6772:           end,
 6773:     ?P("[setup] create remote runner"),
 6774:     Pid = rpc:call(R,erlang,spawn,[fun() -> Fun(Fun) end]),
 6775:     Remote = fun(Fu) ->
 6776:                      Pid ! {self(), Fu},
 6777:                      receive {Pid,X} -> X end
 6778:              end,
 6779:     Connect = fun() -> 
 6780:                       ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 6781:                                [{ip, Addr}, {active, false}, {packet, 2}]) 
 6782:               end,
 6783:     ?P("[setup] create (remote) connection"),
 6784:     C = case Remote(Connect) of
 6785:             {ok, CSock} ->
 6786:                 CSock;
 6787:             {error, eaddrnotavail = CReason} ->
 6788:                 (catch ?STOP_NODE(R)),
 6789:                 ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(CReason))
 6790:         end,
 6791:     ?P("[setup] accept (local) connection"),
 6792:     A = case gen_tcp:accept(L) of
 6793:             {ok, ASock} ->
 6794:                 ASock;
 6795:             {error, eaddrnotavail = AReason} ->
 6796:                 (catch ?STOP_NODE(R)),
 6797:                 ?SKIPT(accept_failed_str(AReason))
 6798:         end,
 6799:     ?P("[setup] send (local) and receive (remote) message"),
 6800:     gen_tcp:send(A,"Hello"),
 6801:     {ok, "Hello"} = Remote(fun() -> gen_tcp:recv(C,0) end),
 6802:     ?P("[setup] close (remote) connection"),
 6803:     ok =  Remote(fun() -> gen_tcp:close(C) end),
 6804:     Loop2 = fun(_,_,_,0) ->
 6805: 		    {failure, timeout}; 
 6806: 	       (L2,{MA,MB},F2,N) ->
 6807: 		    case F2() of
 6808: 			MA -> ?P("[setup] action result (MA): ~p", [MA] ), MA;
 6809: 			MB -> ?P("[setup] action result (MB): ~p", [MB] ), MB;
 6810: 			Other -> ?P("[setup] Loop2: ~p",[Other]),
 6811: 				 receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 6812: 				 L2(L2,{MA,MB},F2,N-1)
 6813: 		    end
 6814: 	    end,
 6815:     Loop = fun(Match2,F3) ->  Loop2(Loop2,Match2,F3,10) end,
 6816:     ?P("[setup] stop node"),
 6817:     ?STOP_NODE(R),
 6818:     ?P("[setup] done"),
 6819:     {Loop,A}.
 6820:     
 6821: setup_timeout_sink(Config, RNode, Addr, Timeout, AutoClose, BufSz) ->
 6822:     ?P("[sink setup] create listen socket"),
 6823:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ifaddr,             Addr},
 6824:                                   {active,             false},
 6825: 				  {packet,             4},
 6826: 				  {sndbuf,             BufSz},
 6827: 				  {send_timeout,       Timeout},
 6828: 				  {send_timeout_close, AutoClose}]),
 6829: 
 6830:     ?P("listen socket created with: "
 6831:        "~n   Send Timeout Opts: ~p",
 6832:        [oki(inet:getopts(L, [send_timeout, send_timeout_close]))]),
 6833:     Fun = fun(N, F) ->
 6834: 		  receive
 6835: 		      {From,X} when is_function(X) ->
 6836: 			  From ! {self(),X()}, F(N+1,F);
 6837:                       {From, iterations} ->
 6838:                           From ! {self(), N}, F(N, F);
 6839: 		      die ->
 6840:                           ok
 6841: 		  end
 6842: 	  end,
 6843:     ?P("[sink setup] start remote runner process (on ~p)", [RNode]),
 6844:     Pid =  rpc:call(RNode, erlang, spawn, [fun() -> Fun(0,Fun) end]),
 6845:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 6846:     Remote = fun(Fu) ->
 6847: 		     Pid ! {self(), Fu},
 6848: 		     receive
 6849:                          {Pid,X} -> X
 6850: 		     end
 6851: 	     end,
 6852:     ?P("[sink setup] connect from remote node (~p)", [RNode]),
 6853:     {ok, C} = Remote(fun() ->
 6854: 			     ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 6855: 				      [{ifaddr, Addr},
 6856:                                        {active, false},
 6857: 				       {packet, 4},
 6858: 				       {recbuf, BufSz div 2},
 6859: 				       {sndbuf, BufSz div 2}])
 6860: 		     end),
 6861:     ?P("[sink setup] accept"),
 6862:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 6863:     ?P("[sink setup] accepted with options: "
 6864:        "~n   Send Timeout Opts: ~p"
 6865:        "~n   => send 'test' message",
 6866:        [oki(inet:getopts(A, [send_timeout, send_timeout_close]))]),
 6867:     gen_tcp:send(A, "Hello"),
 6868:     ?P("[sink setup] 'test' message sent - "
 6869:        "recv 'test' message on remote node (~p)", [RNode]),
 6870:     {ok, "Hello"} = Remote(fun() -> gen_tcp:recv(C,0) end),
 6871:     ?P("[sink setup] cleanup - close listen socket"),
 6872:     (catch gen_tcp:close(L)),
 6873: 
 6874:     ?P("[sink setup] done when: "
 6875:        "~n   Accepted socket: ~p"
 6876:        "~n      Buffer Info: ~p"
 6877:        "~n      SockName:    ~p"
 6878:        "~n      PeerName:    ~p"
 6879:        "~n   Connected socket: ~p"
 6880:        "~n      Buffer Info: ~p"
 6881:        "~n      SockName:    ~p"
 6882:        "~n      PeerName:    ~p",
 6883:        [A,
 6884:         oki(inet:getopts(A, [buffer, recbuf, sndbuf])),
 6885:         oki(inet:sockname(A)),
 6886:         oki(inet:peername(A)),
 6887:         C,
 6888:         oki(Remote(fun() -> inet:getopts(C, [buffer, recbuf, sndbuf]) end)),
 6889:         oki(Remote(fun() -> inet:sockname(C) end)),
 6890:         oki(Remote(fun() -> inet:peername(C) end))]),
 6891: 
 6892:     ?P("[sink setup] done"),
 6893: 
 6894:     {A, Pid}.
 6895: 
 6896: oki({ok, V}) -> V;
 6897: oki(E)       -> E.
 6898: 
 6899: setup_active_timeout_sink(Config, RNode, Addr, Timeout, AutoClose) ->
 6900:     ListenOpts =  [binary,
 6901:                    {ifaddr,             Addr},
 6902: 		   {active,             false},
 6903: 		   {packet,             0},
 6904: 		   {nodelay,            true},
 6905: 		   {keepalive,          true},
 6906: 		   {send_timeout,       Timeout},
 6907: 		   {send_timeout_close, AutoClose}],
 6908:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, ListenOpts),
 6909:     Fun = fun(F) ->
 6910: 		  receive
 6911: 		      {From,X} when is_function(X) ->
 6912: 			  From ! {self(),X()},
 6913: 			  F(F);
 6914: 		      die -> ok
 6915: 		  end
 6916: 	  end,
 6917:     Pid = rpc:call(RNode, erlang, spawn, [fun() -> Fun(Fun) end]),
 6918:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 6919:     Remote = fun(Fu) ->
 6920: 		     Pid ! {self(), Fu},
 6921: 		     receive {Pid,X} -> X
 6922: 		     end
 6923: 	     end,
 6924:     {ok, C} = Remote(fun() ->
 6925: 			     ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [{ip,     Addr},
 6926: 			                                   {active, false}])
 6927: 		     end),
 6928:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 6929:     gen_tcp:send(A, "Hello"),
 6930:     {ok, "H"++_} = Remote(fun() -> gen_tcp:recv(C, 0) end),
 6931:     {A, C}.
 6932: 
 6933: %% timeout_sink_loop(Action) ->
 6934: %%     timeout_sink_loop(Action, 1).
 6935: 
 6936: timeout_sink_loop(Action, To) ->
 6937:     put(action,   nothing),
 6938:     put(sent,     0),
 6939:     put(elapsed,  0),
 6940:     put(send_max, 0),
 6941:     put(lsendts,  "-"), % Last Send TS (time stamp)
 6942:     timeout_sink_loop(Action, To, 0).
 6943: 
 6944: timeout_sink_loop(Action, To, N) ->
 6945:     put(action, send),
 6946:     Start   = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 6947:     Ret     = Action(),
 6948:     Stop    = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 6949:     LSendTS = ?FTS(),
 6950:     SendT   = Stop - Start,
 6951:     Elapsed = get(elapsed),
 6952:     put(elapsed, Elapsed + SendT),
 6953:     SendMax = get(send_max),
 6954:     if (SendT > SendMax) -> put(send_max, SendT);
 6955:        true              -> ok
 6956:     end,
 6957:     put(action, sent),
 6958:     put(lsendts, LSendTS),
 6959:     N2 = N + 1,
 6960:     put(sent,   N2),
 6961:     case Ret of
 6962: 	ok ->
 6963: 	    receive
 6964:                 {info_and_die, SockInfo, SockTimeout} ->
 6965:                     ?P("[sink-loop] info and die: "
 6966:                        "~n   Socket Info:  ~p"
 6967:                        "~n   Send Timeout: ~p",
 6968:                        [SockInfo(), SockTimeout()]),
 6969:                     exit(normal)
 6970:             after To -> ok end,
 6971: 	    timeout_sink_loop(Action, To, N+1);
 6972: 	{error, {timeout, RestData}} ->
 6973:             ?P("[sink-loop] action result: "
 6974:                "~n   Number of actions: ~p"
 6975:                "~n   Elapsed time:      ~p msec"
 6976:                "~n   Result:            timeout with ~w bytes of rest data",
 6977:                [N2,
 6978:                 erlang:convert_time_unit(get(elapsed), native, millisecond),
 6979:                 byte_size(RestData)]),
 6980: 	    {{error, timeout}, N2};
 6981: 	Other ->
 6982:             ?P("[sink-loop] action result: "
 6983:                "~n   Number of actions: ~p"
 6984:                "~n   Elapsed time:      ~p msec"
 6985:                "~n   Result:            ~p",
 6986:                [N2,
 6987:                 erlang:convert_time_unit(get(elapsed), native, millisecond),
 6988:                 Other]),
 6989: 	    {Other, N2}
 6990:     end.
 6991: 
 6992: 
 6993: %% =========================================================================
 6994: 
 6995: send_timeout_resume(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6996:     ct:timetrap(?SECS(16)),
 6997:     Cond = fun() ->
 6998:                    case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 6999:                        true ->
 7000:                            {skip, "Unstable with 'socket' backend"};
 7001:                        false ->
 7002:                            Key = kernel_factor,
 7003:                            case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
 7004:                                {value, {Key, Factor}} when (Factor > 6) ->
 7005:                                    {skip,
 7006:                                     ?F("Too slow (factor = ~w)", [Factor])};
 7007:                                _ ->
 7008:                                    ok
 7009:                            end
 7010:                    end
 7011:            end,
 7012:     Pre  = fun() ->
 7013:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 7014:                    ?P("create node"),
 7015:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 7016:                    RNode
 7017:            end,
 7018:     Case = fun(Node) -> do_send_timeout_resume(Config, Node, 13) end,
 7019:     Post = fun(Node) ->
 7020:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 7021:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 7022:            end,
 7023:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 7024: 
 7025: do_send_timeout_resume(Config, RNode, BlockPow) ->
 7026:     BlockSize = 1 bsl BlockPow,
 7027:     1         = rand:uniform(1),
 7028:     Seed      = rand:export_seed(),
 7029:     ListenOpts =
 7030:         [inet,
 7031:          binary,
 7032:          {backlog, 2},
 7033:          {active,  false}],
 7034:     ConnectOpts =
 7035:         [inet,
 7036:          {send_timeout, 0},
 7037:          {active,       false},
 7038:          binary],
 7039:     StreamOpts =
 7040:         [{high_watermark, BlockSize},
 7041:          {low_watermark,  BlockSize bsr 1},
 7042:          {sndbuf,         BlockSize},
 7043:          {recbuf,         BlockSize},
 7044:          {buffer,         BlockSize bsl 1}],
 7045:     Client = self(),
 7046:     Tag = make_ref(),
 7047:     {Server, Mref} =
 7048:         spawn_opt(
 7049:           RNode,
 7050:           fun () ->
 7051:                   send_timeout_resume_srv(
 7052:                     Config, Seed, Client, Tag, ListenOpts, StreamOpts)
 7053:           end, [monitor, link]),
 7054:     ?P("Client=~p Server=~p Tag=~p~n", [Client, Server, Tag]),
 7055:     receive
 7056:         {Tag, port, Port} ->
 7057:             ok;
 7058:         {'DOWN', Mref, _, _, Port} ->
 7059:             %% Use variable Port just to get export from case
 7060:             ct:fail(Port)
 7061:     end,
 7062:     ?P("connecting to ~p~n", [Port]),
 7063:     {ok, C} = ?CONNECT(Config, localhost, Port, ConnectOpts, 2000),
 7064:     try
 7065:         ok = inet:setopts(C, StreamOpts),
 7066:         ?P("client StreamOpts: ~p~n",
 7067:            [inet:getopts(C, optnames(StreamOpts))]),
 7068:         receive
 7069:             {Tag, send} ->
 7070:                 ok;
 7071:             {'DOWN', Mref, _, _, Error2} ->
 7072:                 ct:fail(Error2)
 7073:         end,
 7074:         RetryTimeout = str_which_retry_timeout(),
 7075:         ?P("send"),
 7076:         {N, Timeouts} =
 7077:             do_send_timeout_resume_send(C, Server, Tag,
 7078:                                         RetryTimeout, BlockSize),
 7079:         ?P("await server (~p) reply (DOWN)", [Server]),
 7080:         receive
 7081:             {'DOWN', Mref, _, _, Result} ->
 7082:                 ?P("received DOWN message from server:"
 7083:                    "~n   N:        ~p"
 7084:                    "~n   Timeouts: ~p"
 7085:                    "~n   Result:   ~p", [N, Timeouts, Result]),
 7086:                 case Result of
 7087:                     {Tag, ok, Count}
 7088:                       when Count =:= N * BlockSize,
 7089:                            %% We should get 10 time-outs.
 7090:                            %% If we do not get more than one, it seems
 7091:                            %% we get stuck when trying to poll the
 7092:                            %% send buffer with send_timeout = 0,
 7093:                            %% so that did not work
 7094:                            1 < Timeouts ->
 7095:                         ?P("count checked out"),
 7096:                         ok;
 7097:                     {Tag, ok, Count} when Count =:= N * BlockSize ->
 7098:                         ?P("Unexpected number of timeouts: ~w", [Timeouts]),
 7099:                         ct:fail(Result);
 7100:                     {Tag, ok, Count} ->
 7101:                         ?P("Unexpected counts: "
 7102:                            "~n      Got:      ~p"
 7103:                            "~n      Expected: ~p", [Count, N*BlockSize]),
 7104:                         ct:fail(Result);
 7105:                     {Tag, Res, _Count} ->
 7106:                         ?P("Unexpected res: "
 7107:                            "~n      Res: ~p", [Res]),
 7108:                         ct:fail(Result);
 7109:                     _ ->
 7110:                         ct:fail(Result)
 7111:                 end
 7112:         end
 7113:     after
 7114:         ?P("after: kill (failsafe) server"),
 7115:         exit(Server, failsafe),
 7116:         ?P("after: close socket"),
 7117:         gen_tcp:close(C),
 7118:         ?P("after: done"),
 7119:         ok
 7120:     end.
 7121: 
 7122: optnames(Opts) ->
 7123:     [Name || {Name, _} <- Opts].
 7124: 
 7125: str_which_retry_timeout() ->
 7126:     case os:type() of
 7127:         {unix, darwin} ->
 7128:             %% This is really sketchy, but it seems to "work"...
 7129:             %% Don't know if its the processor (M1) or if its the
 7130:             %% OS/darwin version (darwin 21.x).
 7131:             %% But since we don't have any intel macs running 21...
 7132:             case os:version() of
 7133:                 {Major, _, _} when (Major >= 20) ->
 7134:                     25;
 7135:                 _ ->
 7136:                     100
 7137:             end;
 7138:         {unix, freebsd} ->
 7139:             %% Has seen this on FreeBSD 12.2 and later.
 7140:             case os:version() of
 7141:                 {Major, _, _} when (Major >= 13) ->
 7142:                     25;
 7143:                 {Major, Minor, _} when (Major =:= 12) andalso
 7144:                                        (Minor >= 2) ->
 7145:                     25;
 7146:                 _ ->
 7147:                     100
 7148:             end;
 7149:         _ ->
 7150:             100
 7151:     end.
 7152:     
 7153: %% Fill buffers
 7154: do_send_timeout_resume_send(S, Server, Tag, RetryTimeout, BlockSize) ->
 7155:     ?P("try send-timeout-resume with"
 7156:        "~n   RetryTimeout: ~w ms"
 7157:        "~n   BlockSize:    ~w", [RetryTimeout, BlockSize]),
 7158:     do_send_timeout_resume_send(S, Server, Tag, 0, RetryTimeout, BlockSize).
 7159: 
 7160: do_send_timeout_resume_send(S, Server, Tag, N, RetryTimeout, BlockSize) ->
 7161:     Bin = random_data(BlockSize),
 7162:     case send_timeout_repeat(S, Server, Tag, N, Bin, RetryTimeout, 0) of
 7163:         0 ->
 7164:             do_send_timeout_resume_send(S, Server, Tag,
 7165:                                         N + 1, RetryTimeout, BlockSize);
 7166:         Timeouts ->
 7167:             ok = gen_tcp:close(S),
 7168:             {N + 1, Timeouts}
 7169:     end.
 7170: 
 7171: send_timeout_repeat(S, Server, Tag, N, Bin, RetryTimeout, Timeouts) ->
 7172:     case gen_tcp:send(S, Bin) of
 7173:         ok ->
 7174:             ?P("send_timeout_repeat -> success => done when"
 7175:                "~n      N:           ~p"
 7176:                "~n      Timeouts:    ~p"
 7177:                "~n      Socket Info: ~p", [N, Timeouts, (catch inet:info(S))]),
 7178:             Timeouts;
 7179:         {error, Reason} ->
 7180:             case Reason of
 7181:                 timeout ->
 7182:                     ?P("send_timeout_repeat -> timeout:"
 7183:                        "~n      S:           ~p"
 7184:                        "~n      N:           ~p"
 7185:                        "~n      Timeouts:    ~p"
 7186:                        "~n      Socket Info: ~p",
 7187:                        [S, N, Timeouts, (catch inet:info(S))]),
 7188:                     Server ! {Tag, rec},
 7189:                     receive after RetryTimeout -> ok end,
 7190:                     send_timeout_repeat(
 7191:                       S, Server, Tag, N, <<>>, RetryTimeout, Timeouts + 1);
 7192:                 {timeout, RestData} ->
 7193:                     ?P("send_timeout_repeat -> timeout with RestData: "
 7194:                        "~n      S:           ~p"
 7195:                        "~n      N:           ~p"
 7196:                        "~n      Timeouts:    ~p"
 7197:                        "~n      Socket Info: ~p",
 7198:                        [S, N, Timeouts, (catch inet:info(S))]),
 7199:                     Server ! {Tag, rec},
 7200:                     receive after RetryTimeout -> ok end,
 7201:                     send_timeout_repeat(
 7202:                       S, Server, Tag, N, RestData, RetryTimeout, Timeouts + 1);
 7203:                 _ ->
 7204:                     ?P("send_timeout_repeat -> unexpected send failure: "
 7205:                        "~n      Reason:      ~p"
 7206:                        "~n   when"
 7207:                        "~n      N:           ~p"
 7208:                        "~n      Timeouts:    ~p"
 7209:                        "~n      Socket Info: ~p",
 7210:                        [Reason, N, Timeouts, (catch inet:info(S))]),
 7211:                     error({Reason, N, Timeouts})
 7212:             end
 7213:     end.
 7214: 
 7215: random_data(0) ->
 7216:     <<>>;
 7217: random_data(Size) ->
 7218:     <<(rand:uniform(256) - 1), (random_data(Size - 1))/binary>>.
 7219: 
 7220: compare_data(<<>>, Count) ->
 7221:     Count;
 7222: compare_data(<<Byte, Bin/binary>>, Count) ->
 7223:     case rand:uniform(256) - 1 of
 7224:         Byte ->
 7225:             compare_data(Bin, Count + 1);
 7226:         _ ->
 7227:             error({diff, Count})
 7228:     end.
 7229: 
 7230: send_timeout_resume_srv(Config, Seed, Client, Tag, ListenOpts, StreamOpts) ->
 7231:     rand:seed(Seed),
 7232:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, ListenOpts),
 7233:     ?P("[server] get listen StreamOpts -> ~p",
 7234:        [inet:getopts(L, optnames(StreamOpts))]),
 7235:     {ok, P} = inet:port(L),
 7236:     Client ! {Tag, port, P},
 7237:     %%
 7238:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L, 2000),
 7239:     ?P("[server] accept success ~p", [A]),
 7240:     ok = inet:setopts(A, StreamOpts),
 7241:     ?P("[server] get accept StreamOpts -> ~p",
 7242:        [inet:getopts(A, optnames(StreamOpts))]),
 7243:     Client ! {Tag, send},
 7244:     %%
 7245:     receive
 7246:         {Tag, rec} ->
 7247:             ?P("[server] received recv command - now wait some time"),
 7248:             receive after 5000 -> ok end,
 7249:             ?P("[server] begin receiving (on ~p)", [A]),
 7250:             exit({Tag, ok, send_timeout_resume_srv(A, 0)})
 7251:     end.
 7252: 
 7253: send_timeout_resume_srv(S, Count) ->
 7254:     case gen_tcp:recv(S, 0) of
 7255:         {ok, Data} ->
 7256:             Count_1 = compare_data(Data, Count),
 7257:             send_timeout_resume_srv(S, Count_1);
 7258:         {error, closed} ->
 7259:             Count;
 7260:         {error, Reason} ->
 7261:             error({Reason, Count})
 7262:     end.
 7263: 
 7264: 
 7265: 
 7266: has_superfluous_schedulers() ->
 7267:     case {erlang:system_info(schedulers),
 7268: 	  erlang:system_info(logical_processors)} of
 7269: 	{S, unknown} when S > 1 -> true;
 7270: 	{S, P} when S > P -> true;
 7271: 	_ -> false
 7272:     end.
 7273: 
 7274: 
 7275: %% Leaking message from inet_drv {inet_reply,P,ok}
 7276: %% when a socket sending resumes working after a send_timeout.
 7277: %% Should we even bother testing this if 'inet_backend = socket'?
 7278: otp_7731(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7279:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 7280:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7281:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7282:                             Addr;
 7283:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7284:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7285:                     end
 7286:            end,
 7287:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_otp_7731(Config, Addr) end,
 7288:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7289:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7290: 
 7291: do_otp_7731(Config, Addr) ->
 7292:     ?P("[ctrl] create server"),
 7293:     ME = self(),
 7294:     ServerPid = spawn_link(fun() -> otp_7731_server(Config, Addr, ME) end),
 7295:     ?P("[ctrl] await listening port (number) from server"),
 7296:     receive {ServerPid, ready, PortNum} -> ok end,
 7297: 
 7298:     ?P("[ctrl] connect to server on port ~w", [PortNum]),
 7299:     {ok, Socket} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNum,
 7300:                             [binary,
 7301:                              {ip,           Addr},
 7302:                              {active,       false},
 7303:                              {packet,       raw},
 7304:                              {send_timeout, 1000}]),
 7305: 
 7306:     ?P("[ctrl] send data"),
 7307:     otp_7731_send(Socket),
 7308:     ?P("[ctrl] sending complete - order server to recv"),
 7309:     ServerPid ! {self(), recv},
 7310:     ?P("[ctrl] await 'recv complete' from server"),
 7311:     receive {ServerPid, ok} -> ?P("[ctrl] received 'recv complete'"), ok end,
 7312: 
 7313:     %% Now make sure inet_drv does not leak any internal messages.
 7314:     ?P("[ctrl] waiting for leaking messages..."),
 7315:     receive Msg ->
 7316:             ?P("[ctrl] got unexpected message: "
 7317:                "~n      ~p", [Msg]),
 7318: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, Msg})
 7319:     after 1000 ->
 7320: 	    ok
 7321:     end,
 7322:     ?P("[ctrl] no leaking messages - cleanup"),
 7323:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Socket)),
 7324:     ServerPid ! {self(), die},
 7325:     ?P("[ctrl] done."),
 7326:     ok.
 7327:     
 7328: otp_7731_send(Socket) ->
 7329:     Bin = <<1:10000>>,
 7330:     ?P("[client] sending ~p bytes...", [byte_size(Bin)]),
 7331:     case gen_tcp:send(Socket, Bin) of
 7332:         ok ->
 7333:             otp_7731_send(Socket);
 7334:         {error, {timeout, RestData}} ->
 7335:             ?P("[client] send timeout with ~w bytes of rest data",
 7336:                [byte_size(RestData)]),
 7337:             ok;
 7338:         {error, timeout} ->
 7339:             ?P("[client] send timeout"),
 7340:             ok
 7341:     end.
 7342: 
 7343: otp_7731_server(Config, Addr, Ctrl) ->
 7344:     ?P("[server] create listen socket"),
 7345:     {ok, LSocket} =
 7346:         ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary, {ip, Addr}, {packet, raw}, {active, false}]),
 7347:     {ok, {_, PortNum}} = inet:sockname(LSocket),
 7348:     ?P("[server] listening on port number ~p", [PortNum]),
 7349:     Ctrl ! {self(), ready, PortNum},
 7350: 
 7351:     ?P("[server] accept"),
 7352:     {ok, CSocket} = gen_tcp:accept(LSocket),
 7353:     ?P("[server] accepted - close listen socket"),
 7354:     gen_tcp:close(LSocket),
 7355: 
 7356:     ?P("[server] await recv order"),
 7357:     receive {Ctrl, recv} -> ok end,
 7358:     
 7359:     ?P("[server] start receiving..."),
 7360:     otp_7731_recv(CSocket),
 7361: 
 7362:     ?P("[server] announce recv done"),
 7363:     Ctrl ! {self(), ok},
 7364: 
 7365:     ?P("[server] finished, (connection) closing..."),
 7366:     gen_tcp:close(CSocket),
 7367:     receive {Ctrl, die} -> ok end,
 7368:     ?P("[server] done"),
 7369:     exit(normal).
 7370: 
 7371: 
 7372: otp_7731_recv(Socket) ->
 7373:     case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 0, 1000) of
 7374:         {ok, Bin} ->
 7375:             ?P("[server] received ~p bytes", [size(Bin)]),
 7376:             otp_7731_recv(Socket);
 7377:         {error, timeout} ->
 7378:             ?P("[server] receive timeout - done recv"),
 7379:             ok
 7380:     end.
 7381: 
 7382: 
 7383: %% OTP-7615: TCP-ports hanging in CLOSING state when sending large
 7384: %% buffer followed by a recv() that returns error due to closed
 7385: %% connection.
 7386: %% OTP-7615 Leaking closed ports.
 7387: %% This is a specific inet-driver bug, skip this when using 'socket'
 7388: zombie_sockets(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7389:     Cond = fun() ->
 7390:                    case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 7391:                        true ->
 7392:                            {skip, "Inet driver specific test"};
 7393:                        false ->
 7394:                            ok
 7395:                    end
 7396:            end,
 7397:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7398:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7399:                             Addr;
 7400:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7401:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7402:                     end
 7403:            end,
 7404:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_zombie_sockets(Config, Addr) end,
 7405:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7406:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7407: 
 7408: do_zombie_sockets(Config, Addr) ->
 7409:     register(zombie_collector,self()),
 7410:     Calls = 10,
 7411:     ?P("create zombie server"),
 7412:     Server = spawn_link(?MODULE, zombie_server, [Config, Addr, self(), Calls]),
 7413:     {Server, ready, PortNum} = receive Msg -> Msg  end,
 7414:     ?P("Ports before = ~p",[lists:sort(erlang:ports())]),
 7415:     zombie_client_loop(Config, Calls, Addr, PortNum),
 7416:     Ports = lists:sort(zombie_collector(Calls, [])),
 7417:     Server ! terminate,
 7418:     ?P("Collected ports = ~p", [Ports]),
 7419:     [] = zombies_alive(Ports, 10),
 7420:     timer:sleep(1000),
 7421:     ?P("done"),
 7422:     ok.
 7423: 
 7424: zombie_client_loop(_Config, 0, _, _) ->
 7425:     ?P("[zombie client] done"),
 7426:     ok;
 7427: zombie_client_loop(Config, N, Addr, PortNum) when is_integer(PortNum) ->
 7428:     ?P("[zombie client][~w] try connect", [N]),
 7429:     {ok, Socket} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNum,
 7430:                             [binary,
 7431:                              {ip,     Addr},
 7432:                              {active, false},
 7433:                              {packet, raw}]),
 7434:     ?P("[zombie client] connected - now close ~p", [Socket]),
 7435:     gen_tcp:close(Socket), % to make server recv fail
 7436:     zombie_client_loop(Config, N-1, Addr, PortNum).
 7437: 
 7438: 
 7439: zombie_collector(0, Acc) ->
 7440:     ?P("[zombie collector] done: "
 7441:        "~n   ~p", [Acc]),
 7442:     Acc;
 7443: zombie_collector(N, Acc) ->
 7444:     receive 
 7445: 	{closed, Socket} -> 
 7446:             ?P("[zombie collector] ~p closed", [Socket]),
 7447: 	    zombie_collector(N-1, [Socket|Acc]);
 7448: 	E -> 
 7449: 	    {unexpected, E, Acc}
 7450:     end.
 7451: 	    
 7452: zombies_alive(Ports, WaitSec) ->
 7453:     Alive = lists:sort(erlang:ports()),
 7454:     ?P("[zombies alive][~w] Alive: ~p", [WaitSec, Alive]),
 7455:     Zombies = lists:filter(fun(P) -> lists:member(P, Alive) end, Ports),
 7456:     case Zombies of
 7457: 	[] -> [];
 7458: 	_ ->
 7459: 	    case WaitSec of
 7460: 		0 -> Zombies;
 7461: 		_ -> timer:sleep(1000), % Wait some more for zombies to die
 7462: 		     zombies_alive(Zombies, WaitSec-1)
 7463: 	    end
 7464:     end.
 7465: 
 7466: zombie_server(Config, Addr, Pid, Calls) ->
 7467:     ?P("[zombie server] try create listen socket with backlog: ~w", [Calls]),
 7468:     {ok, LSock} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary, {ip, Addr}, {packet, raw},
 7469:                                       {active, false}, {backlog, Calls}]),
 7470:     {ok, {_, PortNum}} = inet:sockname(LSock),
 7471:     ?P("[zombie server] Listening on ~w with port number ~p", [LSock, PortNum]),
 7472:     BigBin = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(100*1024, 77)),
 7473:     ?P("[zombie server] send ready"),
 7474:     Pid ! {self(), ready, PortNum},
 7475:     zombie_accept_loop(LSock, BigBin, Calls),
 7476:     ?P("[zombie server] await terminate"),
 7477:     terminate = receive Msg -> Msg end,
 7478:     ?P("[zombie server] terminating"),
 7479:     ok.
 7480: 
 7481: zombie_accept_loop(_, _, 0) ->
 7482:     ?P("[zombie server] accept loop done"),
 7483:     ok;
 7484: zombie_accept_loop(Socket, BigBin, Calls) ->
 7485:     ?P("[zombie server][~w] try accept", [Calls]),
 7486:     case gen_tcp:accept(Socket) of
 7487: 	{ok, NewSocket} ->
 7488:             ?P("[zombie server][~w] accepted ~p - create handler",
 7489:                [Calls, NewSocket]),
 7490: 	    spawn_link(fun() -> zombie_server_handler(NewSocket, BigBin) end),
 7491: 	    zombie_accept_loop(Socket, BigBin, Calls-1);
 7492: 	E ->
 7493: 	    E
 7494:     end.
 7495: 
 7496: zombie_server_handler(Socket, Bin) ->
 7497:     ?P("[zombie server handler] got connection on ~p - attempt send", [Socket]),
 7498:     gen_tcp:send(Socket, Bin),
 7499:     ?P("[zombie server handler] Sent data, waiting for reply on ~p", [Socket]),
 7500:     case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 4) of
 7501:         {error, closed} ->
 7502:             ?P("[zombie server handler] recv: closed (expected)"),
 7503:             ok;
 7504:         {error, econnaborted} -> % may be returned on Windows
 7505:             ?P("[zombie server handler] recv: econnaborted (expected)"),
 7506:             ok;
 7507:         {error, Reason} ->
 7508:             ?P("[zombie server handler] UNEXPECTED recv failure reason: ~p",
 7509:                [Reason]),
 7510:             exit({unexpected_recv_error_reason, Reason});
 7511:         {ok, _} ->
 7512:             ?P("[zombie server handler] UNEXPECTED recv success"),
 7513:             exit(unexpected_recv_success)
 7514: 	  end,
 7515:     ?P("[zombie server handler] close socket ~p", [Socket]),
 7516:     gen_tcp:close(Socket),
 7517:     ?P("[zombie server handler] socket closed: inform collector"),
 7518:     zombie_collector ! {closed, Socket}.
 7519: 
 7520: 
 7521: %% Hanging send on windows when sending iolist with more than 16 binaries.
 7522: otp_7816(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7523:     ct:timetrap(?MINS(2)),
 7524:     Cond = fun() ->
 7525: 		   %% With 'socket on Windows' we have actually no way to
 7526: 		   %% actually *know* that nothing is sent even after a timeout
 7527: 		   %% (and the send cancel that socket issues). The I/O 
 7528: 		   %% Completion Port framework may well have buffers still
 7529: 		   %% handle the data and send it as soon as it can.
 7530: 		   %% Basically, data is "out of our hands" as soon as we
 7531: 		   %% give it to the framework. Cancel may have "no effect"
 7532: 		   %% even if the completion operation is reported as
 7533: 		   %% 'aborted'.
 7534: 		   %% So, this test case simply does not work.
 7535: 		   case os:type() of
 7536: 		        {win32, nt} ->
 7537: 			   case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 7538: 			       true ->
 7539: 				   {skip,
 7540: 				    "Not compatible with 'socket on Windows'"};
 7541: 			       false ->
 7542: 				   ok
 7543: 				       end;
 7544: 		       _ ->
 7545: 			   ok
 7546: 		   end
 7547: 	   end,
 7548:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7549:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7550:                             Addr;
 7551:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7552:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7553:                     end
 7554:            end,
 7555:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_otp_7816(Config, Addr) end,
 7556:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7557:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7558: 
 7559: do_otp_7816(Config, Addr) ->
 7560:     Ctrl = self(),
 7561:     ?P("[ctrl] create server process..."),
 7562:     Server = spawn_link(fun() -> otp_7816_server(Config, Addr, Ctrl) end),
 7563:     ?P("[ctrl] await server process ready..."),
 7564:     receive {Server, ready, PortNum} -> ok end,
 7565: 
 7566:     ?P("[ctrl] connect to server..."),
 7567:     {ok, Socket} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNum,
 7568:                             [binary,
 7569:                              {ip,           Addr},
 7570:                              {active,       false},
 7571:                              {packet,       4},
 7572:                              {send_timeout, 10}]),
 7573: 
 7574:     %% We use the undocumented feature that sending can be resumed after
 7575:     %% a send_timeout without any data loss if the peer starts to receive data.
 7576:     %% Unless of course the 7816-bug is in affect, in which case the write event
 7577:     %% for the socket is lost on windows and not all data is sent.
 7578: 
 7579:     ?P("[ctrl] begin sending..."),
 7580: 
 7581:     [otp_7816_ctrl(Socket, 18, BinSize, Server) ||
 7582: 	BinSize <- lists:seq(1000, 2000, 123)],
 7583: 
 7584:     ?P("[ctrl] sending complete - close socket"),
 7585: 
 7586:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Socket),
 7587:     ?P("[ctrl] stop server"),
 7588:     Server ! {self(), closed},
 7589:     ?P("[ctrl] await server stopped"),
 7590:     {Server, closed} = receive M -> M end,
 7591:     ?P("[ctrl] done"),
 7592:     ok.
 7593: 
 7594: 
 7595: otp_7816_ctrl(Socket, BinNr, BinSize, Server) ->
 7596:     ?P("[ctrl] create payload (BinSz: ~w)...", [BinSize]),
 7597:     Data = lists:duplicate(BinNr, <<1:(BinSize*8)>>),
 7598:     ?P("[ctrl] socket info prior to start sending: "
 7599:        "~n      ~p", [inet:info(Socket)]),
 7600:     Ctrl   = self(),
 7601:     Client = spawn_link(fun() -> otp_7816_send_data(Ctrl, Socket, Data) end),
 7602:     SentBytes =
 7603: 	receive
 7604: 	    {Client, continue, Loops} ->
 7605: 		?P("[ctrl] received continue from client: ~p", [Loops]),
 7606: 		SB = Loops * BinNr * BinSize,
 7607: 		Server ! {self(), recv, SB},
 7608: 		SB
 7609: 	end,
 7610:     ct:sleep(1000),
 7611:     ?P("[ctrl] socket info after sending ~w bytes: "
 7612:        "~n      ~p", [SentBytes, inet:info(Socket)]),
 7613:     ?P("[ctrl] await server result..."),
 7614:     ok = receive
 7615: 	     {Server, SR} ->
 7616: 		 ?P("[ctrl] server result: ~p", [SR]),
 7617: 		 SR
 7618: 	 end,
 7619:     ?P("[ctrl] await client termination..."),
 7620:     ok = receive
 7621: 	     {'EXIT', Client, normal} ->
 7622: 		 ?P("[ctrl] client normal exit"),
 7623: 		 ok;
 7624: 	     {'EXIT', Client, CR} ->
 7625: 		 ?P("[ctrl] client unexpected exit reason: ~p", [CR]),
 7626: 		 CR
 7627: 	 end,
 7628:     ?P("[ctrl] done with BinSz: ~p", [BinSize]),
 7629:     ok.
 7630:     
 7631: 
 7632: otp_7816_send_data(Ctrl, Socket, Data) ->
 7633:     otp_7816_send_data(Ctrl, Socket, Data, 0).
 7634: 
 7635: otp_7816_send_data(Ctrl, Socket, Data, Loops) ->
 7636:     ?P("[client] sending data (~w bytes, ~w)...", [iolist_size(Data), Loops]),
 7637:     case gen_tcp:send(Socket, Data) of
 7638: 	ok ->
 7639: 	    otp_7816_send_data(Ctrl, Socket, Data, Loops+1);
 7640: 
 7641: 	{error, timeout} when is_port(Socket) ->
 7642: 	    %% For the 'classic' sockets, when the OS buffers are
 7643: 	    %% full, the rest data are put into the (inet driver)
 7644: 	    %% internal, for later sending. SO, it can be counted
 7645: 	    %% as sent.
 7646: 	    ?P("[client] send timeout when Loops: ~p (+1)", [Loops]),
 7647: 	    Ctrl ! {self(), continue, Loops + 1},
 7648: 	    exit(normal);
 7649: 
 7650: 	{error, timeout} ->
 7651: 	    %% For inet_backend = 'socket' when we nothing of the
 7652: 	    %% message was sent.
 7653: 	    ?P("[client] send timeout when Loops: ~p", [Loops]),
 7654: 	    Ctrl ! {self(), continue, Loops},
 7655: 	    exit(normal);
 7656: 
 7657: 	{error, {timeout, RestData}} ->
 7658: 	    %% A timeout means that **some** of the data was not sent,
 7659: 	    %% currently there is no way to know how much.
 7660: 	    %% NOTE THAT THIS MEANS THAT WE MAY HAVE A PARTIAL PACKAGE
 7661: 	    %% WRITTEN, INCLUDING A HEADER THAT INDICATES A DATA
 7662: 	    %% SIZE THAT IS **NOT** PRESENT!!
 7663: 	    %% So for this trest case to work, we need to write the rest.
 7664: 	    %% But we cannot do that without first setting the package to raw.
 7665: 	    %%
 7666: 	    ?P("[client] send timeout"
 7667: 	       "~n      with ~w bytes of rest data"
 7668: 	       "~n      when Loops: ~p", [byte_size(RestData), Loops]),
 7669: 	    Ctrl ! {self(), continue, Loops + 1},
 7670: 	    ?P("[client] packet to 'raw'..."),
 7671: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Socket, [{packet, raw}, {send_timeout, 1000}]),
 7672: 	    ?P("[client] send ~w bytes of rest data...",
 7673: 	       [byte_size(RestData)]),
 7674: 	    ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket, RestData),
 7675: 	    ?P("[client] packet (back) to '4'..."),
 7676: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Socket, [{packet, 4}, {send_timeout, 10}]),
 7677: 	    ?P("[client] done"),
 7678: 	    exit(normal)
 7679: 
 7680:     end.
 7681:     
 7682:     
 7683: otp_7816_server(Config, Addr, Ctrl) ->
 7684:     ?P("[server] create listening socket"),
 7685:     {ok, LSocket} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary,  {ip, Addr},
 7686:                                         {packet, 4},
 7687:                                         {active, false}]),
 7688:     {ok, {_, PortNum}} = inet:sockname(LSocket),
 7689:     ?P("[server] listening on ~w with port number ~p", [LSocket, PortNum]),
 7690:     Ctrl ! {self(), ready, PortNum},
 7691: 
 7692:     ?P("[server] accept connection..."),
 7693:     {ok, ASocket} = gen_tcp:accept(LSocket),
 7694:     ?P("[server] connection accepted..."),
 7695:     gen_tcp:close(LSocket),
 7696: 
 7697:     otp_7816_server_loop(ASocket, Ctrl),
 7698: 
 7699:     ?P("[server] terminating").
 7700: 
 7701: 
 7702: otp_7816_server_loop(Socket, Ctrl) ->
 7703:     ?P("[server] waiting for order..."),
 7704:     receive 
 7705: 	{Ctrl, recv, RecvBytes} -> 
 7706: 	    ?P("[server] start receiving (~w bytes)...", [RecvBytes]),
 7707: 
 7708: 	    ok = otp_7816_recv(Socket, RecvBytes),
 7709: 	    
 7710: 	    Ctrl ! {self(), ok},
 7711: 	    otp_7816_server_loop(Socket, Ctrl);
 7712: 	
 7713: 	{Ctrl, closed} ->
 7714: 	    {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 0, 1000),
 7715: 	    Ctrl ! {self(), closed}
 7716:     end.
 7717: 
 7718: otp_7816_recv(Socket, BytesLeft) ->
 7719:     otp_7816_recv(Socket, BytesLeft, 1).
 7720: 
 7721: otp_7816_recv(_, 0, _) ->
 7722:     ?P("[server] got all data"),
 7723:     ok;
 7724: otp_7816_recv(Socket, BytesLeft, N) ->
 7725:     ?P("[server,~w] try recv (~p bytes left)", [N, BytesLeft]),
 7726:     case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 0, 1000) of
 7727: 	{ok, Bin} when (byte_size(Bin) =< BytesLeft) andalso
 7728: 		       (byte_size(Bin) > 0) -> 
 7729: 	    ?P("[server,~w] received ~p of ~p bytes",
 7730: 	       [N, size(Bin), BytesLeft]),
 7731: 	    otp_7816_recv(Socket, BytesLeft - byte_size(Bin), N+1);
 7732: 	{ok, Bin} ->
 7733: 	    ?P("[server,~w] received unexpected data: "
 7734: 	       "~n   Expected:    ~p bytes"
 7735: 	       "~n   Received:    ~p bytes"
 7736: 	       "~n   Socket Info: ~p",
 7737: 	       [N, BytesLeft, byte_size(Bin), inet:info(Socket)]),
 7738: 	    {error, {unexpected_data, BytesLeft, byte_size(Bin)}};
 7739: 	{error, timeout} ->
 7740: 	    ?P("[server,~w] got receive timeout when expecting more data:"
 7741: 	       "~n      Socket Info: ~p", [N,inet:info(Socket)]),
 7742: 	    {error, timeout}
 7743:     end.
 7744: 
 7745: 
 7746: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 7747: 
 7748: %% Receive a packet with a faulty packet header.
 7749: otp_8102(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7750:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 7751:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7752:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7753:                             Addr;
 7754:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7755:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7756:                     end
 7757:            end,
 7758:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_otp_8102(Config, Addr) end,
 7759:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7760:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7761: 
 7762: do_otp_8102(Config, Addr) ->
 7763:     {ok, LSocket} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]),
 7764:     {ok, {_, PortNum}} = inet:sockname(LSocket),
 7765:     ?P("Listening on ~w with port number ~p", [LSocket, PortNum]),
 7766: 
 7767:     [otp_8102_do(Config, LSocket, Addr, PortNum, otp_8102_packet(Type, Size))
 7768:      || Size <- lists:seq(-10,-1), 
 7769: 	Type <- [4, {cdr,big}, {cdr,little}]],
 7770:     
 7771:     gen_tcp:close(LSocket),
 7772:     ok.
 7773: 
 7774: otp_8102_packet(4, Size) ->
 7775:     {<<Size:32/big>>, 4};
 7776: otp_8102_packet({cdr,big}, Size) ->
 7777:     {<<"GIOP",0,0,0,0,Size:32/big>>, cdr};
 7778: otp_8102_packet({cdr,little}, Size) ->
 7779:     {<<"GIOP",0,0,1,0,Size:32/little>>, cdr}.
 7780: 
 7781: otp_8102_do(Config, LSocket, Addr, PortNum, {Bin,PType}) ->
 7782: 
 7783:     ?P("Connect with packet option ~p ...",[PType]),
 7784:     {ok, RSocket} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNum, [binary,
 7785:                                                      {ip,     Addr},
 7786:                                                      {packet, PType},
 7787:                                                      {active, true}]),
 7788:     {ok, SSocket} = gen_tcp:accept(LSocket),
 7789: 
 7790:     ?P("Got connection, sending ~p...",[Bin]),
 7791: 
 7792:     ok = gen_tcp:send(SSocket, Bin),
 7793: 
 7794:     ?P("Sending complete...",[]),
 7795: 
 7796:     {tcp_error,RSocket,emsgsize} = receive M -> M end,
 7797: 
 7798:     ?P("Got error msg, ok."),
 7799:     gen_tcp:close(SSocket),    
 7800:     gen_tcp:close(RSocket).
 7801: 
 7802: %% Verify packet_size handles long HTTP header lines.
 7803: otp_9389(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7804:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 7805:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7806:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7807:                             Addr;
 7808:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7809:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7810:                     end
 7811:            end,
 7812:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_otp_9389(Config, Addr) end,
 7813:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7814:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7815: 
 7816: do_otp_9389(Config, Addr) ->
 7817:     {ok, LS} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 7818:     {ok, {_, PortNum}} = inet:sockname(LS),
 7819:     ?P("Listening on ~w with port number ~p", [LS, PortNum]),
 7820:     OrigLinkHdr = "/" ++ string:chars($S, 8192),
 7821:     _Server = spawn_link(
 7822:                 fun() ->
 7823:                         {ok, S} = gen_tcp:accept(LS),
 7824:                         ok = inet:setopts(S, [{packet_size, 16384}]),
 7825:                         ok = otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr),
 7826:                         ok = gen_tcp:close(S)
 7827:                 end),
 7828:     {ok, S} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNum,
 7829:                        [binary, {ip, Addr}, {active, false}]),
 7830:     Req = "GET / HTTP/1.1\r\n"
 7831:         ++ "Host: " ++ inet_parse:ntoa(Addr) ++ "\r\n"
 7832:         ++ "Link: " ++ OrigLinkHdr ++ "\r\n\r\n",
 7833:     ok = gen_tcp:send(S, Req),
 7834:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{packet, http}]),
 7835:     {ok, {http_response, {1,1}, 200, "OK"}} = gen_tcp:recv(S, 0),
 7836:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{packet, httph}, {packet_size, 16384}]),
 7837:     {ok, {http_header, _, 'Content-Length', _, "0"}} = gen_tcp:recv(S, 0),
 7838:     {ok, {http_header, _, "Link", _, LinkHdr}} = gen_tcp:recv(S, 0),
 7839:     true = (LinkHdr == OrigLinkHdr),
 7840:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S),
 7841:     ok = gen_tcp:close(LS),
 7842:     ok.
 7843: 
 7844: otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr) ->
 7845:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{active,once},{packet,http}]),
 7846:     receive
 7847:         {http, S, {http_request, 'GET', _, _}} ->
 7848:             ok = otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, undefined)
 7849:     after
 7850:         3000 ->
 7851:             error({timeout,request_line})
 7852:     end.
 7853: otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, ok) ->
 7854:     Resp = "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\nContent-length: 0\r\n" ++
 7855:         "Link: " ++ OrigLinkHdr ++ "\r\n\r\n",
 7856:     ok = gen_tcp:send(S, Resp);
 7857: otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, State) ->
 7858:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{active,once}, {packet,httph}]),
 7859:     receive
 7860:         {http, S, http_eoh} ->
 7861:             otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, ok);
 7862:         {http, S, {http_header, _, "Link", _, LinkHdr}} ->
 7863:             LinkHdr = OrigLinkHdr,
 7864:             otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, State);
 7865:         {http, S, {http_header, _, _Hdr, _, _Val}} ->
 7866:             otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, State);
 7867:         {http, S, {http_error, Err}} ->
 7868:             error({error, Err})
 7869:     after
 7870:         3000 ->
 7871:             error({timeout,header})
 7872:     end.
 7873: 
 7874: wrapping_oct() ->
 7875:     [{timetrap, {minutes,20}}].
 7876: 
 7877: %% Check that 64bit octet counters work.
 7878: wrapping_oct(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7879:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 7880:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7881:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7882:                             Addr;
 7883:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7884:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7885:                     end
 7886:            end,
 7887:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_wrapping_oct(Config, Addr) end,
 7888:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7889:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7890: 
 7891: %% {recbuf, 8192}, {sndbuf, 8192}
 7892: do_wrapping_oct(Config, Addr) ->
 7893:     ?P("[ctrl] create listen socket"),
 7894:     Ctrl = self(),
 7895:     {ok, LSock} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false},{mode,binary}]),
 7896:     {ok, LPort} = inet:port(LSock),
 7897:     ?P("[ctrl] spawn acceptor"),
 7898:     Acceptor = spawn_link(fun() -> oct_acceptor(Ctrl, LSock) end),
 7899:     ?P("[ctrl] spawn pump"),
 7900:     Pump     = spawn_link(fun() -> 
 7901:                                   oct_datapump(Ctrl,
 7902:                                                Config, Addr, LPort, 16#10000FFFF)
 7903:                           end),
 7904:     ?P("[ctrl] await acceptor socket"),
 7905:     ASock = wc_await_socket("acceptor", Acceptor),
 7906:     ?P("[ctrl] await pump socket"),
 7907:     PSock = wc_await_socket("pump", Pump),
 7908:     ?P("[ctrl] await completion (from pump)"),
 7909:     Res = wc_await_completion(Acceptor, ASock, Pump, PSock),
 7910:     ?P("[ctrl] close listen socket"),
 7911:     gen_tcp:close(LSock),
 7912:     ?P("[ctrl] verify result"),
 7913:     ok = Res,
 7914:     ?P("[ctrl] done"),
 7915:     ok.
 7916: 
 7917: wc_await_socket(Tag, Pid) ->
 7918:     receive
 7919:         {Pid, socket, AS} ->
 7920:             ?P("received ~s socket: "
 7921:                "~n      ~p", [Tag, AS]),
 7922:             AS
 7923:     end.
 7924: 
 7925: wc_await_completion(Acceptor, ASock, Pump, PSock) ->
 7926:     wc_await_completion(Acceptor, ASock, Pump, PSock, 1, undefined).
 7927: 
 7928: wc_await_completion(undefined = _Acceptor, _ASock,
 7929:                     undefined = _Pump,     _PSock, 
 7930:                     Loops, Res) ->
 7931:     ?P("completed after ~w loops", [Loops]),
 7932:     Res;
 7933: wc_await_completion(Acceptor, ASock, Pump, PSock, Loops, CRes) ->
 7934:     receive
 7935:         {'EXIT', Pump, Res} ->
 7936:             ?P("[ctrl] Received pump exit: "
 7937:                "~n   Loops:  ~w"
 7938:                "~n   Reason: ~p", [Loops, Res]),
 7939:             wc_await_completion(Acceptor,  ASock,
 7940:                                 undefined, PSock,
 7941:                                 Loops + 1, Res);
 7942:         {'EXIT', Acceptor, Res} ->
 7943:             ?P("[ctrl] Received acceptor exit: "
 7944:                "~n   Loops:  ~w"
 7945:                "~n   Reason: ~p", [Loops, Res]),
 7946:             wc_await_completion(undefined, ASock,
 7947:                                 Pump,      PSock,
 7948:                                 Loops + 1, CRes)
 7949:                 
 7950:     after 10000 ->
 7951:             ASockInfo = wc_sock_info(ASock),
 7952:             AccInfo   = wc_proc_info(Acceptor),
 7953:             PSockInfo = wc_sock_info(PSock),
 7954:             PumpInfo  = wc_proc_info(Pump),
 7955:             ?P("Info ~w while waiting for clompletion: "
 7956:                "~n   Acceptor Socket Info: ~p"
 7957:                "~n   Acceptor Info:        ~p"
 7958:                "~n   Pump Socket Info:     ~p"
 7959:                "~n   Pump Info:            ~p",
 7960:                [Loops, ASockInfo, AccInfo, PSockInfo, PumpInfo]),
 7961:             wc_await_completion(Acceptor,  ASock,
 7962:                                 Pump,      PSock,
 7963:                                 Loops + 1, CRes)
 7964:     end.
 7965:             
 7966: wc_sock_info(S) ->
 7967:     try inet:info(S)
 7968:     catch
 7969:         _:_:_ ->
 7970:             undefined
 7971:     end.
 7972: 
 7973: wc_proc_info(P) when is_pid(P) ->
 7974:     try erlang:process_info(P)
 7975:     catch
 7976:         _:_:_ ->
 7977:             undefined
 7978:     end;
 7979: wc_proc_info(_) ->
 7980:     undefined.
 7981: 
 7982: %% {recbuf, 16*1024}, {sndbuf, 16*1024}
 7983: oct_datapump(Ctrl, Config, Addr, Port, N) ->
 7984:     ?P("[pump] connect to listener"),
 7985:     {ok, CSock} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 7986: 			   [{ip, Addr}, {active, false}, {mode, binary}]),
 7987:     ?P("[pump] announce to ctrl"),
 7988:     Ctrl ! {self(), socket, CSock},
 7989:     {ok, [{sndbuf,SndBuf}]} = inet:getopts(CSock, [sndbuf]),
 7990:     ?P("[pump] connected - start 'pumping' with"
 7991:        "~n      SndBuf: ~w", [SndBuf]),
 7992:     put(action,  nothing),
 7993:     put(sent,    0),
 7994:     put(elapsed, 0),
 7995:     put(rem_bytes, N),
 7996:     oct_pump(CSock, N, binary:copy(<<$a:8>>,100000), 0, 0).
 7997: 
 7998: oct_pump(S, N, _, _, _Sent) when N =< 0 ->
 7999:     ?P("[pump] done"),
 8000:     (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 8001:     exit(ok);
 8002: oct_pump(S, N, Bin, Last, Sent) ->
 8003:     put(action, send),
 8004:     Start   = erlang:monotonic_time(nanosecond),
 8005:     Res     = gen_tcp:send(S, Bin),
 8006:     Stop    = erlang:monotonic_time(nanosecond),
 8007:     Elapsed = get(elapsed),
 8008:     put(elapsed, Elapsed + (Stop - Start)),
 8009:     put(action,  sent),
 8010:     put(sent,    Sent+1),
 8011:     case Res of
 8012: 	ok ->
 8013: 	    case inet:getstat(S) of
 8014: 		{ok, Stat} ->
 8015: 		    {_, R} = lists:keyfind(send_oct, 1, Stat),
 8016: 		    case (R < Last) of
 8017: 			true ->
 8018: 			    ?P("[pump] send counter error ~p < ~p", [R, Last]),
 8019:                             (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 8020: 			    exit({error, {output_counter, R, Last, N}});
 8021: 			false ->
 8022:                             put(rem_bytes, N - byte_size(Bin)),
 8023: 			    oct_pump(S, N-byte_size(Bin), Bin, R, Sent+1)
 8024: 		    end;
 8025: 		{error, StatReason} ->
 8026: 		    ?P("[pump] get stat failed:"
 8027: 		       "~n      Reason:    ~p"
 8028: 		       "~n   when"
 8029: 		       "~n      Remaining: ~p"
 8030: 		       "~n      Last:      ~p", [StatReason, N, Last]),
 8031: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 8032: 		    exit({error, {stat_failure, StatReason, N, Last}})
 8033: 	    end;
 8034: 	{error, SendReason} ->
 8035: 	    ?P("[pump] send failed:"
 8036: 	       "~n      Reason:    ~p"
 8037: 	       "~n   when"
 8038: 	       "~n      Remaining: ~p"
 8039: 	       "~n      Last:      ~p", [SendReason, N, Last]),
 8040: 	    (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 8041: 	    exit({error, {send_failure, SendReason, N, Last}})
 8042:     end.
 8043:     
 8044: 
 8045: oct_acceptor(Ctrl, LSock) ->
 8046:     ?P("[acceptor] accept connection"),
 8047:     {ok, ASock} = gen_tcp:accept(LSock),
 8048:     ?P("[acceptor] announce to ctrl"),
 8049:     Ctrl ! {self(), socket, ASock},
 8050:     {ok, [{recbuf,RecBuf}]} = inet:getopts(ASock, [recbuf]),
 8051:     ?P("[acceptor] connection accepted - start receiving with: "
 8052:        "~n      RecBuf: ~w", [RecBuf]),
 8053:     put(action,  nothing),
 8054:     put(recv,    0),
 8055:     put(elapsed, 0),
 8056:     oct_aloop(ASock, inet:info(ASock), 0, 0).
 8057: 
 8058: oct_aloop(S, LastInfo, Received, Times) ->
 8059:     put(action, recv),
 8060:     Start   = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 8061:     Res     = gen_tcp:recv(S, 0),
 8062:     Stop    = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 8063:     Elapsed = get(elapsed),
 8064:     put(elapsed, Elapsed + (Stop - Start)),
 8065:     put(action,  received),
 8066:     put(recv,    Times+1),
 8067:     case Res of
 8068: 	{ok, _} ->
 8069:             #{counters := #{recv_oct := R} = _Stat} = Info = inet:info(S),
 8070:             case (R < Received) of
 8071:                 true ->
 8072:                     ?P("[acceptor] recv counter error:"
 8073:                        "~n      Recv Cnt:  ~p"
 8074:                        "~n      Received:  ~p"
 8075:                        "~n      Times:     ~p"
 8076:                        "~n      Info:      ~p"
 8077:                        "~n      Last Info: ~p",
 8078:                        [R, Received, Times, Info, LastInfo]),
 8079:                     (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 8080:                     {error, {output_counter, R, Received, Times}};
 8081:                 false ->
 8082:                     case Times rem 16#FFFFF of
 8083:                         0 ->
 8084:                             ?P("[acceptor] read: ~p"
 8085:                                "~n      Times: ~w"
 8086:                                "~n      Info:  ~p",
 8087:                                [R, Times, Info]);
 8088:                         _ ->
 8089:                             ok
 8090:                     end,
 8091:                     oct_aloop(S, Info, R, Times+1)
 8092:             end;
 8093: 
 8094: 	{error, RecvReason} ->
 8095: 	    ?P("[acceptor] receive failed:"
 8096: 	       "~n      Reason:   ~p"
 8097: 	       "~n   when"
 8098: 	       "~n      Received: ~p"
 8099: 	       "~n      Times:    ~p", [RecvReason, Received, Times]),
 8100: 	    (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 8101:             ct:sleep(1000), % Just give the 'pump' a chance to get there first
 8102: 	    exit(closed)
